original: de la brda byas na ni de nyid sgras go bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par gcod pa nyid sgra'i brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de la brda byas na ni de nyid sgras go bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par gcod pa nyid sgra'i brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: If it is said that the word expresses the exclusion, then the exclusion itself is what is understood from the word, because it is what is to be understood from the word.

original: log pa ni log pa ma yin par brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: log pa ni log pa ma yin par brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not possible to say that what is not a non-F is an F.

original: gal te ldog pa de rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa de rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the exclusion the essence of the word?

original: de la rang gi ngo bo brjod pa med na ji ltar de dang tha mi dad pa'i ldog pa brjod pa yin /
analyzed: de la rang gi ngo bo brjod pa med na ji ltar de dang tha mi dad pa'i ldog pa brjod pa yin /
translated: If the essence is not expressed, how can the exclusion, which is not different from it, be expressed?

original: 'on te ldog pa tha dad pa yin na de'i tshe 'di rang gi gsal ba las rjes su song ba'i phyir rigs nyid tshul gzhan gyis bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te ldog pa tha dad pa yin na de'i tshe 'di rang gi gsal ba las rjes su song ba'i phyir rigs nyid tshul gzhan gyis bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if the exclusion is different, then the universal, which is the object of the word, is the same as its individual instances, and it is taught by a different rule.

original: de lta na yang rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin nyid rtogs par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta na yang rjes su song ba'i rang bzhin nyid rtogs par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Even so, the universal, which is the nature of the individual instances, is what is understood,

original: ldog pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar ngag rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ldog pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir ji ltar ngag rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: and not the exclusion. So how can the word have an exclusion as its effect?üîΩThis is not so.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: For,

original: 'di ltar / bum pa de nyid de las ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bum pa de nyid de las ni //
translated: That very pot is not a non-pot.

original: gzhan pa dag las ldog par brjod //üîΩldog med pa nyid spyi dang ni //
analyzed: gzhan pa dag las ldog par brjod // ldog med pa nyid spyi dang ni //
translated: But it is not different from the others.üîΩAnd it is not the case that there is no universal,

original: ldan pas tha dad 'gyur ba min //
analyzed: ldan pas tha dad 'gyur ba min //
translated: because it is connected with the particulars, and there is no difference.

original: 'di ni bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bstan zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: rang nyid ldog pa ma yin pa de las @226b gzhan dang ldan pas ldog par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid ldog pa ma yin pa de las @226b gzhan dang ldan pas ldog par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that it is not different from itself, and that it is different from the others because it is connected with them.

original: spyi dang ldan pa ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: spyi dang ldan pa ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If it were connected with the universal, it would be the same.

original: der yang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: der yang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the same.

original: mtshungs pa ma yin pa ni gzhan dang ldan yang mtshungs pa nyid du 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma yin pa ni gzhan dang ldan yang mtshungs pa nyid du 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not tenable that it is not the same, and that it is connected with the others.

original: gal te rang nyid mtshungs na ni //
analyzed: gal te rang nyid mtshungs na ni //
translated: If it were the same by itself,

original: spyi rtogs pa ni don med yid //üîΩspyi dang ldan yang mi mtshungs pa //üîΩde yi bdag tu 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: spyi rtogs pa ni don med yid // spyi dang ldan yang mi mtshungs pa // de yi bdag tu 'gyur ma yin //
translated: the cognition of the universal would be pointless.

original: gal te spyi dang ldan par gyur kyang mtshungs pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te spyi dang ldan par gyur kyang mtshungs pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Even if it were connected with the universal, it would not be the same.

original: de ni rang gi rang bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang gi rang bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It would not be the self of that, because it would appear as its own nature.

original: tha dad par snang na ni spyi dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'thad do //
analyzed: tha dad par snang na ni spyi dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'thad do //
translated: If it appears as different, then it is tenable to say that it possesses the universal.

original: tha dad pa med par snang na spyi zhes bya ba kho nar zad do /
analyzed: tha dad pa med par snang na spyi zhes bya ba kho nar zad do /
translated: If it appears as non-different, then it is simply a universal.

original: gal te tha dad par ma bzung na ni spyi zhes bya ba'am khyad par zhes bya ba tsam du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te tha dad par ma bzung na ni spyi zhes bya ba'am khyad par zhes bya ba tsam du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not apprehended as different, then it is simply a universal or a particular.

original: 'on te tha dad pa yang snang la tha dad pa med par snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te tha dad pa yang snang la tha dad pa med par snang ngo zhe na /
translated: But if it appears as different and also appears as non-different,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: gal te tha dad par snang na //
analyzed: gal te tha dad par snang na //
translated: if it appears as different,

original: des na spyi dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: des na spyi dang ldan par 'gyur //
translated: then it would possess the universal.

original: tha dad med par snang zhe na //
analyzed: tha dad med par snang zhe na //
translated: If it appears as non-different,

original: des na de ni spyir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de ni spyir 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be a universal.

original: gcig la ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin gnyis 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig la ni tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin gnyis 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not tenable that a single thing has both a different and non-different nature.

original: gal te spyi de gsal ba las rang bzhin de nyid kyis tha dad pa yang yin la /
analyzed: gal te spyi de gsal ba las rang bzhin de nyid kyis tha dad pa yang yin la /
translated: If that universal is different from the manifestation by that very nature,

original: rang bzhin de nyid kyis tha dad pa med kyang yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin de nyid kyis tha dad pa med kyang yin pa ma yin te /
translated: and also not different by that very nature,üîΩthen

original: 'on kyang rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa yin la /
translated: However, by nature they are different.üîΩ

original: rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa med pa yin no zhes rnam par gnas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa med pa yin no zhes rnam par gnas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But some natures are different, and some natures are not different.üîΩThis is the position.

original: de ni de ltar bden pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de ltar bden pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩphan tshun tha dad phyir na spyi //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / phan tshun tha dad phyir na spyi //
translated: BecauseüîΩThe universal is not a second nature,

original: rang bzhin gnyis par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnyis par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: because of mutual difference.üîΩThe universal would be different

original: dngos po gnyis po de la ni //üîΩspyi gzhan dag tu 'gyur pa yin //
analyzed: dngos po gnyis po de la ni // spyi gzhan dag tu 'gyur pa yin //
translated: from the two things.

original: spyi yi rang bzhin tha dad phyir ;
analyzed: spyi yi rang bzhin tha dad phyir ;
translated: Because of the difference of the nature of the universal,

original: / gsal ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: / gsal ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
translated: it would follow that it is a manifest thing.

original: rang bzhin tha dad phyir na ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad phyir na ni //
translated: Because of the difference of nature,

original: gsal ba'i phyir yang 'thad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gsal ba'i phyir yang 'thad mi 'gyur //
translated: it is not tenable that it is a manifest thing.

original: gal te rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad la gzhan gyis ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad la gzhan gyis ni tha mi dad pa'i phyir /
translated: If, by some natures, it is different, and by other natures, it is not different,

original: spyi la rang bzhin gnyis yod na //
analyzed: spyi la rang bzhin gnyis yod na //
translated: if the universal has two natures,

original: de dang phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir gsal ba'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: because of mutual difference from it, it would be a manifest thing.

original: tha dad pa'i rang bzhin las gsal ba gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rang bzhin las gsal ba gzhan ni med do //
translated: There is no manifest thing that is different from a different nature.

original: gsal ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir gsal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir gsal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is manifest because it possesses manifestation,

original: gsal ba nyid ni spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba nyid ni spyi ma yin no //
translated: manifestation is not a universal.

original: de dang lhan cig mtshungs par 'gyur //üîΩde ni gsal bas gzhan min na //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig mtshungs par 'gyur // de ni gsal bas gzhan min na //
translated: If it is concomitant with that,üîΩit is not different from the manifest.

original: khyab pa nyid min thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid min thal bar 'gyur //
translated: If it is not all-pervading, it follows that

original: rang bzhin @227a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin @227a * //
translated: it is not the nature of all.

original: gnyis su rtogs na yang //
analyzed: gnyis su rtogs na yang //
translated: If you think that it has two natures,

original: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur //
translated: the same consequence as before follows.

original: de'i phyir gsal ba rnams kyi gshis ni tha dad pa nyid yin te des na gsal ba nyid yin na de spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsal ba rnams kyi gshis ni tha dad pa nyid yin te des na gsal ba nyid yin na de spyi ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the manifest is different, and thus if it is manifest, it is not a universal.

original: 'on te spyi dang ldan pas spyi yin na de la spyi gzhan yod pa des na de rang nyid spyi dang ldan pa yin gyi spyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te spyi dang ldan pas spyi yin na de la spyi gzhan yod pa des na de rang nyid spyi dang ldan pa yin gyi spyi ni ma yin no //
translated: But if you say that it is a universal because it possesses a universal, then since it has another universal, it possesses a universal itself, but it is not a universal.

original: spyi dang ldan pa nyid ni spyir 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi dang ldan pa nyid ni spyir 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Possessing a universal does not become a universal.

original: des na spyi'i rang bzhin gnyis la mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni blor mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na spyi'i rang bzhin gnyis la mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni blor mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to say that the nature of a universal is similar to that of two universals.

original: des ni gsal ba la ma yin no //
analyzed: des ni gsal ba la ma yin no //
translated: But it is not so for the manifest.

original: de ni spyi dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni spyi dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not a universal,

original: spyi'i rang bzhin tha dad pas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin tha dad pas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of a universal is different and is obstructed.

original: 'on te khyad par dang spyi tha dad pa dag kyang rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa yin la rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa ma yin pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par dang spyi tha dad pa dag kyang rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa yin la rang bzhin 'gas ni tha dad pa ma yin pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if a particular and a universal are different, they are not different by some nature, and they are not not different by some nature.

original: de dag gi tha dad pa la yang spyi gzhan 'phe bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gi tha dad pa la yang spyi gzhan 'phe bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if they are different, another universal would be required for their difference.

original: de lta yin dang spyi'i rang bzhin dag gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de lta yin dang spyi'i rang bzhin dag gsal ba nyid do //
translated: In that case, the nature of a universal would be a manifestation.

original: des na spyi snga ma dag ni mtshungs pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na spyi snga ma dag ni mtshungs pa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the former universal would not be a universal,

original: spyi dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not possess a universal.

original: des na gcig kyang spyi dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na gcig kyang spyi dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because it does not possess a universal, it is not a universal.

original: des na mtshungs pa'i rnam pa 'di dngos po dang mi ldan pa'i rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na mtshungs pa'i rnam pa 'di dngos po dang mi ldan pa'i rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this type of sameness is a conception that does not possess an object.

original: nges pa med par smra ba rnams kyi spyi dag ni brjod pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa'i spyod yul thams cad ni gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: nges pa med par smra ba rnams kyi spyi dag ni brjod pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa'i spyod yul thams cad ni gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The universals of the non-Buddhist philosophers are not the objects of cognition, because they are not perceived.

original: rdzogs pa yod kyang gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa yod kyang gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The universals of the Buddhists are not the objects of cognition, because they are not different from the particulars.

original: de las spyi gzhan mi 'dod na ni snga ma la yang mi srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las spyi gzhan mi 'dod na ni snga ma la yang mi srid pa ma yin no //
translated: If you do not accept that the universal is different from the particular, then it is not impossible that the universal exists in the prior moment.

original: tha ma spyi nyid yin na ni de las tha mi dad pas snga ma yang yin pa'i phyir snga ma dag spyi yin par 'gyur ba de'i phyir spyi'i blo dmigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba zhig na ;
analyzed: tha ma spyi nyid yin na ni de las tha mi dad pas snga ma yang yin pa'i phyir snga ma dag spyi yin par 'gyur ba de'i phyir spyi'i blo dmigs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba zhig na ;
translated: If the final moment is a universal, then because it is not different from the universal, the prior moments are also universals. Therefore, the cognition of a universal would have an object.

original: de lta yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: des 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: des 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Therefore, this is not a universal.

original: de bzhin du gal te tha dad pa rnams kyi tha dad pa yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te tha dad pa rnams kyi tha dad pa yang /
translated: In the same way, if the difference of different things

original: tha dad pa tha dad pa thams cad khyab pa yin na /
analyzed: tha dad pa tha dad pa thams cad khyab pa yin na /
translated: is a universal that pervades all differences,

original: de'i phyir phan tshun tha dad pa med pa rnams tha dad pa dang ldan yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir phan tshun tha dad pa med pa rnams tha dad pa dang ldan yang /
translated: then even though they are mutually different, they would not be different.

original: de dang ldan pa dag tha dad tha mi dad pa gsal bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa dag tha dad tha mi dad pa gsal bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that which possesses the universal and the universal itself are not clearly manifest as either different or non-different,

original: thams cad tha mi dad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad tha mi dad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then everything would be non-different.

original: spyi de dang ldan pa tha dad do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi de dang ldan pa tha dad do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that the universal and that which possesses the universal are different, that is not so.

original: gsal ba tha dad pa med na spyi yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba tha dad pa med na spyi yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the particulars are not different, then the universal does not exist,

original: de ni gsal ba nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni gsal ba nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: because it would be a particular itself.

original: de yang rang las tha dad pa med pa yin pa'i phyir des na gnyis med par thal lo //
analyzed: de yang rang las tha dad pa med pa yin pa'i phyir des na gnyis med par thal lo //
translated: And that is not different from itself, so it follows that there are not two.

original: de'i phyir ldog pa nyid spyi @227b yin no //üîΩgal te ldog pa tha dad pa med pa ji ltar rigs mi mthun pa las yin pa de bzhin du rigs mthun par 'dod pa las kyang yin pas de ji ltar rigs mi mthun pa nyid las ldog pa bkar te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ldog pa nyid spyi @227b yin no // gal te ldog pa tha dad pa med pa ji ltar rigs mi mthun pa las yin pa de bzhin du rigs mthun par 'dod pa las kyang yin pas de ji ltar rigs mi mthun pa nyid las ldog pa bkar te /
translated: Therefore the exclusion itself is the universal.

original: rtogs par nus she na /
analyzed: rtogs par nus she na /
translated: If the exclusion is not different, then just as it is from what is dissimilar, so it is from what is similar, as you assert. How then can the exclusion be understood as being from what is dissimilar?

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: That is true.

original: gal te rtogs pa thams cad ni //üîΩrang gi ngo bor zin 'gyur na //
analyzed: gal te rtogs pa thams cad ni // rang gi ngo bor zin 'gyur na //
translated: If all understandingüîΩis grasped as its own nature,

original: tha dad med par rnam phye nas //
analyzed: tha dad med par rnam phye nas //
translated: then, having been distinguished as non-different,

original: ji ltar yang ni rtogs mi nus //
analyzed: ji ltar yang ni rtogs mi nus //
translated: But it is not possible to understand it in any way.

original: gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe /
translated: When

original: 'jig rten gnas pa'i tha snyad ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten gnas pa'i tha snyad ni //
translated: the conventional existence of the world

original: 'khrul tsam las kyang thob 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'khrul tsam las kyang thob 'gyur ba //
translated: is obtained even from mere error,

original: de tshe tha dad de srid ba //
analyzed: de tshe tha dad de srid ba //
translated: then, if it is possible that it is different,

original: tha dad med pa dmigs kyis 'gar //
analyzed: tha dad med pa dmigs kyis 'gar //
translated: it is not different, because it is observed.

original: yul thag ring po na 'dug pa'i tho yor la tha dad pa yod kyang rtogs par mi nus te /
analyzed: yul thag ring po na 'dug pa'i tho yor la tha dad pa yod kyang rtogs par mi nus te /
translated: Even though a scarecrow in a field is different, it cannot be understood as such,

original: der dbyibs tsam zhig rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der dbyibs tsam zhig rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because only its shape is perceived.

original: khyad par spangs pa'i dbyibs tsam srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par spangs pa'i dbyibs tsam srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible for a mere shape to exist without distinctions,

original: yul thag ring ba nyid kyis de mi snang ba yin no //
analyzed: yul thag ring ba nyid kyis de mi snang ba yin no //
translated: because it does not appear due to the distance of the object.

original: thams cad du snang ba tsam mtshungs pa skye ba'i phyir de nyid gsal ba las tha dad pa'i spyi yin par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: thams cad du snang ba tsam mtshungs pa skye ba'i phyir de nyid gsal ba las tha dad pa'i spyi yin par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Because the mere appearance is the same in all cases, it would be a universal that is different from the individual.

original: / snang ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba gcig tu byed pas de nyid tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur gyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: / snang ba dang rnam par brtag par bya ba gcig tu byed pas de nyid tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur gyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: By making the appearance and the object of conceptualization one, they become conventionally different and non-different, because of being different and non-different, but not ultimately.

original: don dam pa nyid du ci'i phyir tha dad par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: don dam pa nyid du ci'i phyir tha dad par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why do they not become different ultimately?

original: gcig tu byed pa'i rtogs pa la gnyis snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig tu byed pa'i rtogs pa la gnyis snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in the realization of their oneness, there is no appearance of duality.

original: 'o na ni tha dad pa don dam pa par 'gyur te spyi nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni tha dad pa don dam pa par 'gyur te spyi nyid snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Well, then, they become ultimately different, because the universal itself appears.

original: gang zhig tha dad par snang ba de ni tha dad pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig tha dad par snang ba de ni tha dad pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: But that which appears as different is just different.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,üîΩbecause:

original: 'di ltar / gsal dang 'brel med rang bzhin du //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gsal dang 'brel med rang bzhin du //
translated: The appearance of a nature not related to manifestation

original: snang ba de ni der mi 'gyur //
analyzed: snang ba de ni der mi 'gyur //
translated: does not occur in that way.

original: yan 'gar ba yi spyi nyid ni //
analyzed: yan 'gar ba yi spyi nyid ni //
translated: The universal of the Vai≈õe·π£ikas

original: spyi min gsal ba'i rang bzhin bzhin //
analyzed: spyi min gsal ba'i rang bzhin bzhin //
translated: is not a universal, like the nature of manifestation.

original: 'on te spyi nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig kyang spyi yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te spyi nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig kyang spyi yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if a universal is a universal because it possesses a universal, then even a single individual would be a universal.

original: de yang mi bzang ste /
analyzed: de yang mi bzang ste /
translated: That is not good.

original: spyi gzhan dang ni ldan pas na //
analyzed: spyi gzhan dang ni ldan pas na //
translated: Because it possesses another universal,

original: spyi rnams spyi nyid yin na ni //
analyzed: spyi rnams spyi nyid yin na ni //
translated: if a universal is a universal because it is a universal,

original: gsal bar de las snga rol gyi //
analyzed: gsal bar de las snga rol gyi //
translated: then the universal that exists prior to the individual

original: spyi ni gsal ba nyid du 'gyur //üîΩ'o na ni 'khrul pa'i rtogs pa nyid spyi yin te /
analyzed: spyi ni gsal ba nyid du 'gyur // 'o na ni 'khrul pa'i rtogs pa nyid spyi yin te /
translated: would become an individual.

original: de ni gsal ba rnams kyis mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni gsal ba rnams kyis mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But a mistaken conception is a universal because it is similar to the individuals.

original: 'o na gsal ba la 'jug pa'am rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na gsal ba la 'jug pa'am rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Then it would not engage or understand an individual.

original: blos 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pas ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang de la 'jug par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: blos 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pas ni gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang de la 'jug par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not logical that the nature of an understanding that is mistaken engages or understands the nature of an individual,

original: thal ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thal ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is absurd.

original: @228a * // 'khrul pas 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: @228a * // 'khrul pas 'jug go zhe na /
translated: But it engages through error.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: 'khrul pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other error.

original: de'i tshe yang rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir gsal bar rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir gsal bar rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Even at that time, it does not understand an individual because it understands its own nature.

original: des na 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan khas len pa thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi rtogs pa nyid pas 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa gzhan dang gzhan khas len pa thug pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi rtogs pa nyid pas 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Therefore, since it would be endless to accept one error after another, this is just a waste of time.

original: gal te tha dad pa dang cig shos kyi spyi dang ldan pa ma yin /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa dang cig shos kyi spyi dang ldan pa ma yin /
translated: If it is not endowed with the universals of difference and nondifference,

original: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du ma yin /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du ma yin /
translated: it is not of the nature of both,

original: blos 'khrul pa nyid kyis ma yin la /
analyzed: blos 'khrul pa nyid kyis ma yin la /
translated: it is not due to the error of cognition,

original: gsal ba rtogs pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: gsal ba rtogs pa yang ma yin na /
translated: and it is not the realization of manifestation,

original: 'o na ji ltar sgra dang rtags dag las don rtogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar sgra dang rtags dag las don rtogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur zhe na /
translated: then how can it be the means of realizing an object from a word or a sign?

original: 'os gzhan med phyir rnam gcod kyi //
analyzed: 'os gzhan med phyir rnam gcod kyi //
translated: Since there is no other option,

original: 'bras bu sgra las don rtogs pa'i //
analyzed: 'bras bu sgra las don rtogs pa'i //
translated: the result is that the means of realizing an object from a word

original: thabs yin gzhan du 'gyur ba yi //
analyzed: thabs yin gzhan du 'gyur ba yi //
translated: is the exclusion of other.

original: tshul ni ci zhig yod par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshul ni ci zhig yod par 'gyur //
translated: What other method could there be?

original: gal te 'os gzhan med pas ni dngos po rnam par 'jog pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'os gzhan med pas ni dngos po rnam par 'jog pa ma yin gyi /
translated: If you say that an entity is not posited because there is no other option,

original: 'on kyang tshad mas yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshad mas yin no //
translated: but rather by a valid cognition,

original: rnam par gcod pa rtogs par 'dzin pa'i tshad ma ni mi dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa rtogs par 'dzin pa'i tshad ma ni mi dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and the valid cognition that apprehends the realization of an exclusion is nonapprehension,

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: then we reply:

original: de las gzhan dag las ldog pa //
analyzed: de las gzhan dag las ldog pa //
translated: But it is the opposite of that in other things.

original: 'jug pa nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir //üîΩngag ni rnam gcod 'bras can zhes //
analyzed: 'jug pa nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir // ngag ni rnam gcod 'bras can zhes //
translated: Because it is observed to function in relation to that.üîΩWhy not accept that speech has the effect of exclusion?

original: ci phyir nges par 'dzin mi byed //
analyzed: ci phyir nges par 'dzin mi byed //
translated: Because it is observed to function in relation to that.

original: tha snyad pa de dag las gzhan rnam par gcad nas 'jug par dmigs so //
analyzed: tha snyad pa de dag las gzhan rnam par gcad nas 'jug par dmigs so //
translated: It is observed to function in relation to that, having excluded other things from that.

original: ma rtogs pa la ni 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa la ni 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not function in relation to what is not understood.

original: des na rnam par gcod par rtogs par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam par gcod par rtogs par nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained that it is understood through exclusion.

original: de ni mngon sum gyis gzhan dang ma 'dres par rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de ni mngon sum gyis gzhan dang ma 'dres par rtogs pa yin la /
translated: That is understood by perception as unmixed with other things.

original: rnam par rtog pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas kyang ngo //
translated: And by conception as well.

original: de mngon sum gyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin la gnas pa'i ldog pa nyid rtogs pa'i yul du byed la /
analyzed: de mngon sum gyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin la gnas pa'i ldog pa nyid rtogs pa'i yul du byed la /
translated: By perception, the mere exclusion that is based on the nature of things is made the object of understanding.

original: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams ni dngos po'i yul can ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: But conceptions do not have real things as their objects.

original: des na sgra dang rtogs pa'i yul ni ldog pa tsam kho na yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra dang rtogs pa'i yul ni ldog pa tsam kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of speech and conception is the mere exclusion.

original: gal te dngos po ma rtogs na ldog pa dum bur bkol te ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po ma rtogs na ldog pa dum bur bkol te ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If a thing is not understood, how can its exclusion be understood as a part?

original: 'di la 'di skad brjod de /
analyzed: 'di la 'di skad brjod de /
translated: This is what is said.

original: ldog pa'i 'brel pa yul rtogs pa'i spyod yul dngos po gang yin yod pa nyid /
analyzed: ldog pa'i 'brel pa yul rtogs pa'i spyod yul dngos po gang yin yod pa nyid /
translated: The object of the activity of the cognition of the relation of the reverse is existence.

original: bden dang bden pa min par khyad gzhan blo don ldan ba su zhig rtogs /
analyzed: bden dang bden pa min par khyad gzhan blo don ldan ba su zhig rtogs /
translated: What intelligent person would conceive of a difference between true and untrue in the object of the cognition?

original: ldog dang 'brel bar ji tsam gyis rtogs pa khyed la de tsam gyis chog mod /
analyzed: ldog dang 'brel bar ji tsam gyis rtogs pa khyed la de tsam gyis chog mod /
translated: You may be satisfied with just that much, with the cognition of the relation of the reverse.

original: gal te spyis sgos sgrub na bye brag de la yon tan ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gal te spyis sgos sgrub na bye brag de la yon tan ci zhig yod /
translated: But if the particular is established by the universal, what good quality does that particular have?

original: dngos po @228b tsam zhig med na rnam par gcod pa rtogs par mi nus pa de tsam zhig tha snyad pa rnams kyis dngos po grub pa la mthu yod pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po @228b tsam zhig med na rnam par gcod pa rtogs par mi nus pa de tsam zhig tha snyad pa rnams kyis dngos po grub pa la mthu yod pa yin no //
translated: If mere thing does not exist, then just that much, which is incapable of being cognized as an exclusion, is the power of existence of a thing for the nominalists.

original: bden pa'i dngos po dang 'brel pa nyid ni rnam par gcod par rtogs par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bden pa'i dngos po dang 'brel pa nyid ni rnam par gcod par rtogs par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: The relation of true thing itself is not capable of being cognized as an exclusion,

original: bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pas kyang de rtogs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pas kyang de rtogs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because even that which is not related to truth is seen to be cognized.

original: de'i phyir ngag ni rnam par gcod pa'i yul can nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngag ni rnam par gcod pa'i yul can nyid de /
translated: Therefore, speech is just the subject of an exclusion.

original: de la dngos po ni mi bden pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la dngos po ni mi bden pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the thing is not true.

original: gal te dngos po mi bden na de tha dad pa med pas de la gnas pa'i ldog pa yang ji ltar bden pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po mi bden na de tha dad pa med pas de la gnas pa'i ldog pa yang ji ltar bden pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: If the thing is not true, then since it is not different, how can the negation that resides in it be true?

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: rtogs bzhin du yang 'di mi bden//
analyzed: rtogs bzhin du yang 'di mi bden//
translated: Even though it is realized, it is not true.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di ci zhig yin //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di ci zhig yin //
translated: What is the meaning of this statement?

original: gal te slu bas bden min na //
analyzed: gal te slu bas bden min na //
translated: If it is not true because it is deceptive,

original: tha dad ci ste bden mi 'dod //
analyzed: tha dad ci ste bden mi 'dod //
translated: why do you not assert that the difference is not true?

original: rnam par gcod pa ma yin par smra ba la re zhig 'di 'dri bar bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa ma yin par smra ba la re zhig 'di 'dri bar bya ste /
translated: First, this should be asked of the one who advocates non-exclusion:

original: rtogs pa'i yul mi bden pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / gal te rtogs pa'i rang bzhin des ni yod pa nyid yin na ji ltar mi bden pa nyid yin /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i yul mi bden pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig / gal te rtogs pa'i rang bzhin des ni yod pa nyid yin na ji ltar mi bden pa nyid yin /
translated: What is this called ‚Äúthe object of realization is not true‚Äù? If it is true by the nature of being realized, how can it be untrue?

original: 'on te ma rtogs pas yin na /
analyzed: 'on te ma rtogs pas yin na /
translated: But if it is due to non-realization,

original: 'o na ni de'i tshe thams cad mi bden pa nyid do zhes bya ba mi bden pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na ni de'i tshe thams cad mi bden pa nyid do zhes bya ba mi bden pa nyid do //
translated: then at that time, all is untrue, so it is untrue.

original: bden pa 'ga' yang med do zhes gzhan gyis nye bar bkod pa ni /
analyzed: bden pa 'ga' yang med do zhes gzhan gyis nye bar bkod pa ni /
translated: Nothing is true at all.

original: bong bu'i 'o ma bskogs pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bong bu'i 'o ma bskogs pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be like the curdled milk of a donkey.

original: 'on te thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid med pa des na slu ba'i phyir mi bden pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid med pa des na slu ba'i phyir mi bden pa yin gyi /
translated: But if it is not the nature of something to be attained, then it is not true because it is deceptive.

original: rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni ma yin /
translated: It is not true by virtue of its own nature.

original: rang gi ngo bo yod kyang thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin don du gnyer ba yin pas de med na ni de mi bden pa kho na ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo yod kyang thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin don du gnyer ba yin pas de med na ni de mi bden pa kho na ste /
translated: Even though it has its own nature, it is sought as the nature of something to be attained. If it does not exist, then it is not true,

original: phyin ci log nges pa nyid ni mi bden pa yin pa yin no //
analyzed: phyin ci log nges pa nyid ni mi bden pa yin pa yin no //
translated: because the ascertainment of error is not true.

original: thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa gang yin pa ni phyin ci log gi rtogs pa las gzhan ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la thob par bya ba'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa gang yin pa ni phyin ci log gi rtogs pa las gzhan ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And the apprehension of the nature of something to be attained in what is not the nature of something to be attained is not different from the conception of what is unreal.

original: de ltar na ni 'o na rnam par gcod pa ni bden no zhes bya ba de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na ni 'o na rnam par gcod pa ni bden no zhes bya ba de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, then it is true that exclusion is true.üîΩIn this way,

original: 'di ltar / 'jug byed tha snyad pa dag gis //üîΩgzhan bcad pa ni thob pa na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'jug byed tha snyad pa dag gis // gzhan bcad pa ni thob pa na //
translated: the conventional that engagesüîΩin the attainment of the exclusion of other

original: rnam gcod dngos po min na ni //
analyzed: rnam gcod dngos po min na ni //
translated: is not a real thing.

original: bye brag gzhan 'dir don med do //
analyzed: bye brag gzhan 'dir don med do //
translated: The other distinctions are meaningless here.

original: gal te gang zhig thob par bya ba de bden pa yin na rnam par gcod pa bden pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gang zhig thob par bya ba de bden pa yin na rnam par gcod pa bden pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: If what is obtained is real, then the exclusion would be real,

original: de thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is obtained.

original: gal te des ni mi bden pa'i dngos po rnam par bcad pa rtogs pa yin na de ni thob pa ma yin te /üîΩbden pa'i dngos @229a * //
analyzed: gal te des ni mi bden pa'i dngos po rnam par bcad pa rtogs pa yin na de ni thob pa ma yin te / bden pa'i dngos @229a * //
translated: If it is understood that the unreal thing is excluded by that, then it is not obtained,üîΩbecause the exclusion of a real thing

original: po'i rnam par bcad pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: po'i rnam par bcad pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is understood.

original: gzhan rtogs pa na gzhan thob pa ni slu ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan rtogs pa na gzhan thob pa ni slu ba ma yin te /
translated: When one thing is understood, the obtainment of another is not deceptive.

original: des na rnam par gcod pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des na rnam par gcod pa bden par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: So how could the exclusion be real?

original: gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gnas ma yin pa yin pa la brten pa'i brgal ba 'di ci zhig yin /
analyzed: gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gnas ma yin pa yin pa la brten pa'i brgal ba 'di ci zhig yin /
translated: What is the point of this argument that is based on the non-basis of the non-adherence?

original: re zhig tha dad pa ni thob pa yin la de tsam gyis kyang tha snyad pa chog par 'dzin to //
analyzed: re zhig tha dad pa ni thob pa yin la de tsam gyis kyang tha snyad pa chog par 'dzin to //
translated: Adherence is the obtainment of the different, and that is enough for the conventional.

original: gang gis rnam par gcod pa'i dbye bas nges par gzung ba'i slu ba dang 'brel par 'gyur ba de thob par 'dzin pa'i tha snyad pa dag ni tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan dbye ba nges par bzod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis rnam par gcod pa'i dbye bas nges par gzung ba'i slu ba dang 'brel par 'gyur ba de thob par 'dzin pa'i tha snyad pa dag ni tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan dbye ba nges par bzod pa ma yin no //
translated: The conventionalists who hold that nondeception is related to the ascertainment by the process of elimination do not accept the ascertainment of the difference of one thing from another.üîΩTherefore:

original: de'i phyir / mi slu ba ni tha snyad pa'i ;
analyzed: de'i phyir / mi slu ba ni tha snyad pa'i ;
translated: Nondeception is said to be

original: / skye bo'i rtogs pas brjod pa yin //
analyzed: / skye bo'i rtogs pas brjod pa yin //
translated: the understanding of the conventional person.

original: don dam par ni rnam dpyad na //
analyzed: don dam par ni rnam dpyad na //
translated: But when one analyzes the ultimate,

original: mi slu de nyid du yod min //
analyzed: mi slu de nyid du yod min //
translated: nondeception does not exist in reality.

original: 'di ni brjod zin te /
analyzed: 'di ni brjod zin te /
translated: This has already been explained.

original: ldog pa'i yul can gyi tshad ma ni kun tu tha snyad pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa'i yul can gyi tshad ma ni kun tu tha snyad pa kho na yin te /
translated: A valid cognition that has an object of elimination is only a conventional valid cognition.

original: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has been explained that ‚Äúvalid cognition is only conventional.‚Äù

original: gal te tshad mas tshad ma rtogs na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te tshad mas tshad ma rtogs na ni thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If valid cognition were to understand valid cognition, there would be an infinite regress.

original: tshad ma med par rtogs na ni gzhal bya yang yin pas gzhal bya rtogs pas tshad ma la rag ma las par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med par rtogs na ni gzhal bya yang yin pas gzhal bya rtogs pas tshad ma la rag ma las par 'gyur ro //
translated: If valid cognition were understood without valid cognition, then it would be an object of comprehension. Therefore, the understanding of the object of comprehension would not depend on valid cognition.

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: tshad ma nyid ni tha snyad kyis //üîΩrtogs 'gyur de nyid du ma yin //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid ni tha snyad kyis // rtogs 'gyur de nyid du ma yin //
translated: Valid cognition is conventional,üîΩnot ultimate.

original: tshad ma'i blo ni de nyid min //
analyzed: tshad ma'i blo ni de nyid min //
translated: The cognition of valid cognition is not ultimate,

original: de lta yin na thug med brjod //
analyzed: de lta yin na thug med brjod //
translated: otherwise, there would be an infinite regress.

original: gang phyir de la'ang rnam dpyad na //
analyzed: gang phyir de la'ang rnam dpyad na //
translated: If you analyze that,

original: gal te tha snyad tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: gal te tha snyad tshad ma nyid //
translated: if valid cognition is conventional,

original: yin na thug pa med par brjod //
analyzed: yin na thug pa med par brjod //
translated: then there would be an infinite regress.

original: tshad ma med par rtogs na ni //
analyzed: tshad ma med par rtogs na ni //
translated: If you understand that there is no valid cognition,

original: gzhal bya la yang de ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhal bya la yang de ltar 'gyur //
translated: then that would be the case with regard to the objects of cognition.

original: tshad ma med par thams cad ni //
analyzed: tshad ma med par thams cad ni //
translated: If everything were established without valid cognition,

original: grub phyir tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: grub phyir tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: then the definition of valid cognition

original: don med nyid 'gyur de yi phyir //
analyzed: don med nyid 'gyur de yi phyir //
translated: would be meaningless.

original: 'di ni 'brel ba ma yin na //
analyzed: 'di ni 'brel ba ma yin na //
translated: Therefore, this is not a connection.

original: de'i phyir mi slu ba ni thams cad du //üîΩde kho na zhib mo ma dpyad par tha snyad tsam du brten nas yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi slu ba ni thams cad du // de kho na zhib mo ma dpyad par tha snyad tsam du brten nas yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, nondeceptiveness is in all cases

original: don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: based on mere convention without analysis, not ultimately.üîΩIt is like this:üîΩHere is a river, here is a tiger.

original: 'di ltar / 'di nas chu klung 'di nas stag / srog chags gang gis 'gro bar 'gyur //üîΩtha dad tha mi dad gnyi gar //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di nas chu klung 'di nas stag / srog chags gang gis 'gro bar 'gyur // tha dad tha mi dad gnyi gar //
translated: By what living being is this traversed?üîΩNondeceptiveness is not tenable

original: mi slu ba ni 'thad ma yin //
analyzed: mi slu ba ni 'thad ma yin //
translated: as either different or nondifferent.

original: gal te rtogs pa las gzhan pa'i dngos po thob na ji ltar gzhan thob pas slu ba'am mi slu ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te rtogs pa las gzhan pa'i dngos po thob na ji ltar gzhan thob pas slu ba'am mi slu ba yin no //
translated: If one obtains a thing that is different from the cognition, how could one be deceived or undeceived by obtaining something else?

original: 'on te bdag nyid thams cad kyis tha mi dad pa yin na de lta yin na de yang de'i tshe nyid rtogs pas ci'i don du 'jug pa'am ci zhig thob par byar yod /
analyzed: 'on te bdag nyid thams cad kyis tha mi dad pa yin na de lta yin na de yang de'i tshe nyid rtogs pas ci'i don du 'jug pa'am ci zhig thob par byar yod /
translated: But if it is not different in all respects, then at that time it is already cognized. What is the point of engaging in it? What is there to obtain?

original: des na slu ba nyid ma yin pas 'di @229b ni gcig nas ni stag yod la /
analyzed: des na slu ba nyid ma yin pas 'di @229b ni gcig nas ni stag yod la /
translated: Therefore, since it is not deceptive, it is not like a mirage.

original: gcig nas ni chu klung gis chod pa'i tshul du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig nas ni chu klung gis chod pa'i tshul du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not like a place where there is a tiger in one place and a river in another.üîΩTherefore:

original: de'i phyir / ngag ni rnam gcod 'bras can te //
analyzed: de'i phyir / ngag ni rnam gcod 'bras can te //
translated: Speech has the result of exclusion,

original: 'gar yang dngos po'i yul can min //
analyzed: 'gar yang dngos po'i yul can min //
translated: it is never about a real object.

original: kho na'i sgra sbyar med na yang //
analyzed: kho na'i sgra sbyar med na yang //
translated: Even without the word ‚Äúonly,‚Äù

original: tshig rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshig rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: it is understood by the words.

original: 'di ni re zhig gzhag go //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig gzhag go //
translated: This is for the time being set aside.

original: ci 'ga' zhig tu de ltar mthong ba yod dam zhe na /üîΩnag pa 'phong skyen no //
analyzed: ci 'ga' zhig tu de ltar mthong ba yod dam zhe na / nag pa 'phong skyen no //
translated: Is there any such perception?üîΩBalabhadra is skilled in archery.

original: srid sgrub 'phong skyen no //
analyzed: srid sgrub 'phong skyen no //
translated: Arjuna is skilled in archery.

original: padma sngon por 'gyur ro zhes khyad par dang / khyad par gyi gzhi dang / bya ba rnams la sbyar ba na mthong ba nyid do //üîΩkhyad par la nges par bzung na ni gzhan dang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod la khyad par can la nges par bzung na ni gzhan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: padma sngon por 'gyur ro zhes khyad par dang / khyad par gyi gzhi dang / bya ba rnams la sbyar ba na mthong ba nyid do // khyad par la nges par bzung na ni gzhan dang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod la khyad par can la nges par bzung na ni gzhan dang ldan pa /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used in the phrase ‚Äúthe eye sense-faculty only sees‚Äù in order to specify the action of seeing, in order to specify the basis of the distinction, and in order to specify the distinction itself.üîΩWhen the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù specifies the action, it excludes the possession of another action; when it specifies the basis of the distinction, it excludes the possession of another basis of the distinction; when it specifies the distinction itself, it excludes the possession of another distinction.

original: bya ba la nges par bzung na ni shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir tha dad do //
analyzed: bya ba la nges par bzung na ni shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir tha dad do //
translated: Thus, the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used in order to exclude the possession of another action, another basis of the distinction, and another distinction.

original: sbyor ba med par ji ltar nges par bzung ba'i khyad par nges she na /
analyzed: sbyor ba med par ji ltar nges par bzung ba'i khyad par nges she na /
translated: How can one be certain of the distinction that is intended, if the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not used?

original: skabs dang brjod par 'dod pa dang / khyad par dag las so //
analyzed: skabs dang brjod par 'dod pa dang / khyad par dag las so //
translated: The distinction is understood from the context, from what is intended to be said, and from the distinction itself.

original: gal te ji ltar srid sgrub nyid 'phong skyen no zhes khyad par can dang lhan cig nges par gzung bas khyad par can gzhan rnam bar gcod pa de bzhin du khyad par dang lhan cig pas kyang khyad par gzhan rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te ji ltar srid sgrub nyid 'phong skyen no zhes khyad par can dang lhan cig nges par gzung bas khyad par can gzhan rnam bar gcod pa de bzhin du khyad par dang lhan cig pas kyang khyad par gzhan rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used in order to specify the distinction itself, as in the phrase ‚ÄúArjuna is the only archer,‚Äù then the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù should also be used in order to specify the basis of the distinction, as in the phrase ‚ÄúArjuna is the only one who is an archer.‚Äù

original: des na nag pa 'phong skyen pa nyid do zhes bya bas yon tan thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: des na nag pa 'phong skyen pa nyid do zhes bya bas yon tan thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, when one says, ‚ÄúBlack is a skilled archer,‚Äù all other qualities are excluded.

original: de lta na ni 'thad pa ma yin la //
analyzed: de lta na ni 'thad pa ma yin la //
translated: But that is not tenable.

original: mi ldan pa dang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa dag bye brag kyang med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: mi ldan pa dang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa dag bye brag kyang med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And there is no difference between the exclusion of nonpossession and the exclusion of possession.

original: de ni bden mod kyi /üîΩde yang zla bo rnam gcod pa //
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi / de yang zla bo rnam gcod pa //
translated: That is true, butüîΩthe exclusion of the other is understood

original: don rnams la ni rtogs 'gyur te //
analyzed: don rnams la ni rtogs 'gyur te //
translated: in regard to the meaning of the words.üîΩThus, the word is applied in accordance with the desire to express

original: de ltar grags dang nus pa dang // sgra ni brjod 'dod rjes 'brad phyir //üîΩde la gal te gang gi tshe 'di 'phong skyen nam /
analyzed: de ltar grags dang nus pa dang // sgra ni brjod 'dod rjes 'brad phyir // de la gal te gang gi tshe 'di 'phong skyen nam /
translated: and the capacity of the word.

original: 'on te mi skyen zhes 'phong skyen par the tshom za ba'i skabs su nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes sbyar ba de'i tshe de nyid the tshom gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'phongs mi skyen pa kho na rnam par gcod do //
analyzed: 'on te mi skyen zhes 'phong skyen par the tshom za ba'i skabs su nag pa 'phong skyen no zhes sbyar ba de'i tshe de nyid the tshom gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir 'phongs mi skyen pa kho na rnam par gcod do //
translated: In that regard, if one is uncertain whether or not someone is a skilled archer, when one says, ‚ÄúBlack is a skilled archer,‚Äù then at that time, because it eliminates that uncertainty, it excludes only one who is not a skilled archer.

original: de lta ma yin na nyan pa po 'byang ba med pa smra ba ni smra ba po nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na nyan pa po 'byang ba med pa smra ba ni smra ba po nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, if the listener were not to understand the exclusion of the opposite, then the speaker would not be a speaker.

original: des na bzlog pa'i zla bo rnam par gcod pa nyid rtogs kyi /
analyzed: des na bzlog pa'i zla bo rnam par gcod pa nyid rtogs kyi /
translated: Therefore, the opposite of the reversed object is understood as the exclusion.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not anything else.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngag de la yang gal te srod sgrib dang rma can gnyis 'phong skyen zhes so sor nges pa'i bzlog zla'i skabs yin na ni srid sgrub nyid 'phong skyen no zhes de las rna can nyid rnam par @230aüîΩ* // gcod kyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngag de la yang gal te srod sgrib dang rma can gnyis 'phong skyen zhes so sor nges pa'i bzlog zla'i skabs yin na ni srid sgrub nyid 'phong skyen no zhes de las rna can nyid rnam par @230a * // gcod kyi /
translated: Similarly, in the case of a statement that excludes something else, if the context is the opposite of the reversed object, such as ‚ÄúSrid-pa and Rma-bya are archers,‚Äù then ‚ÄúSrid-pa is an archer‚Äù excludes Rma-bya.

original: ra ma la sogs pa ni rnam par gcod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ra ma la sogs pa ni rnam par gcod pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not exclude goats and so forth.

original: de bzhin du mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa la yang gal te ci yon tan gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhes bya ba'i skabs su yin na ni de'i tshe ni nag pa ni 'phong skyen pa nyid kyi khams pa la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes
analyzed: de bzhin du mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa la yang gal te ci yon tan gzhan dag kyang yod dam zhes bya ba'i skabs su yin na ni de'i tshe ni nag pa ni 'phong skyen pa nyid kyi khams pa la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes
translated: Similarly, in the case of the exclusion of the non-endowed, if the context is ‚ÄúDo they have other qualities?‚Äù then ‚ÄúNga-pa is an archer, but Khams-pa and so forth are not.‚Äù

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i yon tan mtha' dag rnam par gcod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i yon tan mtha' dag rnam par gcod pa nyid do //
translated: It is the very exclusion of all other qualities that are not in error.

original: srid sgrub spyod pa na yang /
analyzed: srid sgrub spyod pa na yang /
translated: When Arjuna was practicing archery,

original: gal te spyi 'gro ba na 'phong skyen pa gzhan yang yod dam zhes skabs su yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te spyi 'gro ba na 'phong skyen pa gzhan yang yod dam zhes skabs su yin na ni /
translated: he asked, ‚ÄúAre there any other archers who are as skilled as I am?‚Äù

original: the tshom za ba'i skabs su bab pa de'i tshe khyad par dang ldan pa gzhan mtha' dag rnam par gcod pa nyid de /
analyzed: the tshom za ba'i skabs su bab pa de'i tshe khyad par dang ldan pa gzhan mtha' dag rnam par gcod pa nyid de /
translated: When he had doubts, he excluded all others who were superior to him,

original: de'i tshe skabs kyis thams cad bzlog zlar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe skabs kyis thams cad bzlog zlar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because at that time, by implication, all others were excluded.

original: des na mi ldan rnam gcod pas //üîΩchos can chos kyi khyad par yin //
analyzed: des na mi ldan rnam gcod pas // chos can chos kyi khyad par yin //
translated: Therefore, the exclusion of what is not the caseüîΩis the particular quality of the subject.

original: de yi khyad par can gyi chos //
analyzed: de yi khyad par can gyi chos //
translated: The quality that is particular to it

original: rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon rten min //
analyzed: rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon rten min //
translated: is not the basis for the fault of not being concomitant.

original: chos de gzhan dang ldan par 'grub pas de dang ma 'brel pa nyid du rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: chos de gzhan dang ldan par 'grub pas de dang ma 'brel pa nyid du rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Because it is established that that quality is possessed by others, it is understood that it is not related to it.

original: des na de bstan pas gzhan rnam par gcod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon med do //
analyzed: des na de bstan pas gzhan rnam par gcod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, because it is taught that it excludes others, there is no fault of not being concomitant.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni phyogs kyi chos nyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni de lta bur gyur pa nyid du grags pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni phyogs kyi chos nyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni de lta bur gyur pa nyid du grags pa nyid de /
translated: Thus, this is the property of the position.

original: ma 'brel pa bzlog zlar yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan dang ldan pa ni bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'brel pa bzlog zlar yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan dang ldan pa ni bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is well known to be just as it is, because it is the opposite of what is not related and because it is the opposite of what is related to something else.

original: don 'di rtogs par nus pa'i yang phyir te /
analyzed: don 'di rtogs par nus pa'i yang phyir te /
translated: And it is also because this meaning can be understood.

original: gzhan dang ldan par grub pa der nges par gzung ba ni de nyid la 'bab pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan par grub pa der nges par gzung ba ni de nyid la 'bab pa ma yin te /
translated: When something is established as related to something else, it is not necessarily grasped as just that,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is contradictory.

original: the tshom du gyur pa bsgrub pa 'am sel ba yin gyi /
analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa bsgrub pa 'am sel ba yin gyi /
translated: It is either the establishment or the elimination of what is doubtful.

original: grub pa dang 'gag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa dang 'gag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the establishment or the elimination of what is already established.

original: bzlog pa'i zla bo dang / de bzhin du sgra dag ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir de lta bu nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i zla bo dang / de bzhin du sgra dag ni brjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir de lta bu nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The opposite of the opposite and the opposite of the opposite of that are the same, because the words follow the desire to express.

original: brjod par 'dod pa ni gzhan yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa ni gzhan yin te /
translated: The desire to express is different,

original: sgra ni gzhan du bstan par nus pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni gzhan du bstan par nus pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but the words cannot be taught as different.

original: sgra ni sgron ma bzhin du ngo bo nyid kyis rtogs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: sgra ni sgron ma bzhin du ngo bo nyid kyis rtogs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: Sound does not reveal its own nature, like a lamp.

original: gal te 'phong skyen pa ni srid sgrub kho na'o zhes khyad par dang lhan cig nges par gzung yang gzhan dang ldan pa nyid rnam par gcod kyi mi ldan pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir skabs dang 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'phong skyen pa ni srid sgrub kho na'o zhes khyad par dang lhan cig nges par gzung yang gzhan dang ldan pa nyid rnam par gcod kyi mi ldan pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir skabs dang 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that although the archer is specified as being only Arjuna, the exclusion of possession by another is not the exclusion of non-possession, so it contradicts the context,

original: 'gal ba med de /
analyzed: 'gal ba med de /
translated: there is no contradiction.

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩgal te sgra yis srid sgrub nyid //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / gal te sgra yis srid sgrub nyid //
translated: Because:

original: khyad par du ni bstan na yang //üîΩde la de ni dam pa yi //
analyzed: khyad par du ni bstan na yang // de la de ni dam pa yi //
translated: Even if sound specifies Arjuna alone,üîΩthat is not the ultimate meaning

original: @230b don du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: @230b don du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: in that case.

original: khyad par 'dir yon tan gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir brten par gyur pa'i chos la brjod do //
analyzed: khyad par 'dir yon tan gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir brten par gyur pa'i chos la brjod do //
translated: Here, the term quality is used for a property that is dependent, because it is a real entity.

original: don dam par na srid sgrub nyid rten yin pa'i phyir khyad par can nyid do //üîΩdngos po'i tshul yang gzhan yin la //
analyzed: don dam par na srid sgrub nyid rten yin pa'i phyir khyad par can nyid do // dngos po'i tshul yang gzhan yin la //
translated: Ultimately, Arjuna is the basis, so he is the qualified.üîΩThe mode of entities is one,

original: sgra'i tshul yang gzhan yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i tshul yang gzhan yin no //
translated: the mode of words is another.

original: 'dir ni skabs kyi dngos po'i chos gzung pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: 'dir ni skabs kyi dngos po'i chos gzung pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: But here, since the property of the subject is being specified, there is no fault.

original: 'dir ni nges par gzung ba'i don rnam par gcod pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa rnam par phye nas rtogs pa'i phyir mi rtogs pa'i skyon med do //
analyzed: 'dir ni nges par gzung ba'i don rnam par gcod pa'i rang bzhin ni mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa rnam par phye nas rtogs pa'i phyir mi rtogs pa'i skyon med do //
translated: And here, since the nature of the exclusion of the object of ascertainment is understood by distinguishing direct perception and inference, there is no fault of non-understanding.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par yin na ni gcig de ltar gyur pa na gzhan de ltar ma yin par 'gyur la khyad par dang khyad par can dang ldan pa'i tshig phrad kyang khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par yin na ni gcig de ltar gyur pa na gzhan de ltar ma yin par 'gyur la khyad par dang khyad par can dang ldan pa'i tshig phrad kyang khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were a distinction by excluding what is other, then when one is so, the other would not be so, and the words distinguished and distinctive would be without distinction.

original: gal te byas pa nyid phyogs nyid kyi chos yin na /
analyzed: gal te byas pa nyid phyogs nyid kyi chos yin na /
translated: If being produced were the property of the subject itself,

original: de las gzhan mtha' dag ma byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gzhan du ba dang mi ldan par 'gyur bas de de ltar mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan mtha' dag ma byas pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gzhan du ba dang mi ldan par 'gyur bas de de ltar mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then everything else would be non-produced, and the place other than that would not have smoke, so it would contradict both direct perception and inference.

original: mngon sum gyis ni du ba gzhan du rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni du ba gzhan du rtogs pa yin la /
translated: It is directly perceived that smoke is elsewhere.

original: byas pa nyid kyang rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa'am mngon sum las gzhan la rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyang rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa'am mngon sum las gzhan la rtogs pa yin no //
translated: And it is inferred that being produced is different due to the difference of conditions, and so on.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi grags pa las kyang khyad par la sogs pa dang lhan cig spyod pa'i nges par gzung ba'i don can tshig phrad dang / ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa la sogs pa de'i don dag brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po'am gzhan dag rtogs pa'i phyir de la ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi grags pa las kyang khyad par la sogs pa dang lhan cig spyod pa'i nges par gzung ba'i don can tshig phrad dang / ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa la sogs pa de'i don dag brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po'am gzhan dag rtogs pa'i phyir de la ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur /
translated: Even from the perspective of the world, which has the character of inference, the meaning of the words that are used to express the concomitance of the reason and the predicate, such as ‚Äúthe property of the subject,‚Äù is ascertained in dependence on the words themselves. The words are used to eliminate the possibility of other meanings, such as the meaning of the words being unrelated. Therefore, how could the meaning of the words be different from what is expressed by the words?

original: de ltar de ni phyogs chos zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'i don bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar de ni phyogs chos zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'i don bshad pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the meaning of the compound ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù has been explained.

original: tha dad pa dang 'brel pa 'am tha dad pa dang 'brel pa dag bsdu ba dang / ngag gi don yin no zhes bye brag tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang 'brel pa 'am tha dad pa dang 'brel pa dag bsdu ba dang / ngag gi don yin no zhes bye brag tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are included in the distinct and the related, and because they are understood as the meaning of the words.

original: gal te phyogs kyi chos yin mod //
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi chos yin mod //
translated: If it is a property of the position,

original: de rnam pa dgur go slob dpon gyis ci ste bstan te /
analyzed: de rnam pa dgur go slob dpon gyis ci ste bstan te /
translated: why did the master state it in nine ways?

original: ma grub pa dang / 'gal ba dang / ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs rnams bstan pa'i phyir de tsam bstan par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ma grub pa dang / 'gal ba dang / ma nges pa dang / yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs rnams bstan pa'i phyir de tsam bstan par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: He stated it in that way in order to show the unestablished, the contradictory, the indefinite, and the correct reasons.

original: dgus ni dgos pa med do zhe bshad pa /üîΩrang bzhin 'bras bu grub don du //
analyzed: dgus ni dgos pa med do zhe bshad pa / rang bzhin 'bras bu grub don du //
translated: But there is no need for nine,

original: gtan tshigs gnyis dang @231a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis dang @231a * //
translated: because the two reasons are for establishing the nature and the effect,

original: bzlog pa gnyis //
analyzed: bzlog pa gnyis //
translated: and the two reversals

original: rtsod phyir khyad par spyi dag ste //
analyzed: rtsod phyir khyad par spyi dag ste //
translated: are for the sake of debate, and the general and the specific

original: lhag ma ldog pa'i sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: lhag ma ldog pa'i sgrub byed yin //
translated: are for the sake of the remainder, which is the proof of the reversal.

original: dgu char la yang dgos pa yod pa'i phyir rnam pa dgu bstan to //
analyzed: dgu char la yang dgos pa yod pa'i phyir rnam pa dgu bstan to //
translated: All nine are taught because they each have a purpose.

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i 'brel pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gnyis bstan to //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba'i 'brel pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gnyis bstan to //
translated: The second two are taught in order to show that the nature and effect are the reason itself, not something else, because of the relation of identity and origination.

original: de gnyis nyid phyin ci log tu sgrub pa bkod na 'gal ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gzhan gnyis so //
analyzed: de gnyis nyid phyin ci log tu sgrub pa bkod na 'gal ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gzhan gnyis so //
translated: The other two are taught in order to show that if those two are established in the opposite way, they are contradictory.

original: gzhan dag mthong ba dang ma mthong ba tsam gyis ma nges pa yang nges par rtogs pas de rnam par gcad pa'i gzhan gnyis so //
analyzed: gzhan dag mthong ba dang ma mthong ba tsam gyis ma nges pa yang nges par rtogs pas de rnam par gcad pa'i gzhan gnyis so //
translated: The other two are taught in order to eliminate the other two, which are not ascertained by mere seeing or not seeing.

original: lhag ma gsum bstan pa ni ldog pa gtso bo bstan pa'i don te /
analyzed: lhag ma gsum bstan pa ni ldog pa gtso bo bstan pa'i don te /
translated: The teaching of the remaining three is for the purpose of teaching the primary exclusions.

original: gtan tshigs ni ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni ldog pa'i sgo nas go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The reason is understood through exclusion.

original: des na rjes su dpag pas ni rnam par gcod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pas ni rnam par gcod pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning taught is that what is to be proven by inference is just the exclusion.

original: phyogs kyi chos dgu po de dag ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos dgu po de dag ni 'di yin te /
translated: Those nine properties of the subject are as follows:

original: gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag dang // byas dang mnyan bya rtsol byung dang // mi rtag rtsol byung reg min te //
analyzed: gzhal bya byas dang mi rtag dang // byas dang mnyan bya rtsol byung dang // mi rtag rtsol byung reg min te //
translated: The conditioned, the impermanent,üîΩThe conditioned, the audible, the arisen from effort,üîΩThe impermanent, the arisen from effort, the intangible,üîΩ

original: dgu pa 'di dag rtags sogs pa //
analyzed: dgu pa 'di dag rtags sogs pa //
translated: The nine are the evidence of the thesis,

original: gal te byas pa nyid dang brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba dag gcig yin pa'i phyir bzlas pas ji ltar du ma nyid dam /
analyzed: gal te byas pa nyid dang brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba dag gcig yin pa'i phyir bzlas pas ji ltar du ma nyid dam /
translated: If production and post-production are the same, then how can there be more than one?

original: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dag tu 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dag tu 'gyur zhing /
translated: How can there be contradictory evidence?

original: dgu nyid du yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dgu nyid du yang ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: And how can there be nine?

original: de nyid bzlas pas ni grangs tha dad pa'i rten du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid bzlas pas ni grangs tha dad pa'i rten du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Because of repetition, the number of the thesis is not different.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: BecauseüîΩThe three, permanent, impermanent, and post-production,

original: rtag dang mi rtag rtsol byung dang // bar du rtag pa gsum dag dag / rtsol byung min dang mi rtag rtag / sgrub byed gzhal bya nyid sogs yin //
analyzed: rtag dang mi rtag rtsol byung dang // bar du rtag pa gsum dag dag / rtsol byung min dang mi rtag rtag / sgrub byed gzhal bya nyid sogs yin //
translated: And the three, not post-production, impermanent, and permanent,üîΩAre the evidence of the thesis, etc.

original: de'i phyir thams cad 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, everything is tenable.

original: rang gi ngo bos ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba cung zad cig yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ni sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba cung zad cig yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is not the slightest proof by intrinsic reality.

original: bsgrub par bya ba la ltos nas sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba la ltos nas sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: because it would be a proof in reliance on what is to be proven.

original: bsgrub par bya ba tha dad pa 'brel pas na gcig de nyid yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'thad pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba tha dad pa 'brel pas na gcig de nyid yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'thad pa ci yang med do //
translated: And because of the connection with the different things to be proven, it would be a correct reason that is contradictory.

original: des na gtan tshigs gnyis te byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs gnyis te byas pa nyid kyi phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: Therefore, there are two types of reasons: impermanent because it is produced is a reason of nature.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Because it arises immediately upon the exertion of effort is a result.

original: byas pa nyid ni rang bzhin @231b gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: byas pa nyid ni rang bzhin @231b gyi gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: Produced is a reason of nature.

original: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba 'di ltar rnam par shes te /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba 'di ltar rnam par shes te /
translated: Arising immediately upon the exertion of effort is a reason of result.

original: bzlog pa ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: bzlog pa ci ste mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why would the opposite not occur?

original: de'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it possesses the characteristics of that.

original: gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir na bzlog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir na bzlog pa ma yin no //
translated: because it does not have the characteristics of the other.

original: rang bzhin nyid las gzhan gyis ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid las gzhan gyis ni //
translated: The other is not the nature itself.

original: go bya la khyab yod min te //
analyzed: go bya la khyab yod min te //
translated: The object to be understood is not pervaded by it,

original: rgyu ni 'khrul pa srid phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ni 'khrul pa srid phyir ro //
translated: because the cause is possible in error.

original: de'i phyir 'bras rnams gnyis su 'jug / byas pa nyid ni khyab mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras rnams gnyis su 'jug / byas pa nyid ni khyab mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the results are twofold. Because being produced is of equal pervasion.

original: khyab mnyam pa can ni 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: khyab mnyam pa can ni 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: That which has equal pervasion is not a result,

original: rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu ni 'bras bu la 'khrul pa'i phyir te /
translated: because the cause is possible in error regarding the result.

original: rgyu ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause is not necessarily concomitant with the result.

original: des na 'bras bu thams cad ni rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu thams cad ni rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, all results are twofold.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa des na /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa des na /
translated: The mere arising immediately after effort is also twofold. Therefore,

original: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: it is a reason for a result.

original: mi rtag pa tsam gyis ni brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i 'bras bu shes pa rtsom pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa tsam gyis ni brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i 'bras bu shes pa rtsom pa ma yin te /
translated: Mere impermanence does not establish the result that arises immediately after effort,üîΩbecause it is possible in error.

original: des na de mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa gnyis su 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is engaged in the two aspects of that which is consistent with it.

original: rgyu'i de ma thag tu 'bras bu rtsom pa ni mi rtag pa thams cad kyang yin te shes pa 'bras bu yin yang dngos su khyab pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu'i de ma thag tu 'bras bu rtsom pa ni mi rtag pa thams cad kyang yin te shes pa 'bras bu yin yang dngos su khyab pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid do //
translated: The beginning of the effect immediately after the cause is also all impermanent things, because consciousness is the effect, and because it is directly pervaded, it is a natural reason.

original: ji ltar dmigs pa nyid yod par brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs pa nyid yod par brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as it is said to exist as an object.
