original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa ma yin te de las gzhan rnams med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni yod pa ma yin te de las gzhan rnams med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The characteristic of consciousness that arises immediately after effort does not exist, because it would follow that others do not exist.

original: des na shes pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i dngos pos brtsigs pa'i tha dad pa'i 'bras bu'i mkhar gyi rtse mor 'dzeg par byed do //
analyzed: des na shes pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i dngos pos brtsigs pa'i tha dad pa'i 'bras bu'i mkhar gyi rtse mor 'dzeg par byed do //
translated: Therefore, that consciousness climbs to the peak of the castle of the effect that is constructed by the principle of positive and negative concomitance.

original: des na rtsol ma thag tu 'byung ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i nges pa de ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: des na rtsol ma thag tu 'byung ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i nges pa de ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: Therefore, the certainty of being expressed by the sound that arises immediately after effort is a causal reason.

original: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar rtogs /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i shes pa mi rtag pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar rtogs /
translated: How do you understand the statement ‚ÄúThe result of impermanence is the consciousness that arises as soon as it is sought‚Äù?

original: de ltar yang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu du ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang mtshungs pa'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu du ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang mtshungs pa'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is said that because the result of seeking is multiple, it is similar to the result.

original: gsal ba dang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin la 'byung ba yang yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba dang rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin la 'byung ba yang yin te /
translated: It is the result of manifestation and seeking, and it is also origination.

original: dper na mar me'i bsngogs pa'i rtsol ba ni bum pa'i 'bras bu nyid du sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: dper na mar me'i bsngogs pa'i rtsol ba ni bum pa'i 'bras bu nyid du sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: For example, the seeking of the burning of a lamp is not established as the result of a pot.

original: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsol ba ni de ltar yin pa'i phyir gnyi ga @232a * //
analyzed: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rtsol ba ni de ltar yin pa'i phyir gnyi ga @232a * //
translated: But the seeking of a wheel, etc., is like that.

original: mthong bas na ji ltar gcig tu nges /
analyzed: mthong bas na ji ltar gcig tu nges /
translated: Since both are seen, how can they be ascertained as one?

original: de ltar yang rnam par bshad pa byed pas /
analyzed: de ltar yang rnam par bshad pa byed pas /
translated: Thus the Subcommentary states:

original: gal te sgra rtag par 'thad par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: gal te sgra rtag par 'thad par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: If it were tenable that sound is permanent,

original: de'i tshe sgra bsal bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra bsal bar bya ba yin la /
translated: then sound would be the object of elimination.

original: de lta ma yin na ni de'i tshe byed pa yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni de'i tshe byed pa yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: But if it is not so, then it is the object of activity.

original: sgra byed de zhes bya ba'i tha snyad tsam gyis ni sgra byed pa nyid do zhes rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra byed de zhes bya ba'i tha snyad tsam gyis ni sgra byed pa nyid do zhes rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: One does not understand the meaning of ‚Äúsound-producer‚Äù from the mere convention ‚Äúsound-producer.‚Äù

original: byed pa ni sbyor ba'i don yin pa'i phyir dper na nga'i rkang par gyis shig / rgyab tu gyis shig ces bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: byed pa ni sbyor ba'i don yin pa'i phyir dper na nga'i rkang par gyis shig / rgyab tu gyis shig ces bya ba bzhin no //
translated: Because ‚Äúproducer‚Äù means ‚Äúto apply,‚Äù as in ‚ÄúMake my foot,‚Äù or ‚ÄúMake my back.‚Äù

original: sgra rtag pa nyid kyi rgyu ni ngo shes pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra rtag pa nyid kyi rgyu ni ngo shes pa yin no //
translated: The cause of the permanence of sound is recognition.

original: des na rtag tu yod par 'gyur pas na //
analyzed: des na rtag tu yod par 'gyur pas na //
translated: Therefore, it would be permanent.

original: de dang de min dus ldan par //
analyzed: de dang de min dus ldan par //
translated: It is not established that it exists at the time of being and not being that.

original: yod grub tshad ma dang ldan pas //
analyzed: yod grub tshad ma dang ldan pas //
translated: It is established by a valid cognition that it exists.

original: mar me la ni bum pa bzhin //
analyzed: mar me la ni bum pa bzhin //
translated: Like a pot in relation to a lamp,

original: sgra yang bsal bar bya ba nyid //
analyzed: sgra yang bsal bar bya ba nyid //
translated: sound is also to be refuted.

original: bsal ba'ang nye bar dmigs pa ste //
analyzed: bsal ba'ang nye bar dmigs pa ste //
translated: The refutation is also observed.

original: bsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan yod min //üîΩde bzhin du ni sngar yod pa //
analyzed: bsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan yod min // de bzhin du ni sngar yod pa //
translated: The characteristic of the refutation is not existent.üîΩIn the same way, some previously existent

original: 'ga' zhig las ni nyes dmigs pa //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig las ni nyes dmigs pa //
translated: fault is observed.

original: 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur min te //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur min te //
translated: It is not the effect.

original: sngar yod de tshe rig pa ni //
analyzed: sngar yod de tshe rig pa ni //
translated: When it previously existed, the cognition

original: 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ba yin /üîΩ// / bam po bcu gcig pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur ba yin / // / bam po bcu gcig pa /
translated: would be the effect.

original: 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: sngar yod pa yi shes pa ni //üîΩbrtsal ma thag 'byung nges min te //
analyzed: sngar yod pa yi shes pa ni // brtsal ma thag 'byung nges min te //
translated: The cognition that exists previously

original: sgrib byed dbang po sgra la ni //
analyzed: sgrib byed dbang po sgra la ni //
translated: is not necessarily produced immediately upon the application of effort.

original: rnam kun nye sbyor med phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam kun nye sbyor med phyir ro //
translated: Because the sense faculty and the object are not always in contact,üîΩas in the case of the eye and form.

original: dper na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i bum pa la rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
analyzed: dper na brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i bum pa la rtsol ba'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
translated: For example, a pot that is produced immediately upon the application of effort is the result of that effort.

original: rgyu'i tshogs mtha' dag don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rdza mkhan gyi rtsol bas gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs mtha' dag don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rdza mkhan gyi rtsol bas gsal bar byed pa ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: But it is not the case that the potter's effort makes it manifest, because it would follow that the entire collection of causes would be pointless.

original: thams cad thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because everything exists in everything.

original: 'gas kyang cung zad spyod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gas kyang cung zad spyod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because nothing is to be enjoyed by anyone.

original: 'gro ba spyod pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba spyod pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The world would be without activity.

original: rgyu rnams kyis nges par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyis nges par byed pa yin te /
translated: Causes would be determinative,

original: de lta ma yin na 'chol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'chol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because otherwise there would be chaos.

original: nges pa zhes bya ba ci zhig //
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya ba ci zhig //
translated: What is this so-called determination?üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gzhan bzlog pa las ma gtogs par //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gzhan bzlog pa las ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from the exclusion of other,

original: nges pa zhes bya yod ma yin //
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya yod ma yin //
translated: there is no such thing as determination.

original: rgyu ni brgya phrag dag gis kyang //
analyzed: rgyu ni brgya phrag dag gis kyang //
translated: Even by hundreds of causes,

original: yod pa nye bar bzlog pa med //
analyzed: yod pa nye bar bzlog pa med //
translated: The existent cannot be averted.

original: bzlog pa dngos po med pas na //
analyzed: bzlog pa dngos po med pas na //
translated: Since the averted is a non-entity,

original: de ni ji ltar phyis dmigs 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar phyis dmigs 'gyur //
translated: How could it later be observed?

original: yod pa ma yin phyi nas ni //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin phyi nas ni //
translated: If it is not existent later,

original: rtogs pa de nyid skye ba yin //
analyzed: rtogs pa de nyid skye ba yin //
translated: That very realization would be produced.

original: 'bras bu snga na yod smra na //
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na yod smra na //
translated: If you say the effect exists before,

original: nges pa thams cad yod pa nyid //
analyzed: nges pa thams cad yod pa nyid //
translated: All ascertainment would be existent.

original: des na yod pa de yang ni //
analyzed: des na yod pa de yang ni //
translated: Therefore, that existent

original: byed pa gang du'ang rigs ldan min//
analyzed: byed pa gang du'ang rigs ldan min//
translated: Is not suitable as a cause anywhere.

original: @232b 'on te yod de bye brag tu //
analyzed: @232b 'on te yod de bye brag tu //
translated: But if it is existent, it is established

original: bsal ba nyid du sgrub byed la //
analyzed: bsal ba nyid du sgrub byed la //
translated: As a particular.

original: gal te de yang 'bras 'gyur na //
analyzed: gal te de yang 'bras 'gyur na //
translated: If that is also an effect,

original: de la rtogs pa gnyis su 'gyur //
analyzed: de la rtogs pa gnyis su 'gyur //
translated: There would be two realizations.

original: gal te med na byar mi nus //
analyzed: gal te med na byar mi nus //
translated: If it does not exist, it cannot be produced.

original: yod nyid yin na'ang ji ltar byed //
analyzed: yod nyid yin na'ang ji ltar byed //
translated: If it exists, how could it be produced?

original: yod dang med nyid gcig nyid la //
analyzed: yod dang med nyid gcig nyid la //
translated: Existence and non-existence are the same.

original: yod pas tshad mas 'thad ma yin //
analyzed: yod pas tshad mas 'thad ma yin //
translated: Existence is not tenable by valid cognition.

original: yod na gtan du de yod nyid //
analyzed: yod na gtan du de yod nyid //
translated: If it exists, it would always exist.

original: de la rgyu yis ci zhig bya //
analyzed: de la rgyu yis ci zhig bya //
translated: What would the cause do to it?

original: med na byed par mi nus te //
analyzed: med na byed par mi nus te //
translated: If it does not exist, it cannot be produced.

original: des na rgyu ni don med do //
analyzed: des na rgyu ni don med do //
translated: Therefore, the cause is meaningless.

original: de'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i bum pa ni rdza mkhan gyi 'bras bu yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba'i bum pa ni rdza mkhan gyi 'bras bu yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, a pot that is produced as soon as it is sought is the effect of the potter,

original: gsal bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not something that is manifested.

original: 'o na ci dus gzhan du dmigs pa de nyid mar mes gsal bar byas pa yin pa de bzhin du sgra yang rtsol bas gsal bar bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci dus gzhan du dmigs pa de nyid mar mes gsal bar byas pa yin pa de bzhin du sgra yang rtsol bas gsal bar bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that just as the light of a lamp manifests an object that is perceived at another time, so too sound is manifested by effort,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: bum pa sngar yod par ni tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa sngar yod par ni tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established by valid cognition that a pot exists previously.

original: sgra rtsol ba'i sngon rol na yod pa la ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩ'di la yang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: sgra rtsol ba'i sngon rol na yod pa la ni mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro // 'di la yang ngo zhe na /
translated: But there is no sign that sound exists prior to effort.üîΩBut if you say that it is like recognition,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa ni rnam pa brgyar gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa ni rnam pa brgyar gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cognition of recognition is clear in a hundred ways.

original: gsal ba ni slar 'ongs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: gsal ba ni slar 'ongs pa ma yin la /
translated: That which is clear does not return.

original: shi ba ni slar 'tsho ba ma yin no //
analyzed: shi ba ni slar 'tsho ba ma yin no //
translated: And the dead do not come back to life.

original: gzhan yang ci ngo shes pas shes pa yod par bsgrub pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang ci ngo shes pas shes pa yod par bsgrub pa'am /
translated: Moreover, is it established that consciousness exists because of recognition,

original: 'on te shes gnyis dbus na yod par grub //
analyzed: 'on te shes gnyis dbus na yod par grub //
translated: or is it established that it exists in the middle between two consciousnesses?

original: gal te shes pas sgrub po zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes pas sgrub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is established by consciousness,

original: de ni de'i tshe sngar shes pa de nyid kyis bsgrubs shing dran pas tha snyad du byas pas de la ngo shes pas dgos pa ci yod //
analyzed: de ni de'i tshe sngar shes pa de nyid kyis bsgrubs shing dran pas tha snyad du byas pas de la ngo shes pas dgos pa ci yod //
translated: At that time, it is established by that very previous consciousness and designated by memory. What need is there to recognize it?

original: gal te ngo shes pas ni da ltar yang de yod do zhes bsgrub pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te ngo shes pas ni da ltar yang de yod do zhes bsgrub pa yin la /
translated: If recognition establishes that it exists now,

original: dran pa ni de'i dus nyid na yod pa sgrub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dran pa ni de'i dus nyid na yod pa sgrub par byed pa yin te /
translated: memory establishes that it existed at that time,

original: mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba ji lta ba bzhin dran pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it remembers it just as it was seen.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / gal te dran pa yod pa las //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / 'di ltar / gal te dran pa yod pa las //
translated: That is not so.üîΩIn this way:üîΩIf recognition engages

original: ngo shes rab tu 'jug 'gyur na //
analyzed: ngo shes rab tu 'jug 'gyur na //
translated: because memory exists,

original: dran pa'i don la ngo shes pas //
analyzed: dran pa'i don la ngo shes pas //
translated: then recognition of the object of memory

original: de ni dbang skyes ma yin nyid //
analyzed: de ni dbang skyes ma yin nyid //
translated: is not produced by the sense faculties.

original: dbang skyes dran pa ma gtogs par //
analyzed: dbang skyes dran pa ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from the memory produced by the sense faculties,

original: gtogs pa gzhan ni mthong ba med //
analyzed: gtogs pa gzhan ni mthong ba med //
translated: no other engagement is seen.

original: des na dbang skyes nyid min pas //
analyzed: des na dbang skyes nyid min pas //
translated: Therefore, since it is not produced by the sense faculties,

original: dran pa tshad ma min nyid 'gyur ;
analyzed: dran pa tshad ma min nyid 'gyur ;
translated: memory is not a valid cognition.

original: / dbang po rnams ni dran pa'i don la 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: / dbang po rnams ni dran pa'i don la 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: The sense faculties do not engage the object of memory.

original: gzhan du ka n+ya kub dza la sogs pa mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ka n+ya kub dza la sogs pa mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, Kaniska and so on would be directly perceived.

original: des na dran pa rnams kyang mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dran pa rnams kyang mngon sum du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it follows that memories would be direct perception.

original: 'on te mthong bzhin pa la dbang po 'jug na ngo shes pas ci bya /üîΩdran pa dang lhan cig @233a * //
analyzed: 'on te mthong bzhin pa la dbang po 'jug na ngo shes pas ci bya / dran pa dang lhan cig @233a * //
translated: But if the sense faculty engages what is being seen, what is the use of recognition?

original: gcig tu rtogs pa la dgos pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gcig tu rtogs pa la dgos pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is necessary to understand simultaneously with memory.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: dran pa tshad ma ma yin phyir //
analyzed: dran pa tshad ma ma yin phyir //
translated: Because memory is not a valid cognition.

original: des na / gzhal bya gcig nyid ji ltar yin //üîΩchos can bden pa ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: des na / gzhal bya gcig nyid ji ltar yin // chos can bden pa ma yin pa'i //
translated: Therefore, how can there be a single object of comprehension?üîΩThe property of a false subject

original: chos ni gsal bar mi bden nyid //
analyzed: chos ni gsal bar mi bden nyid //
translated: is clearly false.

original: snga ma dus dang 'brel pa ni //
analyzed: snga ma dus dang 'brel pa ni //
translated: The connection with a previous time

original: dran pa med par rtogs ma yin //
analyzed: dran pa med par rtogs ma yin //
translated: is not understood without memory.

original: dngos po tsam zhig snang ba ni //
analyzed: dngos po tsam zhig snang ba ni //
translated: The mere appearance of a thing

original: ngo shes med kyang 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ngo shes med kyang 'gyur ba yin //
translated: occurs even without recognition.

original: dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa snang ba tsam ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dkar po dang ser po la sogs pa snang ba tsam ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin snang ba ma yin te /
translated: The mere appearance of white, yellow, and so on is not the appearance of a permanent nature,

original: dngos por snang ba na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos por snang ba na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it appears as a thing.

original: 'on te de la yang dus gzhan du gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rtag pa snang ba nyid de /
analyzed: 'on te de la yang dus gzhan du gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rtag pa snang ba nyid de /
translated: But if it appears to last for another moment, it is permanent, having the characteristic of enduring.

original: mngon sum gyis ni de 'gog par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni de 'gog par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But direct perception does not refute it.

original: mngon sum sgrub byed du brjod de //
analyzed: mngon sum sgrub byed du brjod de //
translated: Direct perception is said to establish,

original: dngos don 'gog par byed ma yin //üîΩgal te dngos po dus gzhan du //
analyzed: dngos don 'gog par byed ma yin // gal te dngos po dus gzhan du //
translated: but not to refute the object.üîΩIf direct perception apprehends

original: khyab pa mngon sum gyis 'dzin na //
analyzed: khyab pa mngon sum gyis 'dzin na //
translated: pervasion at another time,

original: dus kyi cha kun dmigs pas na //
analyzed: dus kyi cha kun dmigs pas na //
translated: since all parts of time are observed,

original: shi ba'i mtha' ru 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: shi ba'i mtha' ru 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: it would apprehend the end of death.

original: de'i phyir sngon gyi dus na dran pas dmigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngon gyi dus na dran pas dmigs pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is observed by memory in the past,

original: mngon sum gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by direct perception.

original: des na dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir des rtogs pa'i dngos po ni gcig pa nyid mi bden par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na dran pa tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir des rtogs pa'i dngos po ni gcig pa nyid mi bden par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, since memory is not valid cognition, the object cognized by it is not truly the same.

original: chos can mi bden na chos bden pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can mi bden na chos bden pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the subject is not true, the property is not true.

original: 'on te da ltar bden pa la //
analyzed: 'on te da ltar bden pa la //
translated: But if the present is true,

original: snga ma bden min gnas pas na //
analyzed: snga ma bden min gnas pas na //
translated: the past is not true, since it abides.

original: bden dang bden min 'dres pas na //
analyzed: bden dang bden min 'dres pas na //
translated: Since the true and untrue are mixed,

original: de gnyis gcig 'gyur gdon mi za //
analyzed: de gnyis gcig 'gyur gdon mi za //
translated: There is no doubt that the two are identical.

original: bden pa dang mi bden pa gnyis kyis gcig pa nyid de yang bden pa dang mi bden pa nyid du rigs kyi /
analyzed: bden pa dang mi bden pa gnyis kyis gcig pa nyid de yang bden pa dang mi bden pa nyid du rigs kyi /
translated: If the two, the true and the false, are identical, then they are both true and false.

original: mi bden pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mi bden pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not reasonable that they are false.

original: de yang gyi na ste /
analyzed: de yang gyi na ste /
translated: That is also untenable.

original: 'di ltar / gal te chos can dbang gis ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te chos can dbang gis ni //
translated: Thus:

original: bden dang bden min du gnas na //
analyzed: bden dang bden min du gnas na //
translated: If they are posited as true or falseüîΩin dependence on the property possessor,

original: da ltar bas ni bden 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: da ltar bas ni bden 'gyur zhing //
translated: then the present would be true,

original: da ltar min pas brdzun par 'gyur //
analyzed: da ltar min pas brdzun par 'gyur //
translated: and the past would be false.

original: da ltar byung ba bden pa'i phyir de la gnas pa'i gcig pa nyid kyang bden pa yin te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba bden pa'i phyir de la gnas pa'i gcig pa nyid kyang bden pa yin te /
translated: Because the present is true, the identity that resides in it is also true,

original: chos can gyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can gyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows the nature of the property possessor.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dran pa'i gcig pa nyid ni mi bden no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dran pa'i gcig pa nyid ni mi bden no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the identity of memory is not true.

original: des na dngos po la gcig nyid ma grub po //
analyzed: des na dngos po la gcig nyid ma grub po //
translated: Thus, identity is not established for things.

original: gcig cig bya bar ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: gcig cig bya bar ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could there be one action?

original: gal te bden na cis ma rtogs //
analyzed: gal te bden na cis ma rtogs //
translated: If it is true, why is it not perceived?

original: bdag dang bdag nyid tshig la ni //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag nyid tshig la ni //
translated: In the case of the self and its words,

original: bdag nyid @233b ci ste gnod par byed //
analyzed: bdag nyid @233b ci ste gnod par byed //
translated: Why do you harm yourself?

original: 'on te gzhan du mthong ba la //
analyzed: 'on te gzhan du mthong ba la //
translated: If it is seen in another place,

original: ngo shes 'di ni mthong ba med //üîΩde'i phyir mthong ba tha dad par //
analyzed: ngo shes 'di ni mthong ba med // de'i phyir mthong ba tha dad par //
translated: this recognition does not see it.üîΩTherefore, it is ascertained that

original: mi 'gyur zhes ni rnam par nges //
analyzed: mi 'gyur zhes ni rnam par nges //
translated: the seeing is not different.

original: ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa 'di tha dad pa las ldog pas tha mi dad pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa 'di tha dad pa las ldog pas tha mi dad pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: This cognition of recognition, because it is the opposite of difference, would be established as non-difference.

original: dngos po ni 'di tsam du zad de ;
analyzed: dngos po ni 'di tsam du zad de ;
translated: This is the extent of the matter:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: difference and non-difference.

original: des na tha dad pa las ldog na tha mi dad pa nyid sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: des na tha dad pa las ldog na tha mi dad pa nyid sgrub par byed de /
translated: Therefore, if it is the opposite of difference, it establishes non-difference.

original: de lta ma yin na ni med pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni med pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: If it were not so, it would be non-existent,

original: thams cad las ldog par ni nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad las ldog par ni nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: because it is not possible to be the opposite of everything.

original: de yang mi bzang ste /
analyzed: de yang mi bzang ste /
translated: That is also not good.

original: 'di ltar / gang gis de las ldog 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang gis de las ldog 'gyur ba //
translated: Because

original: tha dad la yang khyab par yod //
analyzed: tha dad la yang khyab par yod //
translated: it pervades difference,

original: de nyid kyis ni khyad par sla'i //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni khyad par sla'i //
translated: by that alone it is easy to distinguish,

original: don gzhan nyid du rtogs pa min //
analyzed: don gzhan nyid du rtogs pa min //
translated: but it is not cognized as another object.

original: ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa skyes pa tsam gyis 'di ni tha dad pa'i khyad par nyid du zhes rtogs pa ni gzung gi / tha dad pa dang rigs mi gcig pa'i tha dad par mi rtogs pa ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: ngo shes pa'i rtogs pa skyes pa tsam gyis 'di ni tha dad pa'i khyad par nyid du zhes rtogs pa ni gzung gi / tha dad pa dang rigs mi gcig pa'i tha dad par mi rtogs pa ni ma yin no ;
translated: But when the cognition ‚ÄúThis is a barber‚Äù arises, it is the cognition of a difference, not the cognition of a difference of a different type.

original: / ngo shes pa 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa sgrub pa bregs pa yang skyes pa'i rtsva d'ur ba la sogs pa'i lo ma dag las skyes bar mthong ste /
analyzed: / ngo shes pa 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa sgrub pa bregs pa yang skyes pa'i rtsva d'ur ba la sogs pa'i lo ma dag las skyes bar mthong ste /
translated: This cognition of recognition is seen to arise from the grass, the blades of durva grass, etc., which are grasped as a single type.

original: des na gzhan du yang de bzhin du btags pa nyid rigs so //
analyzed: des na gzhan du yang de bzhin du btags pa nyid rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to impute the same to other cases.

original: gal te der ni dbus na gnas pa'i bregs pa nyid dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te der ni dbus na gnas pa'i bregs pa nyid dmigs pa yin te /
translated: But in that case, the barber‚Äôs shaven head is perceived in the middle.

original: de ni tha dad pa la yang tha mi dad par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni tha dad pa la yang tha mi dad par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: And that is the cognition of nondifference in a difference.

original: 'dir ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case here.

original: skra lo bregs pa la sogs pa ni mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skra lo bregs pa la sogs pa ni mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The shaven head, etc. are adduced as a counterexample.

original: de ni de ltar bden pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de ni de ltar bden pa kho na ste /
translated: That is true, but

original: chen po g-yang du lhung ba rtsva ku sha la 'jus pa dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: chen po g-yang du lhung ba rtsva ku sha la 'jus pa dang mtshungs so //
translated: It is like a great man who has fallen into a ravine and grabs hold of a blade of ku≈õa grass.

original: 'di ltar / bregs zhes bya ba bcad pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ltar / bregs zhes bya ba bcad pa ste //
translated: Thus, ‚Äúcut‚Äù means severed.

original: de ni gzhan dang ma 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de ni gzhan dang ma 'brel pa'o //
translated: That is not connected to anything else.

original: des na snga ma bor ba'i phyir //
analyzed: des na snga ma bor ba'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, because the former is discarded,

original: rig ba 'brel par ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: rig ba 'brel par ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how could there be a connection with consciousness?

original: 'brel pa med par mthong ba ni //
analyzed: 'brel pa med par mthong ba ni //
translated: Seeing that there is no connection,

original: don la yang ni mtshungs pa nyid //
analyzed: don la yang ni mtshungs pa nyid //
translated: the meaning is just the same.

original: gzhan dag par dang chad pa la'ang //
analyzed: gzhan dag par dang chad pa la'ang //
translated: Also, in the case of other things that are cut,

original: shi ba'i ngo shes rnam 'jog pa'i //üîΩma rung bdag nyid de'ang bdag ni //
analyzed: shi ba'i ngo shes rnam 'jog pa'i // ma rung bdag nyid de'ang bdag ni //
translated: the identity of the one who recognizes the dead

original: nyams par byed pa kho nar zad //
analyzed: nyams par byed pa kho nar zad //
translated: is also just the one who is destroyed.

original: snga ma'i rang bzhin zhig pa na //
analyzed: snga ma'i rang bzhin zhig pa na //
translated: When the former nature is destroyed,

original: zhig dang lhan cig gcig nyid ni //
analyzed: zhig dang lhan cig gcig nyid ni //
translated: destruction and the one who is destroyed are one.

original: tha dad na yang de bzhin du //
analyzed: tha dad na yang de bzhin du //
translated: Even if they are different,

original: gcig pa yin par rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: gcig pa yin par rtogs pa yin //
translated: they are understood to be one.

original: gzhan yang / zhig pa gang du'ang dbang po'i spyod yul min //
analyzed: gzhan yang / zhig pa gang du'ang dbang po'i spyod yul min //
translated: Moreover, destruction is not an object of the senses at all.

original: des na de ni dran yul nyid du spyod//
analyzed: des na de ni dran yul nyid du spyod//
translated: Therefore, it is just the object of memory.

original: @234a * // dran pa tshad ma nyid yin sngar bsal te //
analyzed: @234a * // dran pa tshad ma nyid yin sngar bsal te //
translated: Memory is not valid cognition, as was previously explained.

original: des na rtag pa tshad mas ma rtogs nyid //
analyzed: des na rtag pa tshad mas ma rtogs nyid //
translated: Therefore, permanence is not realized by valid cognition.

original: gal te da lta'i dngos po grub min yang //
analyzed: gal te da lta'i dngos po grub min yang //
translated: Even if the present thing is not established,

original: don sdud pa la dran pa tshad ma yin //
analyzed: don sdud pa la dran pa tshad ma yin //
translated: Memory is valid cognition in comprehending the meaning.

original: de tshe dngos po'ang de yi rjes rtogs te //
analyzed: de tshe dngos po'ang de yi rjes rtogs te //
translated: At that time, the thing is also realized by that,

original: des na snga nyid tshad mas rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: des na snga nyid tshad mas rtogs pa yin //
translated: So it is realized by valid cognition from the beginning.

original: de dang lhan cig gcig tu nges bstan pa //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig gcig tu nges bstan pa //
translated: The teaching of oneness together with that

original: tshad ma las ni gzhan yin ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: tshad ma las ni gzhan yin ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could it be other than valid cognition?

original: dngos la bstan par skyes ba'i yid ches kyang //
analyzed: dngos la bstan par skyes ba'i yid ches kyang //
translated: Even the belief produced by the teaching of the thing

original: sems par byed na rang nyid kyis 'gal 'gyur //
analyzed: sems par byed na rang nyid kyis 'gal 'gyur //
translated: If it is thought, it contradicts itself.

original: gzhan yang rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i nges pa'i shes pas yid spro ba skyed pa'i yid can yang gal te nges pa nyid sel bar byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i nges pa'i shes pas yid spro ba skyed pa'i yid can yang gal te nges pa nyid sel bar byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, if the mind that generates delight with certain non-transforming cognition itself eliminates certainty,

original: brjod pa ni gzhan la /
analyzed: brjod pa ni gzhan la /
translated: then it would be one thing to say

original: yid la sems pa ni gzhan yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: yid la sems pa ni gzhan yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: and another thing to think in the mind.

original: ngo shes smra ba rnams kyi ni //
analyzed: ngo shes smra ba rnams kyi ni //
translated: For those who speak of recognition,

original: blo yi nor kun 'di yin te //
analyzed: blo yi nor kun 'di yin te //
translated: This is the wealth of the mind.

original: shin tu rgyang ring 'dzegs nas ni //
analyzed: shin tu rgyang ring 'dzegs nas ni //
translated: Having climbed to a very distant place,

original: skad cig la ni lhung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig la ni lhung bar 'gyur //
translated: And in an instant, they will fall.üîΩ

original: shin tu nyam pa'i gnas su rgyang ring por 'dzegs nas gam du ldigs kyis lhung la mar me 'da' kar cher 'bar nas 'chi ba dang 'dra'o //üîΩ'di ltar / dran pa myong don yul la ni //
analyzed: shin tu nyam pa'i gnas su rgyang ring por 'dzegs nas gam du ldigs kyis lhung la mar me 'da' kar cher 'bar nas 'chi ba dang 'dra'o // 'di ltar / dran pa myong don yul la ni //
translated: It is like a man who climbs up to a high place, then falls down to a lower place, or like a lamp that burns brightly just before it goes out.üîΩThus,

original: zhig pa la ni ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: zhig pa la ni ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How can memory be of a past object?

original: myong min yul gyi don can na'ang //
analyzed: myong min yul gyi don can na'ang //
translated: If it is not of an experienced object,

original: de ni ji ltar dran pa yin //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar dran pa yin //
translated: How can it be memory?

original: gal te dran pa nyams su myong ba'i don gyi yul can gyi rang bzhin yin na 'das par dran par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te dran pa nyams su myong ba'i don gyi yul can gyi rang bzhin yin na 'das par dran par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If memory has as its object the experienced object, then memory would not be of a past object, because the past object is not present.

original: 'das pa ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ma yin no //üîΩ'on te ma rtogs pa nyid dran pas nges par 'dzin to zhe na /
analyzed: 'das pa ni mngon sum gyis rtogs pa ma yin no // 'on te ma rtogs pa nyid dran pas nges par 'dzin to zhe na /
translated: If it is not present, how can it be known by perception?üîΩIf it is not known, how can memory apprehend it?

original: de lta yin na yang dran par mi 'gyur te /üîΩdran pa ni snga na med pa'i yul can ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na yang dran par mi 'gyur te / dran pa ni snga na med pa'i yul can ma yin no //
translated: If it is not apprehended, how can it be remembered?üîΩIf it is apprehended, then it is present.üîΩIf it is present, then it is not past.üîΩIf it is past, then it is not apprehended.üîΩIf it is not apprehended, then it is not remembered.

original: yin du chug pa de lta na yang ngo shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yin du chug pa de lta na yang ngo shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is remembered, then it is not past.

original: ngo shes pa ni mngon sum du mthong ba'i yul can du 'dod de /
analyzed: ngo shes pa ni mngon sum du mthong ba'i yul can du 'dod de /
translated: Recognition is asserted to be a direct perception that has as its object something previously seen.

original: de ltar ma yin na tshad ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na tshad ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, it would not be a valid cognition.

original: de nyid 'das par gyur pa na snga ma zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid 'das par gyur pa na snga ma zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: When it has become past, it is called memory.

original: de yang phan tshun 'gal te /üîΩgang tshe 'das gyur de gzung min //
analyzed: de yang phan tshun 'gal te / gang tshe 'das gyur de gzung min //
translated: This is mutually contradictory.üîΩWhen it has become past, it is not apprehended.

original: gzung tshe de ni de lta min //
analyzed: gzung tshe de ni de lta min //
translated: When it is apprehended, it is not past.

original: dran par gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: dran par gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: It is memory by nature.

original: des ni 'das yin de dngos min //
analyzed: des ni 'das yin de dngos min //
translated: It is past, but it is not a real entity.

original: gal te nges par bstan pa dag / tshad ma yin par 'thad na ni //
analyzed: gal te nges par bstan pa dag / tshad ma yin par 'thad na ni //
translated: If it is tenable that a definite description is a valid cognition,

original: ngo shes pa yang de bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: ngo shes pa yang de bzhin 'gyur //
translated: recognition would be the same.

original: dngos po dang ldan don med nyid //
analyzed: dngos po dang ldan don med nyid //
translated: It would be pointless to have a real entity.

original: gal te dbang po dang 'brel @234b pa med kyang nges par bstan pa tshad ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te dbang po dang 'brel @234b pa med kyang nges par bstan pa tshad ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If a definite description is a valid cognition even though it is not related to a sense faculty,

original: 'di ni rtags nyid ma rungs pa spyod par ni bzod pa dag gis mi bzod pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: 'di ni rtags nyid ma rungs pa spyod par ni bzod pa dag gis mi bzod pa tsam du zad do //
translated: this is just the impatience of those who cannot tolerate the use of a faulty reason.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / mi slu ba dang ldan pa las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mi slu ba dang ldan pa las //
translated: From that which possesses nondeception,

original: shes pa tshad ma yin par 'dod //
analyzed: shes pa tshad ma yin par 'dod //
translated: Cognition is accepted as valid knowledge.

original: mi slu da ltar ga la yod //
analyzed: mi slu da ltar ga la yod //
translated: How can it be non-deceptive?

original: sngar zhig pa la yod ma yin //
analyzed: sngar zhig pa la yod ma yin //
translated: It does not exist in the previously destroyed object.

original: gal te de gcig min mod ci //
analyzed: gal te de gcig min mod ci //
translated: Even if it is not the same,

original: de las don bya de min nam //
analyzed: de las don bya de min nam //
translated: is it not the object of the action?

original: me gzhan gyis kyang don bya ba //
analyzed: me gzhan gyis kyang don bya ba //
translated: Even by another fire,

original: sgrub par byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa kho na'o //
translated: the object is accomplished.

original: de mi byed pa dag las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid don bya ba de byed pas gcig pa nyid ni kun rdzob tu 'dod pa nyid de /
analyzed: de mi byed pa dag las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid don bya ba de byed pas gcig pa nyid ni kun rdzob tu 'dod pa nyid de /
translated: The definition of the object of action is that which is produced by the action. The identity of the object of action is accepted conventionally, because it is produced by that.

original: don gcig ni zhes brjod pa dang rnam par rtog pa ni don de nus pa tsam las mi 'thad pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gcig ni zhes brjod pa dang rnam par rtog pa ni don de nus pa tsam las mi 'thad pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The expression same object and the conception are not untenable, merely from the capacity of that object.

original: don bya ba dang bral ba'i don gyi yul can gyi brjod par nges pa ni rtog pa dang ldan pa dag gis nus par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don bya ba dang bral ba'i don gyi yul can gyi brjod par nges pa ni rtog pa dang ldan pa dag gis nus par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The determination of expression with an object devoid of the object of action is not capable of being done by those endowed with conception.

original: de ngo shes pa'i yul ni /
analyzed: de ngo shes pa'i yul ni /
translated: The object of recognition

original: don bya ba de byed pa nyid kyis gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: don bya ba de byed pa nyid kyis gcig pa nyid do //

original: des na de'i rang bzhin gyi rtags kyi rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i rang bzhin gyi rtags kyi rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the inference of that nature.

original: rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyang /
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig pa nyid kyang /
translated: And the identity of nature

original: de las gzhan brtags pa'i chos dang sngan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan brtags pa'i chos dang sngan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not tenable because of the imputation of other phenomena and the priorüîΩnonexistence of the object.

original: shes pa ni de kho na nyid du gcig la tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa ni de kho na nyid du gcig la tshad ma yin no //
translated: In reality, there is only one consciousness, and it is a valid cognition.üîΩBut if a pot and so on performs a function that is suitable for it, why is it

original: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa don bya ba de byed pa la 'tsham pa rnams la bum pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes ci ste ngo shes par mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa don bya ba de byed pa la 'tsham pa rnams la bum pa de nyid 'di yin no zhes ci ste ngo shes par mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: not recognized as ‚Äúthat very pot‚Äù?

original: de mtshungs so snyam pa nyid ngo shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de mtshungs so snyam pa nyid ngo shes pa yin no //
translated: It is recognized as ‚Äúthe same.‚ÄùüîΩMoreover, it is said that ‚Äúthis is the very pot that was brought,‚Äù and ‚Äúthis

analyzed: gzhan yang 'di ni bum pa de nyid khyer 'ongs so chu grang mo de ni 'di nyid yin no zhes so //
translated: is the very cold water.‚ÄùüîΩIn this way,

analyzed: 'di ltar / gang tshe gzhan 'on ces brjod tshe //

original: de yi gsal gzhan khyer 'ongs pa //üîΩde nyid khyer nus 'ongs so zhes //
analyzed: de yi gsal gzhan khyer 'ongs pa // de nyid khyer nus 'ongs so zhes //

original: nges par skye bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: nges par skye bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: It is ascertained that ‚Äúthat very one is brought.‚Äù

analyzed: gang gi tshe bum pa las gzhan phru ba la sogs pa blang bar 'dod pa de las gzhan 'on cig ces brjod pa na gang gi tshe bum pa de gsal ba gzhan khyer nas 'ongs pa de'i tshe /
translated: When one wishes to take a pot from another place, and says, ‚ÄúBring it,‚Äù and when someone else brings a pot,

analyzed: 'di ni bum pa de nyid khyer te 'ongs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad mthong ngo //

analyzed: thog ma med pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa'i tha snyad shin tu bstan pa'i phyir na /
translated: Because of the teaching of the convention connected with beginningless latent impressions,

analyzed: nye bar btags pa ma yin pa'i dngos por mngon par rlom mo //
translated: one conceives of an entity that is not a mere designation.

analyzed: de'i phyir ngo shes pa las sgra gcig tu nges pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, recognition is not a means of ascertaining a single term.

analyzed: rtogs par byed pa'i nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ni de ltar 'khrul pa yin no //

translated: If it is different, how can

translated: one have confidence in another?üîΩOne cannot have confidence in another

analyzed: 'ga' yang gang du'ang yid ches min //

translated: But when he sees the error, he loses confidence in the first,üîΩand he gains confidence in the other.üîΩIn the same way, he gains confidence in the other,

original: gcig nyid yin na ni shin tu 'thad do //
analyzed: gcig nyid yin na ni shin tu 'thad do //
translated: But if he gains confidence in the other because of the similarity of the formations, then he would also gain confidence in the continuum of the aggregates of the other, just as he does in the son of the first.

analyzed: 'di ltar / byin pa phyir ni len pas na // 'jigs dang ngo tsha dang ldan 'gyur //
translated: But if he gains confidence in the other because of the similarity of the formations, then he would also gain confidence in the continuum of the aggregates of the other, just as he does in the son of the first.

original: 'jigs dang ngo tsha'i 'gyur mod kyi //üîΩ'jigs dang ngo tsha'ang gang gis byas //
analyzed: 'jigs dang ngo tsha'i 'gyur mod kyi // 'jigs dang ngo tsha'ang gang gis byas //
translated: But if he gains confidence in the other because of the similarity of the formations, then he would also gain confidence in the continuum of the aggregates of the other, just as he does in the son of the first.üîΩBut if he gains confidence in the other because of the similarity of the formations, then he would also gain confidence in the continuum of the aggregates of the other, just as he does in the son of the first.üîΩBut if he gains confidence in the other because of the similarity of the formations, then he would also gain confidence in the continuum of the aggregates of the other, just as he does in the son of the first.üîΩBut if he gains confidence in the other because of the similarity of the formations, then he would also gain confidence in the continuum of the aggregates of the other, just as he does in the son of the first.

analyzed: 'on te de dang nye bas 'di //üîΩbdag nyid des zin par rtogs te //üîΩde ni bdag nyid des zin pa //
translated: But if he gains confidence in the other because of the similarity of the formations, then he would also gain confidence in the continuum of the

original: ming yang des zin par 'khrul na //
analyzed: ming yang des zin par 'khrul na //
translated: If the name is confused with the thing named,

original: 'khrul pa de nyid skad cig rgyun la'ang de'i //
analyzed: 'khrul pa de nyid skad cig rgyun la'ang de'i //
translated: then the error is in the stream of moments.

original: de lta'i tha snyad rgyu ni ci ste min //üîΩgzhan gyis brtags pa la'ang rgyu las skye ba las //
analyzed: de lta'i tha snyad rgyu ni ci ste min // gzhan gyis brtags pa la'ang rgyu las skye ba las //
translated: Why not accept that the convention is based on the cause?üîΩThe cause of the error is the other-dependent nature.

original: mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu gzhan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu gzhan pa ma yin no //
translated: The cause of the adherence to the imagined nature is not something other than the arising from causes.

original: bdag rtag par khas blangs kyang mngon par zhen pa rgyu dang 'bras bus byas pa las 'grol ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag rtag par khas blangs kyang mngon par zhen pa rgyu dang 'bras bus byas pa las 'grol ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Even if one accepts a permanent self, one is not liberated from adherence to the cause and effect of action.

original: 'di ltar bdag ni snga ma dang phyi mar rang gi ngo bo gcig las 'pho ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag ni snga ma dang phyi mar rang gi ngo bo gcig las 'pho ba ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the self does not pass from the previous to the next life, because it is a single, intrinsic nature.

original: des na de la 'jigs pa dang 'dzem pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na de la 'jigs pa dang 'dzem pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, it has no fear, no shame, and so on.

original: ji ltar 'jigs pa la sogs pas bsdigs /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jigs pa la sogs pas bsdigs /
translated: How can it be tormented by fear and so on?

original: 'on te de la 'jigs pa skye bas ni de dang ldan pas so zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de la 'jigs pa skye bas ni de dang ldan pas so zhe na /
translated: But if fear arises in it, then it must possess fear.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it cannot,

original: rang gi ngo bos 'jigs pa med pa med pa nyid kyis ni de la gnod pa ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos 'jigs pa med pa med pa nyid kyis ni de la gnod pa ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the absence of fear by intrinsic nature cannot be harmed by the absence of fear.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid tha snyad de lta bu'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid tha snyad de lta bu'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The cause and effect are just the conventional.

original: tha snyad tsam gyis gnod pa ni gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam gyis gnod pa ni gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: The objection is not valid if it is just a conventional one.

original: tha dad kyang 'brel pa'i phyir bu la gnod pas kyang gnod pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad kyang 'brel pa'i phyir bu la gnod pas kyang gnod pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: Even if they are different, they are related, so the son is harmed when the enemy is harmed.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, they are not.

original: gzhan la gnas pas de rang nyid la brten par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la gnas pas de rang nyid la brten par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The enemy is not related to the son, because he is related to someone else.

original: de lta ma yin na dgra la gnod pas kyang gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dgra la gnod pas kyang gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: If it were otherwise, then the enemy would be harmed when the son is harmed.

original: de dang yang gnod bya gnod byed kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'di 'brel yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dang yang gnod bya gnod byed kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'di 'brel yod pa nyid do //
translated: The son and the enemy are related by the characteristic of the one to be harmed and the one who harms.

original: gal te / bu yang de dgrar gyur pa'ang//
analyzed: gal te / bu yang de dgrar gyur pa'ang//
translated: If the son is the enemy,

original: @235b de gnod byas pas gnod ma yin //
analyzed: @235b de gnod byas pas gnod ma yin //
translated: then the harm to the enemy is not a harm.

original: des na gnod pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: des na gnod pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: Therefore, the harm is by the nature of the harm,

original: gnod yin gzhan gyi gnod pas min //
analyzed: gnod yin gzhan gyi gnod pas min //
translated: not by the harm of another.

original: de'i phyir skad cig nyid yin pas //
analyzed: de'i phyir skad cig nyid yin pas //
translated: Therefore, because of momentariness,

original: bdag ni rgyu las khyad yod min //üîΩdes na tha snyad 'di dag ni //
analyzed: bdag ni rgyu las khyad yod min // des na tha snyad 'di dag ni //
translated: the self is not different from the cause.üîΩTherefore, all these conventions

original: thams cad de lta'i rnam pa can //
analyzed: thams cad de lta'i rnam pa can //
translated: have that kind of nature.

original: de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad thams cad ni rgyu mtshan gyis yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad thams cad ni rgyu mtshan gyis yin no //
translated: All conventions such as ‚ÄúThis is that‚Äù are based on a reason.

original: des na sgra rtag pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir ji ltar brtsal ma thag tu gsal ba yin /
analyzed: des na sgra rtag pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir ji ltar brtsal ma thag tu gsal ba yin /
translated: Therefore, since sound is not permanent, how can it be manifest as soon as it is sought?

original: skye ba nyid tshad mas yul du byas pa yin te /
analyzed: skye ba nyid tshad mas yul du byas pa yin te /
translated: The arising of sound is the object of a valid cognition,

original: de'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrkyen gyi dbye bas tha dad phyir //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // rkyen gyi dbye bas tha dad phyir //
translated: because it possesses the characteristics of arising.üîΩSound is the effect

original: sgra ni 'bras bur gyur pa yin //üîΩmar me la sogs dbye ba yis //
analyzed: sgra ni 'bras bur gyur pa yin // mar me la sogs dbye ba yis //
translated: because it is different due to the difference of conditions.üîΩA lamp and so on

original: bum sogs tha dad 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: bum sogs tha dad 'gyur ma yin //
translated: do not become different due to the difference of a pot and so on.

original: gsal bar byed pa che chung gis gsal bya tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa che chung gis gsal bya tha dad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: A manifest object does not become different due to the difference of the greater or lesser illumination of the manifest object.

original: ci ste sgron mas gsal na autpala sngon po dmar por mthong ba dang / zla ba'i 'od kyis mngon par gsal na ser po dkar po nyid dang / ral gyis mngon par gsal na gdong dkar sham yang sngo bsangs su mthong ba de lta bu la sogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste sgron mas gsal na autpala sngon po dmar por mthong ba dang / zla ba'i 'od kyis mngon par gsal na ser po dkar po nyid dang / ral gyis mngon par gsal na gdong dkar sham yang sngo bsangs su mthong ba de lta bu la sogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it is illuminated by a lamp, then a blue lotus would be seen as red, and if it is illuminated by the light of the moon, then yellow would be seen as white, and if it is illuminated by a sword, then a white face would be seen as dark blue.

original: de yang ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / gal te dngos rnams gsal byed las //
analyzed: de yang ma yin te / 'di ltar / gal te dngos rnams gsal byed las //
translated: That is not so.üîΩThus:üîΩIf the nature of things

original: rang bzhin gzhan du yod gyur na //üîΩde las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan du yod gyur na // de las gzhan pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: were to exist as other than the illuminator,üîΩthen the illuminator would be the agent

original: 'bras phyir gsal byed byed po 'gyur//
analyzed: 'bras phyir gsal byed byed po 'gyur//
translated: because of the result of being other than that.

original: gsal bar byed pas ni de'i rang bzhin las ma nyams par rang gi rang bzhin nyid phyin ci ma log par gsal bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pas ni de'i rang bzhin las ma nyams par rang gi rang bzhin nyid phyin ci ma log par gsal bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The illuminator is the unmistaken illumination of its own nature without the degeneration of its nature.

original: de la med pa'i rang bzhin de ji ltar gsal bar byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la med pa'i rang bzhin de ji ltar gsal bar byed par 'gyur te /
translated: How could it illuminate a nature that does not exist?

original: gzhan du na ri bong gi rva la sogs pa yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na ri bong gi rva la sogs pa yang gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, even the horns of a rabbit and so on would be illuminated.

original: de yang phyin ci log tu snang bas gsal bar byas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de yang phyin ci log tu snang bas gsal bar byas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is clarified by the mistaken appearance,

original: 'di la len btab zin to //
analyzed: 'di la len btab zin to //
translated: we have already responded to this.

original: 'on te 'di 'khrul pa yin pa des na skyon 'di med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'di 'khrul pa yin pa des na skyon 'di med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is not a fault because it is mistaken,

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: that also is not correct.üîΩIn this way:

original: 'di ltar / gal te gsal byed 'khrul skyed na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te gsal byed 'khrul skyed na //

original: de ni ji ltar gsal byed yin //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar gsal byed yin //
translated: how could it be a clarifier?

original: 'ga' zhig gsal bar byed na ni //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gsal bar byed na ni //
translated: If it clarifies something,

original: gsal byed gsal bar gsal byed nyid //
analyzed: gsal byed gsal bar gsal byed nyid //
translated: the clarifier itself is clarified.

original: de lta min na rab rib la //üîΩsogs pa'ang gsal byed dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: de lta min na rab rib la // sogs pa'ang gsal byed dag tu 'gyur //
translated: If it is not like that,üîΩeven the blurred would be clarifiers.

original: de dag la yang 'khrul byed la //
analyzed: de dag la yang 'khrul byed la //
translated: If they are produced by error,

original: nyes pa gzhan ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan ni yod ma yin //
translated: there is no other fault.

original: 'on te 'khrul yang gdangs las ni //
analyzed: 'on te 'khrul yang gdangs las ni //
translated: If you assert that even though it is mistaken,

original: de yi rang bzhin bzhin 'dzin pa //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin bzhin 'dzin pa //
translated: it apprehends the nature of the object from its radiance,

original: des na rtsol ba la sogs pa //üîΩde yi @236a * //
analyzed: des na rtsol ba la sogs pa // de yi @236a * //
translated: then the effort and so onüîΩof the one who is mistaken

original: la byed yin 'dod na //
analyzed: la byed yin 'dod na //
translated: would be the cause of the object.

original: gal te gdangs chen po dang chung ngu la sogs pa dang 'brel pa mas sgra tha dad pa nyid yin pa de ltan yang de ni 'khrul pas byas pa nyid yin gyi de kho nar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gdangs chen po dang chung ngu la sogs pa dang 'brel pa mas sgra tha dad pa nyid yin pa de ltan yang de ni 'khrul pas byas pa nyid yin gyi de kho nar ni ma yin no //
translated: If the difference of sound is due to the connection with a great or small resonance, etc., then it is produced by error, but not in reality.

original: 'khrul kyang sgra'i de kho na nyid /
analyzed: 'khrul kyang sgra'i de kho na nyid /
translated: Even if there is error, the reality of sound

original: gzhan gsal pa'i bdag nyid snang pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gsal pa'i bdag nyid snang pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: is the appearance of the nature of clarity.

original: de lta yang lan brjod pa /üîΩgal te 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: de lta yang lan brjod pa / gal te 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin las //
translated: Even so, the response is stated:üîΩIf the nature of sound

original: sgra yi rang bzhin gzhan yod na //
analyzed: sgra yi rang bzhin gzhan yod na //
translated: existed as different from the nature of error,

original: tha snyad nyid du snang 'gyur te //
analyzed: tha snyad nyid du snang 'gyur te //
translated: it would appear as mere convention,

original: gzhan du 'khrul par rtogs mi 'gyur //üîΩtha dad tha mi dad pa yi //
analyzed: gzhan du 'khrul par rtogs mi 'gyur // tha dad tha mi dad pa yi //
translated: but it would not be realized as error.

original: rang bzhin du ni snang gyur na //
analyzed: rang bzhin du ni snang gyur na //
translated: If it appeared as a natureüîΩthat is different or not different,

original: tha dad zhes byas rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad zhes byas rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: it would not be realized as ‚Äúdifferent,‚Äù

original: de lta min na gzhan nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: de lta min na gzhan nyid 'gyur //
translated: otherwise it would be different.

original: gal te 'khrul pa la yang ni //
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pa la yang ni //
translated: If there were error even in error,

original: 'khrul na 'khrul pa nyid nyams 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khrul na 'khrul pa nyid nyams 'gyur //
translated: error itself would be impaired.

original: 'khrul la 'khrul med par rtogs na //
analyzed: 'khrul la 'khrul med par rtogs na //
translated: If error were realized as non-erroneous,

original: des na 'khrul zhes rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: des na 'khrul zhes rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: then it would be realized as ‚Äúerror.‚Äù

original: 'khrul par snang ba'i rang bzhin las sgra'i rang bzhin bden pa gzhan yod pa tha dad par mi snang ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul par snang ba'i rang bzhin las sgra'i rang bzhin bden pa gzhan yod pa tha dad par mi snang ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable that the nature of sound, which is different from the nature of what appears as error, should not appear as different.

original: 'khrul pas tha dad par mi snang bo zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pas tha dad par mi snang bo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it does not appear as different because of error,

original: 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin de las kyang sgra'i rang bzhin gzhan yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin de las kyang sgra'i rang bzhin gzhan yin te /
translated: then the nature of sound is different from that nature of error.

original: des na de yang tha dad par snang bar thal bas lang 'khrul pa nyid nye bar dgod pa yin la //
analyzed: des na de yang tha dad par snang bar thal bas lang 'khrul pa nyid nye bar dgod pa yin la //
translated: Therefore, it follows that it would appear as different. Thus, error itself is set forth.

original: de yang rang bzhin gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pas sgra'i bden pa'i bdag nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pas sgra'i bden pa'i bdag nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: And since that is a different nature, there is an infinite regress. Therefore, the nature of the truth of sound is impermanent.

original: 'khrul pa yang 'khrul na ni sgra'i rang bzhin bden pa nyid 'ba' zhig gnas te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa yang 'khrul na ni sgra'i rang bzhin bden pa nyid 'ba' zhig gnas te /
translated: If error is also in error, then only the nature of sound as truth remains.

original: des na de nyid snang par 'gyur bas 'khrul pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de nyid snang par 'gyur bas 'khrul pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since that would appear, it would not be called ‚Äúerror.‚Äù

original: des na de nyid snang bas na//
analyzed: des na de nyid snang bas na//
translated: Therefore, since that appears,

original: 'khrul pa zhes bya yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'khrul pa zhes bya yod ma yin //
translated: ‚Äúerror‚Äù does not exist.

original: gzhal bya thams cad dor nas ni //
analyzed: gzhal bya thams cad dor nas ni //
translated: Having abandoned all objects of comprehension,

original: 'khrul pa la 'khrul pa nyid du gnas //
analyzed: 'khrul pa la 'khrul pa nyid du gnas //
translated: Delusion is delusion itself.

original: gal te sgra tsam gyis bskyed pa don rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don bya ba min gyi /
analyzed: gal te sgra tsam gyis bskyed pa don rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don bya ba min gyi /
translated: If the meaning is not understood through the mere production of sound,

original: chen po nyid la sogs pas byas pa'i don rtogs pa'i khyad par ni 'ga' yang med do//
analyzed: chen po nyid la sogs pas byas pa'i don rtogs pa'i khyad par ni 'ga' yang med do//
translated: then there is no difference in the understanding of the meaning produced by greatness and so on.

original: des na don bya ba byed pa nyid kyis gsal ba tsam nyid bden pa yin gyi bzlog pa'i phyir gzhan ni bden pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na don bya ba byed pa nyid kyis gsal ba tsam nyid bden pa yin gyi bzlog pa'i phyir gzhan ni bden pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the mere manifestation itself is true because it performs a function, but the opposite is not true.

original: de yang mi bden te /üîΩ'di ltar / sgra la don rtogs byed pa yi //
analyzed: de yang mi bden te / 'di ltar / sgra la don rtogs byed pa yi //
translated: That is also not true.üîΩThus:üîΩThe performance of the meaning

original: don byed pa ni mthong pa med //
analyzed: don byed pa ni mthong pa med //
translated: is not seen in the understanding of the meaning in sound.

original: don de rtogs pa skye pa ni //
analyzed: don de rtogs pa skye pa ni //
translated: The arising of the understanding of that meaning

original: brda goms pa las 'gyur ba yin//
analyzed: brda goms pa las 'gyur ba yin//
translated: is due to familiarity with the sign.

original: @236b * bag chags sad par 'gyur pa yi //
analyzed: @236b * bag chags sad par 'gyur pa yi //
translated: The cause of the activation of latent propensities

original: rgyu ni sgra rig yin par 'dod //
analyzed: rgyu ni sgra rig yin par 'dod //
translated: is asserted to be the knowledge of sound.

original: brgyud pa yis ni skyed byed pa //
analyzed: brgyud pa yis ni skyed byed pa //
translated: The production through the continuum

original: tha dad byed par 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: tha dad byed par 'dod ma yin //
translated: is not asserted to be a different function.

original: nyer len dbye bas tha dad du //
analyzed: nyer len dbye bas tha dad du //
translated: The difference is due to the difference in the substantial cause,

original: 'gyur gyi lhan cig byed pa min //
analyzed: 'gyur gyi lhan cig byed pa min //
translated: but not due to the difference in the cooperative cause.

original: des kyang lhan cig byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: des kyang lhan cig byed pa'i phyir //
translated: because it is a cooperative condition.

original: sgra ni 'byed par byed pa yin //
analyzed: sgra ni 'byed par byed pa yin //
translated: Sound is not a cause of the cognition of the meaning.

original: don de'i rnam pa can rna par rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyi don rtogs pa ni skal ba mnyam pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa nyid las skye ba yin la /
analyzed: don de'i rnam pa can rna par rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyi don rtogs pa ni skal ba mnyam pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa nyid las skye ba yin la /
translated: The cognition of the meaning, which has the form of the meaning, is born from the connection with the latent impressions of the same kind.

original: sgra ni de la lhan cig byed pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: sgra ni de la lhan cig byed pa yin pa'am /
translated: Sound is a cooperative condition for that,

original: bag chags sad par byed pa'i sgo nas brgyud pa skyed par byed pa yin pa des na de'i tha dad par byed pa ma yin no//
analyzed: bag chags sad par byed pa'i sgo nas brgyud pa skyed par byed pa yin pa des na de'i tha dad par byed pa ma yin no//
translated: or it causes the production of the series by activating the latent impressions. Therefore, it is not a cause of the difference.

original: sgra'i dngos su don bya ba ni de'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra'i dngos su don bya ba ni de'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: The direct function of sound is to produce the cognition of that.

original: de ni nye ba dang ring ba'i dbye bas yid du 'on ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang ldan par gsal ba dang mi gsal bar tha dad par 'gyur ba nyid pas de ji ltar na rang gi don bya ba byed pa tha mi dad pa /
analyzed: de ni nye ba dang ring ba'i dbye bas yid du 'on ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang ldan par gsal ba dang mi gsal bar tha dad par 'gyur ba nyid pas de ji ltar na rang gi don bya ba byed pa tha mi dad pa /
translated: That is clearly different as pleasant or unpleasant, and as clear or unclear, due to the distinction of being near or far. Therefore, how can the performance of its own function not be different?

original: de ltar yin dang tha dad pa nyid dngos po nyid yin gyi 'khrul pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yin dang tha dad pa nyid dngos po nyid yin gyi 'khrul pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is a real entity that is different, not an error.

original: gal te sgra rtag par 'gyur na ni brtsal ma thag pa nyid ni nges par shes par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te sgra rtag par 'gyur na ni brtsal ma thag pa nyid ni nges par shes par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If sound were permanent, then one would not ascertain it immediately upon effort.

original: sngar yang ci'i phyir don rtogs par mi byed /
analyzed: sngar yang ci'i phyir don rtogs par mi byed /
translated: Why does it not cause the understanding of the object previously?

original: thos pas rtogs par byed nus pa'i phyir gzhan du rtogs par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: thos pas rtogs par byed nus pa'i phyir gzhan du rtogs par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that it is not understood otherwise because it is able to cause understanding through hearing,

original: gal te brda'i dus na thos pa de nyid da ltar yang rjes su 'jug pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te brda'i dus na thos pa de nyid da ltar yang rjes su 'jug pa ma yin nam /
translated: then is not that which is heard at the time of the convention also not engaged now?

original: rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur gyi phyis kyi rtsol ba'i snga rol du mi rtogs par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur gyi phyis kyi rtsol ba'i snga rol du mi rtogs par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be understood just as it is, and it would not be understood prior to the later effort.

original: ma yin te de'i tshe na gsal byed med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te de'i tshe na gsal byed med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because at that time there is no manifestor.

original: gsal bar byed pa ni dus mtshungs pa gsal bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa ni dus mtshungs pa gsal bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the manifestor manifests at the same time,

original: de ni de ltar rung ba mi yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / ji ltar gsal byed dus mtshungs pa //
analyzed: de ni de ltar rung ba mi yin te / 'di ltar / ji ltar gsal byed dus mtshungs pa //
translated: that is not so, because it is not suitable that way.üîΩThus:üîΩJust as manifestors are simultaneous,

original: gsal bar byed pa yin pa ltar //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa yin pa ltar //
translated: they manifest.

original: de bzhin gsal byed gsal bya yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gsal byed gsal bya yi //
translated: And in the same way, the manifestor would manifest all of the manifest

original: bdag nyid thams cad gsal byed 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad gsal byed 'gyur //
translated: object.

original: gal te dus gzhan gnas pa de //
analyzed: gal te dus gzhan gnas pa de //
translated: If the enduring thing endures at another time,

original: de bzhin du ni des gsal na //üîΩde tshe de ni dus gzhan du ;
analyzed: de bzhin du ni des gsal na // de tshe de ni dus gzhan du ;
translated: and it is manifested by that,üîΩthen at that time, how could it be dependent on the manifestor at another

original: / gsal byed la ltos ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: / gsal byed la ltos ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: time?

original: rang gi rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa ni /üîΩgsal byed du 'gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa ni / gsal byed du 'gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: That which does not manifest its own nature without error is not a manifestor.üîΩIf the nature that pervades another time is manifest, then it is not the case

original: dus gzhan du khyab pa'i rang bzhin gsal na ni dus gzhan du gsal bar byed pas cung zad kyang byar yod pa ma yin no //üîΩma gsal @237a * //
analyzed: dus gzhan du khyab pa'i rang bzhin gsal na ni dus gzhan du gsal bar byed pas cung zad kyang byar yod pa ma yin no // ma gsal @237a * //
translated: that it has the slightest activity in manifesting at another time.

original: ba gsal bar byed pa la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: ba gsal bar byed pa la ltos pa yin te /
translated: If it is not manifest, it is dependent on the manifestor.

original: de ltar ma yin na de'i tshe'ang gsal byed gzhan dgos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na de'i tshe'ang gsal byed gzhan dgos par 'gyur te /
translated: If it were not so, then even at that time another manifestor would be necessary,üîΩand since another would be necessary for that, it would be difficult to maintain

original: de la yang gzhan dgos pa'i phyir thug pa med par gnas par dka' pa'i phyir gsal pa nyid mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan dgos pa'i phyir thug pa med par gnas par dka' pa'i phyir gsal pa nyid mi 'gyur ro //
translated: that there is no infinite regress. Therefore it would not be manifest.

original: phyis kyi shes pa'i snga rol du dmigs bam yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang mi 'thad do /
analyzed: phyis kyi shes pa'i snga rol du dmigs bam yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang mi 'thad do /
translated: But it is not tenable that the object is observed prior to the later consciousness.

original: rtsal ba sngon rol du yod pa ni brtsal ma thag pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa der nges par shes pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsal ba sngon rol du yod pa ni brtsal ma thag pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa der nges par shes pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that the nature of that which is being sought prior to the seeking is ascertained as the nature of that which is sought immediately after the seeking.

original: rang bzhin de nyid yin pas /
analyzed: rang bzhin de nyid yin pas /
translated: Because it is that very nature.

original: de nyid dmigs pa ni yang mi dmigs pa ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de nyid dmigs pa ni yang mi dmigs pa ni mi 'thad de /
translated: It is not tenable that that very object is observed and that very object is not observed.

original: sngar 'byung ba'i rtsal ba de yang de la rnam pa thams cad du nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sngar 'byung ba'i rtsal ba de yang de la rnam pa thams cad du nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that which is being sought prior to the seeking is not applied to it in any way.

original: phyi ma nyid kyis bdag nyid thams cad gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi ma nyid kyis bdag nyid thams cad gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the later one itself illuminates its own nature in its entirety.

original: rang gi dus 'brel ba'i rang bzhin nyid gsal bar byed do zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi dus 'brel ba'i rang bzhin nyid gsal bar byed do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it illuminates the nature that is related to its own time,

original: ci de las gzhan gyis gzhan rnam par gcod dam /
analyzed: ci de las gzhan gyis gzhan rnam par gcod dam /
translated: is it excluded from being different from that?

original: snga phyi'i shes pa gcig yin na //
analyzed: snga phyi'i shes pa gcig yin na //
translated: If the earlier and later consciousnesses are one,

original: rtsol dbye tha dad byed pa min //
analyzed: rtsol dbye tha dad byed pa min //
translated: the division of seeking is not different.

original: shes bzhin du ni tha dad phyir //
analyzed: shes bzhin du ni tha dad phyir //
translated: Because they are different in terms of being conscious,

original: shes bya yang ni gzhan du 'gyur //
analyzed: shes bya yang ni gzhan du 'gyur //
translated: the objects of consciousness would also be different.

original: 'on te gang gi tshe sgrib pa med pa de'i tshe dmigs par 'gyur te yod kyang mi dmigs pa ni sgrib pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrtsig pas bar du chod pa yi //
analyzed: 'on te gang gi tshe sgrib pa med pa de'i tshe dmigs par 'gyur te yod kyang mi dmigs pa ni sgrib pa'i phyir ro // rtsig pas bar du chod pa yi //
translated: But when there is no obstruction, then it is perceived. Even though it exists, it is not perceived because of obstruction.üîΩA pot that is obstructed by a wall is not seen,

original: bum pa yod kyang mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bum pa yod kyang mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: even though it exists.

original: gzhan gyi de ni gsal bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi de ni gsal bya'o //
translated: The other one is to be clarified.

original: phyis ni de mthong yul du 'gyur //
analyzed: phyis ni de mthong yul du 'gyur //
translated: Later, it will be seen as an object.

original: de ltar mngon sum gyis grub cing //
analyzed: de ltar mngon sum gyis grub cing //
translated: Thus, it is established by direct perception,

original: tshad mi yis ni nges pa yin //üîΩsgra la'ang rtsol par sgrib pa ni //
analyzed: tshad mi yis ni nges pa yin // sgra la'ang rtsol par sgrib pa ni //
translated: and ascertained by inference.üîΩObstruction by effort is also established

original: med par sgrub par byed pa yin //
analyzed: med par sgrub par byed pa yin //
translated: with regard to sound.

original: yod kyang sgrib par byed pa yod na mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang / de med na yang dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod kyang sgrib par byed pa yod na mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang / de med na yang dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though it exists, it is not perceived because of the existence of obstruction, and because it is perceived when that does not exist.

original: dmigs pa'i gegs byed pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las sgrib par byed pa yod pas byas pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i gegs byed pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las sgrib par byed pa yod pas byas pa yin no //
translated: Obstruction of perception is made by the presence of obstruction in the case of positive and negative concomitance.

original: bsgribs pas rang nyid med par 'gyur ba'am 'gyur ba gzhan byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgribs pas rang nyid med par 'gyur ba'am 'gyur ba gzhan byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the obstructed itself becomes nonexistent or undergoes some other change.

original: mngon sum gyis de'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa'i phyir po zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis de'i rang bzhin du dmigs pa'i phyir po zhe na /
translated: Because it is perceived by direct perception to have that nature.

original: gzhan gyis smras pa de ni snga ma phyi ma ma brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa de ni snga ma phyi ma ma brtags pa yin te /
translated: The opponent‚Äôs statement is not examined here.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / der yang rnam 'gyur med par ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / der yang rnam 'gyur med par ni //
translated: Even there, the absence of manifestation

original: ngo shes nyid las rtogs pa yin //üîΩdmigs pa med pa'ang mngon sum gyis //
analyzed: ngo shes nyid las rtogs pa yin // dmigs pa med pa'ang mngon sum gyis //
translated: Is understood from recognition.üîΩHow could the absence of an object

original: ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: Be understood by direct perception?

original: gang phyir dmigs pa ldog pas ni /
analyzed: gang phyir dmigs pa ldog pas ni /
translated: Because the object is eliminated,

original: @237b de yi rang bzhin med par sgrub //
analyzed: @237b de yi rang bzhin med par sgrub //
translated: Its nature is established as nonexistent.

original: gzhan gyis dmigs so zhes bya ba //
analyzed: gzhan gyis dmigs so zhes bya ba //
