analyzed: ji skad du shes pa ni rang gi ngo bo'i de ma thag tu 'byung ba yin gyi rtsol ba'i de ma thag pa ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa de ni gzhan du yang spangs par nus pa yin te /
translated: As for the statement ‚ÄúCognition occurs immediately upon the nature of itself, not immediately upon effort,‚Äù that can be refuted in another context.

original: gal te rang gi ngo bo'i de ma thag pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bo'i de ma thag pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even if it were to occur immediately upon the nature of itself,

original: brtsal ma thag par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: it would still occur immediately upon the effort.

original: der shin tu zhib mo'i brtag pa ni dgos pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: der shin tu zhib mo'i brtag pa ni dgos pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not necessary to investigate this in great detail.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi rtags gnyis ka yang dpe 'di nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi rtags gnyis ka yang dpe 'di nyid kyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the example of the effect and the example of the nature of being are both indicated by this very example.

original: gal te 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi dpe nyid tha dad par ci'i phyir bstan la dbye ba gzhan ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu dang rang bzhin gyi dpe nyid tha dad par ci'i phyir bstan la dbye ba gzhan ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: If the example of the effect and the example of the nature of being are taught as different, why are they not taught as different kinds of reason?

original: 'di la lan btab pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la lan btab pa ni /
translated: The answer to this is:

original: yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba 'am //
analyzed: yod pa gang med mi 'byung ba 'am //
translated: The reason is that which does not exist without that,üîΩor that which is inseparable from its own nature,

original: rang bdag rnam dbyer med can dang // de ni de dang 'khrul mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bdag rnam dbyer med can dang // de ni de dang 'khrul mi 'gyur //
translated: and that is not mistaken about that.

original: zhes bya'i don du de rab dbye //
analyzed: zhes bya'i don du de rab dbye //
translated: The division is made for the sake of the meaning of that.

original: gang zhig gang med par yod par mi 'gyur ba de nyid ni gtan tshigs yin te de 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang zhig gang med par yod par mi 'gyur ba de nyid ni gtan tshigs yin te de 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which does not exist without something else is the reason, because it is non-mistaken.

original: tha dad pa la ni 'bras bu nyid ma rtogs par 'khrul pa med pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa la ni 'bras bu nyid ma rtogs par 'khrul pa med pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the case of difference, without understanding the effect, there is no other non-mistaken reason.

original: gal te mi 'khrul pa nyid kyis ni gtan tshigs yin gyi 'bras bu nyis kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te mi 'khrul pa nyid kyis ni gtan tshigs yin gyi 'bras bu nyis kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: If non-mistakenness itself is the reason, not the effect,üîΩthen the effect is not the reason.

original: thal ba me'i 'bras bu yin na de 'khrul @243b pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thal ba me'i 'bras bu yin na de 'khrul @243b pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: If smoke were the effect of fire, it would not be mistaken.

original: de bzhin du 'bras bu ma yin pa yang ldan pa can gyi chu'i gzhi go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'bras bu ma yin pa yang ldan pa can gyi chu'i gzhi go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: In the same way, the basis of water, which is not the effect, is the cause of understanding.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.üîΩBecause it is the effect, it is the cause of understanding.

original: 'di ltar 'bras bu nyid yin pas na go bar byed pa kho na'o zhes mi brjod kyi 'on kyang go bar byed pa nyid kyi 'bras bu kho nas yin te tha dad pa ni 'bras bu ma yin na go bar byed pa yang ma yin no zhes so
analyzed: 'di ltar 'bras bu nyid yin pas na go bar byed pa kho na'o zhes mi brjod kyi 'on kyang go bar byed pa nyid kyi 'bras bu kho nas yin te tha dad pa ni 'bras bu ma yin na go bar byed pa yang ma yin no zhes so
translated: If it were different, it would not be the effect, and it would not be the cause of understanding.

original: // 'das pa'i me dang yul gzhan na gnas pa las kyang byung ba'i 'bras bu thal ba de lta bus ni de ltar gyur pa go bar byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: // 'das pa'i me dang yul gzhan na gnas pa las kyang byung ba'i 'bras bu thal ba de lta bus ni de ltar gyur pa go bar byed pa kho na'o //
translated: The effect of past fire and fire in another place is smoke, and by that smoke, it is understood in that way.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gang gis de'i khyad par las khyad par du 'gyur ba go bar byed pa nyid ni 'bras bus rab tu sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gang gis de'i khyad par las khyad par du 'gyur ba go bar byed pa nyid ni 'bras bus rab tu sbyar ba yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the cause of understanding, which becomes different from its specific cause, is applied by the effect.

original: 'dir yang rgyu mtshan ni rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po ni de ltar gyur pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang rgyu mtshan ni rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po ni de ltar gyur pa kho na'o //
translated: Here, the reason is the reasonable thing, and it is just so.

original: ldan pas go bar byed pa yang yin na ni gzhi yang gnas pa'i go byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldan pas go bar byed pa yang yin na ni gzhi yang gnas pa'i go byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the basis is the cause of the understanding, then the basis would be the cause of the endurance.

original: 'on te gzhi ni gnas pa med kyang go bar byed pa yod pa des na de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te gzhi ni gnas pa med kyang go bar byed pa yod pa des na de ni ma yin no //
translated: But if the basis is not the cause of the endurance, then the understanding would not be the effect of the basis.

original: chu la sogs pa'i gnas pa'i gzhi med par yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: chu la sogs pa'i gnas pa'i gzhi med par yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But water, etc., do not exist without a basis of endurance, and therefore the basis is the cause of the understanding.

original: gal te de lta na 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba de nyid 'ongs pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba de nyid 'ongs pa yin te /
translated: If that is so, then the effect is the cause of the understanding, and that is the same as what we have been saying.

original: gang zhig med par gang mi 'byung ba de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig med par gang mi 'byung ba de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: That which does not occur without something else is the effect of that other thing.

original: gzhi can gnas pa yang gzhi med par mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: gzhi can gnas pa yang gzhi med par mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: Endurance with a basis does not occur without a basis.

original: des na de 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: des na de 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Therefore, the basis is the cause of the endurance.

original: gal te gnas pa nyid 'bras bu yin gyi chu ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gnas pa nyid 'bras bu yin gyi chu ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that endurance is the effect, not water,

original: de lta na 'o na gnas pa po nyid go bar byed pa yin gyi chu ni ma yin pas 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na gnas pa po nyid go bar byed pa yin gyi chu ni ma yin pas 'khrul pa med do //
translated: If that is so, then it is the one who is standing that is understood, not the water, so there is no error.

original: 'on te gnas pa'i khyad par can gyi chu nyid go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te gnas pa'i khyad par can gyi chu nyid go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the water itself, which is qualified by standing, is what is understood,

original: chu'i khyad par can gyi gnas pa go bar byed pa ci ste mi 'gyur /
analyzed: chu'i khyad par can gyi gnas pa go bar byed pa ci ste mi 'gyur /
translated: why is not the standing, which is qualified by water, what is understood?

original: rigs pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
analyzed: rigs pa ni 'di nyid yin te /
translated: This is the correct principle,

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las go bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the water is understood from the concomitance and the reverse concomitance.

original: gnas pa las gzhan pa'i chu la med do //
analyzed: gnas pa las gzhan pa'i chu la med do //
translated: The water does not exist apart from the standing.

original: gal te ltung ba yang chu nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ltung ba yang chu nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the falling also water?

original: de chu yin du zad mod /
analyzed: de chu yin du zad mod /
translated: It is indeed water,

original: de nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: but it is not that.

original: chu gzhan yang chu yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: chu gzhan yang chu yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Other water is just water.

original: chu nyid kyi spyi ni med do zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: chu nyid kyi spyi ni med do zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has been shown that there is no universal of water.

original: yod du chug kyang de go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod du chug kyang de go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if there were, it would not be understood,

original: go bar byed pa ni gsal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: go bar byed pa ni gsal ba kho na'o //
translated: because what is understood is only the particular.

original: de yang 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu las gzhan pa'i go bar byed pa ni med do //
analyzed: de yang 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu las gzhan pa'i go bar byed pa ni med do //
translated: and because it is an effect, it is not a revealer that is other than the effect.

original: 'on te gsal ba de ni gcig kho na'o zhes 'dod na de yang @244a * //
analyzed: 'on te gsal ba de ni gcig kho na'o zhes 'dod na de yang @244a * //
translated: But if you maintain that the manifestation is only one, that is also

original: mi rung ste /
analyzed: mi rung ste /
translated: improper.

original: de nyid gnas pa yin la de nyid de lta ma yin no zhes bya bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid gnas pa yin la de nyid de lta ma yin no zhes bya bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows that it would be the same thing that remains and it would not be that thing.

original: rnam grangs kyis de ltar yin yang skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: rnam grangs kyis de ltar yin yang skyon med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because it is so in terms of a category,

original: de lta na 'o na snga ma dang phyi ma dag gcig tu rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ci ltar gsal ba gcig nyid yin /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na snga ma dang phyi ma dag gcig tu rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ci ltar gsal ba gcig nyid yin /
translated: then, in that case, since there is no apprehension of the former and the latter as one, how can there be one manifestation?

original: ma rtogs pa ni gzhan dang gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni gzhan dang gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is not apprehended is not the same as another.

original: gcig par sgrub par byed pa ni rtogs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gcig par sgrub par byed pa ni rtogs pa nyid yin te /
translated: The proof of oneness is just the apprehension,

original: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa dag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa dag ni ma yin no //
translated: not the apprehension and nonapprehension.

original: rtogs pa med pas ni dngos po sgrub par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa med pas ni dngos po sgrub par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable to establish a thing by nonapprehension.

original: ngo shes pa ni bsal zin to //
analyzed: ngo shes pa ni bsal zin to //
translated: Recognition has already been refuted.

original: de'i phyir thams cad du ngo shes par dpyad pa nas 'bras bu nyid go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad du ngo shes par dpyad pa nas 'bras bu nyid go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason is that the effect is understood from the investigation of recognition in all cases.

original: chu dang thal sogs dngos po dag / rang bzhin gang gis bskyed bya yin //
analyzed: chu dang thal sogs dngos po dag / rang bzhin gang gis bskyed bya yin //
translated: The entities such as water and mirage are produced by a nature

original: de nyid kyis na go byed du 'ang //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na go byed du 'ang //
translated: and by that very thing, they are also understood.

original: gnas phyir gzhan las rtogs ma yin //
analyzed: gnas phyir gzhan las rtogs ma yin //
translated: Because they remain, they are not understood from another.

original: rang bdag rnam dbyer med can gang //
analyzed: rang bdag rnam dbyer med can gang //
translated: That which is inseparable from its own nature

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is understood by that.

original: gang zhig gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de de'i go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de de'i go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: That which is of the nature of something is understood by that,

original: shing sha pa shing gi bdag nyid yin pas shing go bar byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: shing sha pa shing gi bdag nyid yin pas shing go bar byed pa bzhin no //
translated: just as a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree is understood by a tree.

original: gal te ji ltar shing sha pa shing gi bdag nyid yin pa de bzhin du shing yang shing sha pa'i bdag nyid ni gnyi ga med na med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar shing sha pa shing gi bdag nyid yin pa de bzhin du shing yang shing sha pa'i bdag nyid ni gnyi ga med na med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree is of the nature of a tree, and in the same way, a tree is of the nature of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ tree, because both would not exist without the other,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rnam par dbye pa med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dbye pa med pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no inseparability.

original: shing sha pa med kyang pa la sha la sogs pa yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: shing sha pa med kyang pa la sha la sogs pa yod pa nyid de /
translated: But the absence of a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ is not a tree, because it is not a tree.

original: sha pa ni de ltar ma yin pa'i phyir de nyid rnam par dbyer med pa can yin pas go bar byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: sha pa ni de ltar ma yin pa'i phyir de nyid rnam par dbyer med pa can yin pas go bar byed pa nyid do //
translated: But a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ is not like that, because it is not divisible in that way. Therefore, it is the indicator.

original: gal te de'i bdag nyid mtshungs na yang //
analyzed: gal te de'i bdag nyid mtshungs na yang //
translated: Even if it is similar to that,

original: gal te dbyer med go byed na //üîΩde lta yin na de bdag nyid //
analyzed: gal te dbyer med go byed na // de lta yin na de bdag nyid //
translated: if it is the indicator because it is not divisible,üîΩin that case, it is not the cause

original: de ni go byed rgyur mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni go byed rgyur mi 'gyur //
translated: of the understanding of that nature.

original: de bdag med kyang de bzhin du //
analyzed: de bdag med kyang de bzhin du //
translated: Even though it does not have that nature,

original: 'khrul med du ba gzhan mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'khrul med du ba gzhan mthong ngo //
translated: it is seen without error as different from that.

original: des na de yi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: des na de yi bdag nyid ni //
translated: Therefore, that nature

original: go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan min //
analyzed: go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan min //
translated: is not the reason for the indicator.

original: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag las ni //
analyzed: rjes 'gro ldog pa dag las ni //
translated: From the invariable concomitance and reversal,

original: de ni rgyu mtshan ma yin 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni rgyu mtshan ma yin 'gyur //
translated: it would not be the reason.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te //
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te //
translated: That is not the case,

original: de bdag de las 'byung min par //
analyzed: de bdag de las 'byung min par //
translated: because it does not arise from that nature.

original: gang du mi 'khrul go byed ni //
analyzed: gang du mi 'khrul go byed ni //
translated: Where there is no error, the indicator

original: ming 'di bshad zin de bas na //
analyzed: ming 'di bshad zin de bas na //
translated: is explained by this name. Therefore,

original: de dag de yi rgyu mtshan yin //
analyzed: de dag de yi rgyu mtshan yin //
translated: those are the reasons for that.

original: de yi nang gi dbye bas kyang //
analyzed: de yi nang gi dbye bas kyang //
translated: By the internal divisions of that,

original: go byed de yi bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: go byed de yi bdag nyid ni //
translated: The indicator is of the nature of that.

original: de bdag nyid yin tha dad med //
analyzed: de bdag nyid yin tha dad med //
translated: It is of the nature of that, not different.

original: 'bras bu de las gzhan gyur pa //
analyzed: 'bras bu de las gzhan gyur pa //
translated: The effect is different from that.

original: rgyu yi yin phyir tha dad nyid//
analyzed: rgyu yi yin phyir tha dad nyid//
translated: Because it is the cause, it is different.

original: @244b de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /üîΩldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
analyzed: @244b de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa / ldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
translated: Therefore, it is explained:üîΩThose that are not related in that way,

original: de 'dra'i 'brel pa yod min pa //üîΩde dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de 'dra'i 'brel pa yod min pa // de dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir //
translated: such as possession, etc.,

original: gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin //
translated: are not reasons, because error is possible.

original: ldan pas go bar byed pa yin na ni me yang du ba dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ci ste du ba'i go bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: ldan pas go bar byed pa yin na ni me yang du ba dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ci ste du ba'i go bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: If possession were the indicator, then fire would also be the indicator of smoke, because it is possessed of smoke.

original: mi 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúIt is not, because there is no non-error,‚Äù

original: 'o na ni tha dad pa'i mi 'khrul pa de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na ni tha dad pa'i mi 'khrul pa de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
translated: then non-erroneous difference is the very nature of cause and effect.

original: 'di la gzhan dag na re rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos pos go bar byed pa nyid yin na de ni gnyis la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir me yang go byed 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'di la gzhan dag na re rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos pos go bar byed pa nyid yin na de ni gnyis la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir me yang go byed 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
translated: In this regard, others say, ‚ÄúIf the nature of cause and effect is the indicator, then fire would also be the indicator, because it abides in the two.‚Äù

original: ma yin te yod pa gang med na mi 'byung ba zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te yod pa gang med na mi 'byung ba zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it has been explained that ‚Äúwhen something exists, something else does not occur.‚Äù

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu la gtogs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu la gtogs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The state of being cause and effect does not exist for that which is included in cause and effect.

original: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos pos go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyu nyid dang 'bras bu nyid kyis go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos pos go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyu nyid dang 'bras bu nyid kyis go bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúthe state of being cause and effect is the means of understanding,‚Äù that is, cause and effect are the means of understanding.

original: de lta na 'o na rgyu yang go bar byed pa ci ste ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na rgyu yang go bar byed pa ci ste ma yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then why is the cause not also the means of understanding?

original: yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: yin pa kho na ste /
translated: It is the means of understanding,

original: 'di la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'di la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
translated: but it does not change into something else.

original: de ni de ltar shes par mi nus par zad do //
analyzed: de ni de ltar shes par mi nus par zad do //
translated: It is simply not able to be understood in that way.

original: ci ltar shes pa de ltar ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci ltar shes pa de ltar ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: It is not the means of understanding in the way that it is understood.

original: rang bzhin des ni go bar byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin des ni go bar byed pa nyid do //
translated: It is the means of understanding by its very nature.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / me 'di'i du ba byed pa na ;
analyzed: 'di ltar / me 'di'i du ba byed pa na ;
translated: When this fire produces smoke,

original: / rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: / rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin //
translated: it becomes the cause.

original: gal te byed par shes na ni //
analyzed: gal te byed par shes na ni //
translated: If it is known to produce,

original: go byed du yang 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: go byed du yang 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: It is also the cause of understanding.

original: de ltar de ldog mi nus phyir //
analyzed: de ltar de ldog mi nus phyir //
translated: Thus, it is not possible to eliminate it.

original: de ni de yi nyes pa yin //
analyzed: de ni de yi nyes pa yin //
translated: This is the fault of the opponent.

original: de lta yin dang du ba ni //
analyzed: de lta yin dang du ba ni //
translated: If it were so, then smoke

original: med na med phyir de 'bras nyid //
analyzed: med na med phyir de 'bras nyid //
translated: would be the effect of fire, because when the one does not exist, the other does not exist.

original: tha dad khyab par byed pa nyid //
analyzed: tha dad khyab par byed pa nyid //
translated: The difference is pervasion.

original: thams cad gang phyir rgyu nyid yin //
analyzed: thams cad gang phyir rgyu nyid yin //
translated: Everything is a cause.

original: de bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la yang brjod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs la yang brjod do //
translated: In the same way, it is said for natural reasons.

original: der yang sha pa'i bdag nyid du //
analyzed: der yang sha pa'i bdag nyid du //
translated: There, if it is understood as having the nature of smoke,

original: rtogs na shing yang go byed nyid //
analyzed: rtogs na shing yang go byed nyid //
translated: then even a tree is the cause of understanding.

original: de bdag bde bar rtogs med pas// go bar byed nyid yod ma yin //
analyzed: de bdag bde bar rtogs med pas// go bar byed nyid yod ma yin //
translated: Because it is not understood as having the nature of fire, it is not the cause of understanding.

original: de lta na yang go byed nyid //
analyzed: de lta na yang go byed nyid //
translated: Even so, it is the cause of understanding.

original: go bar byed nyid yod ma yin //
analyzed: go bar byed nyid yod ma yin //
translated: It is not the cause of understanding.

original: de lta na yang rnam dbyer ni //
analyzed: de lta na yang rnam dbyer ni //
translated: Even so, without difference,

original: med par rtogs pa go byed 'gyur //üîΩde phyir 'bras dang rnam dbye ni ;
analyzed: med par rtogs pa go byed 'gyur // de phyir 'bras dang rnam dbye ni ;
translated: the understanding of non-existence becomes the cause of understanding.üîΩTherefore, all things are not understood

original: / med par dngos kun rtogs ma yin //
analyzed: / med par dngos kun rtogs ma yin //
translated: without effect and difference.

original: ci ltar shing dang me dag sha pa dang du ba de'i bdag nyid dang / rgyur ma nges pa de bzhin du go bar byed pa yang ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ltar shing dang me dag sha pa dang du ba de'i bdag nyid dang / rgyur ma nges pa de bzhin du go bar byed pa yang ma nges pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the fire and the fuel are not ascertained as being of the same nature or as cause and effect, so too the indicator is not ascertained.

original: nges pa yin na ci ltar go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa yin na ci ltar go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: If it is ascertained, how can it not be an indicator?

original: ma nges pa go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason for the non-ascertainment of the indicator exists.

original: @245a gal te de'i rjes su 'jug pa yin pa de lta na de de'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: @245a gal te de'i rjes su 'jug pa yin pa de lta na de de'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If it follows that, in that case, it becomes the reason for that.

original: de ltar ma yin yang der 'gyur na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin yang der 'gyur na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were so even if it were not so, it would follow that it is too much.

original: ldan pa la yang de bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: ldan pa la yang de bzhin no zhe na /
translated: If it is so in the case of possession,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: ldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
analyzed: ldan pa can sogs gang dag la //
translated: those who possess, etc.

original: de 'dra'i 'brel pa yod min pa //
analyzed: de 'dra'i 'brel pa yod min pa //
translated: do not have such a connection.

original: de dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir //
translated: Because error regarding them is possible,

original: gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs min zhes bshad pa yin //
translated: they are explained as not being reasons.

original: rten dang brten pa dag ni ldan pa can yin te /
analyzed: rten dang brten pa dag ni ldan pa can yin te /
translated: The support and the supported are possessors,

original: ldan pas mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldan pas mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are similar to possessors.

original: 'du ba can ni rigs dang bya ba dang / yon tan gyi dngos po dag go //
analyzed: 'du ba can ni rigs dang bya ba dang / yon tan gyi dngos po dag go //
translated: The possessor is the entity of the class, action, and quality.

original: gzhis ni brten pa go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhis ni brten pa go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The substratum is not the revealer,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po zhes bya ba med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po zhes bya ba med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the relation of cause and effect does not exist, that is, because the substratum does not inhere in the class, etc.

original: rigs kyang de bzhin te /
analyzed: rigs kyang de bzhin te /
translated: The class is also not the revealer,

original: gsal ba zhig pa na 'ba' zhig par rtogs pas rigs dang ldan pa rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba zhig pa na 'ba' zhig par rtogs pas rigs dang ldan pa rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: because when the manifestation is destroyed, the class is perceived as existing by itself, and the relation of cause and effect is impossible.üîΩIf the substratum is the revealer,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the relation of cause and effect exists,

original: 'on te brten pas rten go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te brten pas rten go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: then the substratum is the revealer,

original: de la med na mi 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la med na mi 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but the relation of cause and effect does not exist.üîΩIf the substratum is the revealer because the relation of inherence exists,üîΩthen the relation of cause and effect does not exist.

original: de lta na 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid go bar byed pa yin par mi 'gyur gyi /üîΩmed na mi 'byung ba nyid yin no zhes bya bar 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na 'on kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid go bar byed pa yin par mi 'gyur gyi / med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin no zhes bya bar 'dod do zhe na /
translated: If the substratum is the revealer because the relation of cause and effect exists,

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: then the relation of inherence does not exist.

original: med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no ;
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba'i khyad par nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin no ;
translated: The special relationship of invariable concomitance is the nature of cause and effect.

original: / de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: / de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang //
analyzed: 'brel pa yod pa yin na yang //
translated: Even if there is a relationship,

original: de nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin //üîΩnges pa med na mi 'byung yin //
analyzed: de nyid rtogs pa'i sgrub byed yin // nges pa med na mi 'byung yin //
translated: it is the means of knowing that very thing.üîΩIf there is no invariable concomitance,

original: nges pa med pa sgrub byed min //
analyzed: nges pa med pa sgrub byed min //
translated: there is no means of knowing.

original: gzhan gzhan la nges pa de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan gzhan la nges pa de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid do //
translated: That invariable concomitance is the nature of cause and effect.

original: de ma yin na ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: de ma yin na ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: If it were not so, it would not be the means of knowing, as has been explained.

original: rang bzhin 'bras bu grub don du //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'bras bu grub don du //
translated: For the sake of establishing the nature and effect,

original: gtan tshigs gnyis dang bzlog pa gnyis //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis dang bzlog pa gnyis //
translated: two reasons and two reversalsüîΩare taught.

original: ston to zhes bya bar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ston to zhes bya bar bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation.

original: de ni rtsod phyir khyad par spyi dag ste //üîΩzhes bya bas 'chad par byed do //üîΩkhyad par ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de ni rtsod phyir khyad par spyi dag ste // zhes bya bas 'chad par byed do // khyad par ni thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: The special and general are for the sake of debate.

original: gcig tu ldog pa can no //
analyzed: gcig tu ldog pa can no //
translated: The special is the uncommon, which is the reversal of the one.

original: spyi ni rjes su 'gro ba can no ;
analyzed: spyi ni rjes su 'gro ba can no ;
translated: The general is the subsequent.

original: / gzhan dag ma nges pa de gnyis kyang go bar byed par smra bas /
analyzed: / gzhan dag ma nges pa de gnyis kyang go bar byed par smra bas /
translated: The other two, the uncertain, are said to be the cause of understanding.

original: de la slob dpon gyis de la rigs mthun la yod dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas go bar byed pa ma yin pa de nyid ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: de la slob dpon gyis de la rigs mthun la yod dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas go bar byed pa ma yin pa de nyid ston par mdzad do //
translated: In this regard, the master [DignƒÅga] shows that they are not the cause of understanding with [the line], ‚ÄúThat which exists in similar instances . . .‚Äù

original: gal te gcig tu ldog pa can ni go bar byed pa kho nar rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gcig tu ldog pa can ni go bar byed pa kho nar rigs so zhe na /
translated: If it is reasonable that only that which is invariably concomitant is the cause of understanding,

original: gal te gcig @245b las gcig tu ldog par grub na bden pa zhig na de ni ma grub ste /
analyzed: gal te gcig @245b las gcig tu ldog par grub na bden pa zhig na de ni ma grub ste /
translated: if it were established that one thing is invariably concomitant with another, then that would be true, but it is not established.

original: phyogs gnyis la 'khrul par 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis la 'khrul par 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is imputed to be mistaken in regard to two positions.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid //
analyzed: 'di ltar / ldog pa nyid ni nges pa nyid //
translated: Invariability is certainty.

original: med na mi 'byung yin par brjod //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung yin par brjod //
translated: It is said to be the absence of the effect when the cause is absent.

original: de yang 'brel pa med la med //
analyzed: de yang 'brel pa med la med //
translated: And that is not the case when there is no relation.

original: de nyid phyir na rjes 'gro gnas //üîΩsrog la sogs pa bdag med pa la sogs pa 'di nyid ci ltar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: de nyid phyir na rjes 'gro gnas // srog la sogs pa bdag med pa la sogs pa 'di nyid ci ltar 'grub ce na /
translated: Therefore, the invariable concomitance is established.üîΩHow is it established that life force and so on are not the self?

original: gal te bdag dang bcas pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba yin par 'gyur na'o //
analyzed: gal te bdag dang bcas pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba yin par 'gyur na'o //
translated: If it were the case that the absence of the self is invariably concomitant with the absence of life force and so on,

original: de yang ma 'brel pa dag la mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: de yang ma 'brel pa dag la mi 'grub ste /
translated: Moreover, it is not established for those who do not have a connection.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las mi ldog pa'i phyir te rang gi sgo nas ldog par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las mi ldog pa'i phyir te rang gi sgo nas ldog par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not turn away from all discordant factors, because it is not able to turn away from its own side.

original: gang gis de la med do zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad ni mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis de la med do zhes bya bar rtogs par 'gyur ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad ni mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: All discordant factors are not seen, by which one would understand that it does not exist.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ni rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas ni rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is understood by way of concomitance.

original: gang gi phyir nges par 'dzin pa de ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges par 'dzin pa de ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin la /
translated: Because that which is ascertained is the apprehension of a connection.

original: de yang mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i bya ba yin no //
translated: And that is the function of the valid knowledge of perception.

original: des na nges par bzung bas gzhan las ldog pa yang 'phen pa yin te /
analyzed: des na nges par bzung bas gzhan las ldog pa yang 'phen pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, by the ascertainment, the exclusion from other is also projected.

original: de lta ma yin na nges pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na nges pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: Otherwise, it would not apprehend the nature of ascertainment.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gzhan yod na yang de med na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gzhan yod na yang de med na //
translated: If the other exists, it does not exist.

original: de yod na ni yod nyid dang // gzhan med na yang med min pa //
analyzed: de yod na ni yod nyid dang // gzhan med na yang med min pa //
translated: If it exists, it is existence. If the other does not exist, it is not nonexistence.

original: des na de yi 'bras bu rtogs //
analyzed: des na de yi 'bras bu rtogs //
translated: Therefore, its effect is understood.

original: gang gi tshe can dan gyi dri gzhan yod kyang 'byung ba med pa /
analyzed: gang gi tshe can dan gyi dri gzhan yod kyang 'byung ba med pa /
translated: When the smell of sandalwood is present, even though other things are present, the smell of sandalwood is the effect of that, but not of others.

original: de yod na ni yod pa de'i tsan dan gyi dri de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes 'grub kyi gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir nges par grub po //
analyzed: de yod na ni yod pa de'i tsan dan gyi dri de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes 'grub kyi gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir nges par grub po //
translated: Thus, it is definitely established that the effect is produced from that.

original: de yang ldog pa med na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang ldog pa med na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is established because it is not present when that is absent.

original: de yi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i ldog pa yang grub po //
analyzed: de yi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i ldog pa yang grub po //
translated: And the absence of that is established as the identity of that.

original: gal te thams cad du ni 'di ni 'di las skye ba yin zhes rjes su 'gro ba yang khyad par mi 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad du ni 'di ni 'di las skye ba yin zhes rjes su 'gro ba yang khyad par mi 'grub po zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the pervasion is not established because it is not established that ‚Äúthis is produced from that,‚Äù

original: de ni med de /
analyzed: de ni med de /
translated: that is not so.

original: 'di nyid las ni 'di skye zhes //
analyzed: 'di nyid las ni 'di skye zhes //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is produced from this,‚Äù

original: de tsam gyis ni de rtogs 'gyur //üîΩde yang gzhan las mi skye bar //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni de rtogs 'gyur // de yang gzhan las mi skye bar //
translated: that is understood by just that.

original: de nyid de ltar rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: de nyid de ltar rtogs pa yin //
translated: And that is understood as it is,üîΩthat it is not produced from another.

original: 'di 'di las gzhan du yang 'byung ba nyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'di las gzhan du yang 'byung ba nyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThis also occurs from another‚Äù is not a reason for understanding that.

original: 'on kyang 'di nyid las 'byung gi gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di nyid las 'byung gi gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: But it is from this, not from anything else.

original: de ltar yang de las gzhan las sngar gyi skye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar yang de las gzhan las sngar gyi skye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: And in this way, since it is not seen that it arises from anything else,

original: de yod na de ma thag nyid du nges pa rnams la rtogs @246a * //
analyzed: de yod na de ma thag nyid du nges pa rnams la rtogs @246a * //
translated: if it exists, it is ascertained that it is immediately antecedent.

original: pa yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: pa yod pa nyid do //
translated: And it is understood that it exists.

original: gal te gzhan gang rung rung las mi skyer zin kyang gzhan gyi khyad par las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gzhan gang rung rung las mi skyer zin kyang gzhan gyi khyad par las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it is not the case that it arises from anything whatsoever, it arises from the particular other.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba tsam gyis thams cad mtshungs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba tsam gyis thams cad mtshungs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that everything is the same merely by being other.

original: des na ldog pa med do //
analyzed: des na ldog pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no counterexample.

original: de yod na yod do zhes bya ba'i ldog pa yang mi 'grub ste ;
analyzed: de yod na yod do zhes bya ba'i ldog pa yang mi 'grub ste ;
translated: And the counterexample, ‚ÄúIf it exists, it exists,‚Äù is not established,

original: ma mthong ba las srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong ba las srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is possible that it is not seen.

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: That is not correct.

original: 'di ltar / khyod kyi gtan tshigs 'di ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ltar / khyod kyi gtan tshigs 'di ltar 'gyur //
translated: Because your reason is like this:

original: 'di ni khyod nyid rjes 'dzin yin //
analyzed: 'di ni khyod nyid rjes 'dzin yin //
translated: This is just your own acceptance.

original: rang nyid rjes 'dzin mi 'dod na //
analyzed: rang nyid rjes 'dzin mi 'dod na //
translated: If you do not accept your own acceptance,

original: kun du khyed nyid la gnod 'gyur //
analyzed: kun du khyed nyid la gnod 'gyur //
translated: you are completely undermining yourself.

original: khyed kyi gtan tshigs ni 'di ltar go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: khyed kyi gtan tshigs ni 'di ltar go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: Your argument is understood in this way:

original: rnam pa gzhan du mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: because it is impossible in any other way.üîΩIf you do not accept this, then seek another basis.

original: gal te de ltar mi 'dod na rten gzhan tshol cig / srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de ltar mi 'dod na rten gzhan tshol cig / srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not possible,

original: de lta na ni rang la gnod par bya ba'i phyir zug gzer 'tsho ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni rang la gnod par bya ba'i phyir zug gzer 'tsho ba yin no //
translated: because in that case, the pain would be the life of the one who is hurt.

original: gzhan yang / gal te gzhan yang rgyu yin na //üîΩde med pas na mod pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te gzhan yang rgyu yin na // de med pas na mod pa ni //
translated: Moreover, if another is the cause,

original: ci ltar med par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: ci ltar med par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: how could the effect be nonexistentüîΩwhen that other exists?

original: de ma thag tu 'ang mi 'gyur 'di //
analyzed: de ma thag tu 'ang mi 'gyur 'di //
translated: It would not be immediate,

original: mthun pa'i tshogs nye bar gnas pa las byung ba kho na yin na /
analyzed: mthun pa'i tshogs nye bar gnas pa las byung ba kho na yin na /
translated: because it would arise only from the presence of a collection of concordant conditions.

original: de med na ni de ma thag tu med par 'gyur ba'i phyir sha za ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi rgyur srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de med na ni de ma thag tu med par 'gyur ba'i phyir sha za ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi rgyur srid pa ma yin no //
translated: When that other does not exist, it would not be immediate. Therefore, it is not possible that another, such as a ghost, is the cause.

original: gal te de yang de ma thag pa nyid du yod pa dang med par 'gyur ba yin no zhes khas len na /
analyzed: gal te de yang de ma thag pa nyid du yod pa dang med par 'gyur ba yin no zhes khas len na /
translated: If you accept that it would exist and not exist immediately after that other,

original: 'on ni sha za de me'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir me nyid rgyu'i dngos po'i yin no //
analyzed: 'on ni sha za de me'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir me nyid rgyu'i dngos po'i yin no //
translated: But since the flesh-eater is under the power of the fire, the fire is the cause of the flesh-eater.

original: gal te gzhan las kyang 'gyur ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pas 'dod rgyal ba'i mi slu ba yin pa'i phyir na rtogs pa sngon du byed pa rnams kyis 'bras bu so so la nges pa'i thabs tshol ba gang yin pa der mi 'gyur
analyzed: gal te gzhan las kyang 'gyur ba ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med pas 'dod rgyal ba'i mi slu ba yin pa'i phyir na rtogs pa sngon du byed pa rnams kyis 'bras bu so so la nges pa'i thabs tshol ba gang yin pa der mi 'gyur
translated: If it were the case that something arose from something else, then since there would be no positive or negative concomitance, there would be no way to ascertain the individual effects of causes, because it would be arbitrary and deceptive.

original: ro // gnyis su med par smra ba kho bo cag la ni don dam par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ro // gnyis su med par smra ba kho bo cag la ni don dam par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But for us, who are nondualists, the so-called causal relation does not exist ultimately.

original: de'i phyir 'brel pa sgrub pa'i tshad mkhas len na rjes su 'gro ba gsal bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'brel pa sgrub pa'i tshad mkhas len na rjes su 'gro ba gsal bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when the expert establishes the relation, the positive concomitance will be established.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: rang bzhin dag gam rgyu dngos ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag gam rgyu dngos ni //
translated: If the nature or the cause

original: grub na ldog pa grub 'gyur ba //
analyzed: grub na ldog pa grub 'gyur ba //
translated: Is established, the counter-pervasion is established.

original: de yi phyir na khyad par ni //
analyzed: de yi phyir na khyad par ni //
translated: Therefore, the distinction

original: ldog med rjes 'gro yod ma yin //
analyzed: ldog med rjes 'gro yod ma yin //
translated: Does not exist without the counter-pervasion.

original: de'i bdag nyid la nges par ma yin pa ni de med pas nges par ldog pa ma yin no //üîΩ'brel pa med pa ni rang ldog pas gzhan ldog par byed pa ma yin te /üîΩthal ches @246b par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid la nges par ma yin pa ni de med pas nges par ldog pa ma yin no // 'brel pa med pa ni rang ldog pas gzhan ldog par byed pa ma yin te / thal ches @246b par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the case that the absence of the nature of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not ascertained that the absence of the nature of that is the absence of that.

original: 'brel pa dang ldan pa khyab par byed pa ma yin pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: 'brel pa dang ldan pa khyab par byed pa ma yin pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Nor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.

original: de'i bdag nyid de las byung ba'i 'brel pa med par khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //üîΩrnam pa gzhan gyis kyang ci ste ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid de las byung ba'i 'brel pa med par khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba yang ma yin no // rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang ci ste ma yin zhe na /
translated: Nor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.

original: ma yin te 'brel pa rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrnam pa de nyid kyang rtog pa nyid 'dod par sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: ma yin te 'brel pa rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro // rnam pa de nyid kyang rtog pa nyid 'dod par sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: Nor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.

original: de ltar yang mi 'gyur te des na ldog pa can du 'dod pa ni ldog pa yang med la rjes su 'gro ba yang med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang mi 'gyur te des na ldog pa can du 'dod pa ni ldog pa yang med la rjes su 'gro ba yang med pa yin no //
translated: Nor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of the relation of that is ascertained by the absence of that, because it is not the case that the absence of the relation of that is the absence of that.üîΩNor is it the case that the absence of

original: des na gnyi ga med pa'i phyir gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa ste ;
analyzed: des na gnyi ga med pa'i phyir gson po'i lus ni bdag dang bcas pa ste ;
translated: Therefore, because neither is the case, the living body is not the self,

original: srog pa sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: srog pa sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni go bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: because it is endowed with life and so on. This is not an explanation.

original: 'on te gnyi ga med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'di slob dpon gyis ldog pa can du gsungs te /
analyzed: 'on te gnyi ga med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'di slob dpon gyis ldog pa can du gsungs te /
translated: But if neither is the case, why did the Master state the contrapositive?

original: des kyang 'di nyid gsung bar 'os par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des kyang 'di nyid gsung bar 'os par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: It would be appropriate for him to state this.

original: skyon 'di med de /üîΩ'di ltar / ma mthong ba tsam la brten nas //
analyzed: skyon 'di med de / 'di ltar / ma mthong ba tsam la brten nas //
translated: This fault does not exist.üîΩBecause:

original: ldog pa 'ba' zhig can du zad //
analyzed: ldog pa 'ba' zhig can du zad //
translated: The contrapositive is merely based on the nonobservation of that.

original: de yi phyir na ma nges pa //
analyzed: de yi phyir na ma nges pa //
translated: Therefore, it is uncertain,

original: gzhan du go bar byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan du go bar byed par 'gyur //
translated: and it is understood in another way.

original: gzhan gyi bsam pa ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par 'grub pa la brten nas /
analyzed: gzhan gyi bsam pa ma mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par 'grub pa la brten nas /
translated: The contrapositive is established merely based on the nonobservation of the thought of another.

original: slob dpon gyis 'di ldog pa can du gsungs kyi ldog pa nges pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis 'di ldog pa can du gsungs kyi ldog pa nges pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The Master stated this as the contrapositive, but it is not certain.

original: de lta ma yin na ldog pa nges pa yod pas go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ldog pa nges pa yod pas go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were not so, it would be an explanation because the contrapositive would be certain.

original: de lta na yang slob dpon gyis 'di ma nges pa'i nang du 'god par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang slob dpon gyis 'di ma nges pa'i nang du 'god par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But the master does not posit this as uncertain.

original: de'i phyir 'di slob dpon gyis 'di ldog pa nges pa dang ldan par bzhed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di slob dpon gyis 'di ldog pa nges pa dang ldan par bzhed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the master does not assert that this has a definite negation.

original: gal te srog la sogs pa med pas ni bdag med pa la khyab pa yin la de yang gson po'i lus la med pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa log pas gson po'i lus la khyab par bya ba bdag med pa gdon mi za bar ldog pas na ji
analyzed: gal te srog la sogs pa med pas ni bdag med pa la khyab pa yin la de yang gson po'i lus la med pa'i phyir khyab par byed pa log pas gson po'i lus la khyab par bya ba bdag med pa gdon mi za bar ldog pas na ji
translated: If the nonexistence of the self is pervaded by the nonexistence of life force and so on, and that also does not exist in the living body, then because the pervader is negated, the pervaded, the nonexistence of the self, must also be negated in the living body.

original: ltar bdag dang bcas par mi 'grub ce na /
analyzed: ltar bdag dang bcas par mi 'grub ce na /
translated: So how could it be established that the self exists?

original: mi 'grub ste 'di ltar /
analyzed: mi 'grub ste 'di ltar /
translated: It is not established because of the following.

original: gal te bdag ni ldog pa yis //
analyzed: gal te bdag ni ldog pa yis //
translated: If the self were to cease

original: srog sogs dag ni ldog 'gyur na //
analyzed: srog sogs dag ni ldog 'gyur na //
translated: Through the cessation of life force and so on,

original: srog sogs med pas bdag med la //
analyzed: srog sogs med pas bdag med la //
translated: Then the nonexistence of the self would be pervaded by the nonexistence of life force and so on,

original: khyab gyur de yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: khyab gyur de yang yod ma yin //
translated: But that also does not exist.

original: gal te mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag khyab pa bsgrub pa yin na de'i tshe srog la sogs pa med pa log pa na gson po'i lus la bdag med pa ldog pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med kyang @247a * //üîΩbdag 'grub par 'gyur ba zhig na mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gi khyab pa de nyid ni /
analyzed: gal te mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag khyab pa bsgrub pa yin na de'i tshe srog la sogs pa med pa log pa na gson po'i lus la bdag med pa ldog pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med kyang @247a * // bdag 'grub par 'gyur ba zhig na mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gi khyab pa de nyid ni /
translated: But although there is no positive concomitance, the self would not be established.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyab pa med par mi 'grub po //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyab pa med par mi 'grub po //
translated: The pervasion of the discordant side itself is not established without the pervasion of the concordant side.

original: bdag dang bcas pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ldog par byed pa nyid du mi 'grub la /
analyzed: bdag dang bcas pa dang 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ldog par byed pa nyid du mi 'grub la /
translated: It is not established that the absence of the relation of possession of self is the reversal of the relation of possession of self.

original: ldog par byed pa ma yin pa ldog pa ni zla bo ni bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa ldog pas khyab pa mi 'grub po //
analyzed: ldog par byed pa ma yin pa ldog pa ni zla bo ni bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa ldog pas khyab pa mi 'grub po //
translated: The reversal of the non-reversal is pervaded by the reversal of the non-reversal of the discordant side.

original: de'i phyir khyab par bya ba ma yin pa'i ldog pa med pas khyab par byed pa ma yin pa'i ldog pa med par mi 'grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyab par bya ba ma yin pa'i ldog pa med pas khyab par byed pa ma yin pa'i ldog pa med par mi 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, the absence of the reversal of the non-pervasion of the pervaded is not established as the absence of the reversal of the non-pervasion of the pervader.

original: bdag dang bcas par 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ldog par byed pa nyid du mi 'grub la /
analyzed: bdag dang bcas par 'brel pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ldog par byed pa nyid du mi 'grub la /
translated: Since it is not related to the self, it is not established as the agent of cessation.

original: ldog par byed pa ma yin la ldog pa'i phyir bdag mi 'grub po //üîΩgzhan ldog par ni gyur pa yis //
analyzed: ldog par byed pa ma yin la ldog pa'i phyir bdag mi 'grub po // gzhan ldog par ni gyur pa yis //
translated: Since it is not the agent of cessation, the self is not established as the object of cessation.üîΩIf one thing ceases,üîΩanother does not arise.

original: gzhan ldog pa ni mi rung phyir //
analyzed: gzhan ldog pa ni mi rung phyir //
translated: If one thing ceases, another does not arise.

original: gal te 'brel pa med kyang ldog na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa med kyang ldog na ni /
translated: If cessation were to occur without a relationship,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: there would be an absurd consequence.

original: de bdag de las byung zhe na /
analyzed: de bdag de las byung zhe na /
translated: If you say that the self arises from that,

original: ci ste 'di thams cad ni bdag kho na'i zhes bya bas srog la sogs pa bdag nyid yin pa'am /
analyzed: ci ste 'di thams cad ni bdag kho na'i zhes bya bas srog la sogs pa bdag nyid yin pa'am /
translated: since it is said that ‚Äúall of this is just the self,‚Äù the life-force and so on are the self,

original: yang na de las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: yang na de las byung ba yin te /
translated: or else they arise from that,

original: bdag 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: bdag 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because the self is the cause of the collection.

original: 'di ni lan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni lan ma yin te /
translated: This is not a response.

original: 'di ltar / gal te bdag ni dmigs pa na //üîΩde dmigs rtogs pa med par yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te bdag ni dmigs pa na // de dmigs rtogs pa med par yang //
translated: If the self were to be observed,üîΩit would be observed without being realized.

original: ma rtogs na 'di 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma rtogs na 'di 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: If it is not realized, it would be established.

original: gal te bdag dmigs pa yin na de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir gzhan yang de'i rang bzhin yin no zhes 'grub pa zhig na /
analyzed: gal te bdag dmigs pa yin na de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir gzhan yang de'i rang bzhin yin no zhes 'grub pa zhig na /
translated: If the self were the object of perception, then since it would be of the nature of the self, it would be established that the other is also of its nature.

original: de nyid ma dmigs pas ji ltar de'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs su 'grub /
analyzed: de nyid ma dmigs pas ji ltar de'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs su 'grub /
translated: But since it is not perceived, how can it be established as a reason that ‚Äúbecause it is the characteristic of that‚Äù?

original: 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo'i rgyur 'du ba yang yod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la'o snyam pa'i blo'i rgyur 'du ba yang yod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it would not exist as the cause of the cognition ‚Äúthis is that,‚Äù

original: bdag ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni //
analyzed: bdag ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni //
translated: because the self is not perceived.

original: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa sgrub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa sgrub pa yin gyi /
translated: The nature of cause and effect is established by perception and non-perception.

original: bdag mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But since the self is not perceived,

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: how can it be of the nature of that or arise from that?

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la //
analyzed: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la //
translated: that which is very hidden

original: mthong dang ma mthong de grub med //
analyzed: mthong dang ma mthong de grub med //
translated: is not established by seeing or not seeing.üîΩAnd a pot, etc. is not selfless,

original: bum pa la sogs pa bdag med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa bdag med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: because

original: 'di ltar / shin tu lkog tu gyur pa ni //üîΩmi dmigs pa las med mi rtogs //
analyzed: 'di ltar / shin tu lkog tu gyur pa ni // mi dmigs pa las med mi rtogs //
translated: that which is very hiddenüîΩis not known to be nonexistent except by non-perception.

original: bdag med pa ni grub med na //
analyzed: bdag med pa ni grub med na //
translated: If selflessness is not established,

original: de yi khyab pa ci ltar rtogs //
analyzed: de yi khyab pa ci ltar rtogs //
translated: How is the pervasion understood?

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa ma dmigs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni rgyu @247b dang khyab par byed pa'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba yin na ni bdag gi dmigs par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa ma dmigs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni rgyu @247b dang khyab par byed pa'i sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba yin na ni bdag gi dmigs par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If the non-apprehension of the object-character is the reason for the pervasion and the reason for the cause, then the self is not the object of apprehension.

original: des na ci ltar de rgyu dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po yin te /
analyzed: des na ci ltar de rgyu dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po yin te /
translated: How then can it be the cause and the pervader?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: It cannot be.

original: yang srog la sogs pa de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba yin no zhes mi 'grub po //
analyzed: yang srog la sogs pa de'i bdag nyid dang de las byung ba yin no zhes mi 'grub po //
translated: Moreover, it is not established that life, etc. are of the nature of the self or arise from the self.üîΩMoreover,üîΩHow can the absence of a pot, etc. be known

original: gzhan yang / gzhan la mthong med ngo bo can //üîΩbum sogs la med ces gang las //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gzhan la mthong med ngo bo can // bum sogs la med ces gang las //
translated: when the nature of the other is not seen?

original: ldog pa shes pa med pa yi //
analyzed: ldog pa shes pa med pa yi //
translated: Without the knowledge of the absence,

original: ldog pa'i khyab pa ci ltar yin //
analyzed: ldog pa'i khyab pa ci ltar yin //
translated: how can there be the pervasion of the absence?

original: gang zhig yul lam dus gzhan du mthong ba de ni da ltar 'di na med do zhes rtogs so zhes bya ba ni mtha' dag la grags pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig yul lam dus gzhan du mthong ba de ni da ltar 'di na med do zhes rtogs so zhes bya ba ni mtha' dag la grags pa yin no //
translated: It is well known that when something is seen in another place or time, it is understood to be absent here now.

original: de gang zhig nam yang rtogs pa'i yul du 'gyur ba myong ba de go de na med do zhes ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: de gang zhig nam yang rtogs pa'i yul du 'gyur ba myong ba de go de na med do zhes ci ltar rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: mthong ba med la 'ga' yang ni //
analyzed: mthong ba med la 'ga' yang ni //
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: gang du'ang rtogs par 'jug par byed //
analyzed: gang du'ang rtogs par 'jug par byed //
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.

original: thams cad la ni ltos pa can //
analyzed: thams cad la ni ltos pa can //
translated: One does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: de bdag 'gog pa tsam du zad //
analyzed: de bdag 'gog pa tsam du zad //
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.

original: 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba nyid gzhan du mthong na yod dam med snyam du rtog pa 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu mthong ba nyid gzhan du mthong na yod dam med snyam du rtog pa 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: One does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: med do zhes nges par gang las yin te de ltar na 'gog na gzhan gyi bdag nyid ma yin no zhes de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog pa tsam du zad kyi /
analyzed: med do zhes nges par gang las yin te de ltar na 'gog na gzhan gyi bdag nyid ma yin no zhes de'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog pa tsam du zad kyi /
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: bum pa la sogs pa la bdag med do zhes nges par ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la bdag med do zhes nges par ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: khyab pa nyid yin na ni shin tu gsal bar yang med par nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid yin na ni shin tu gsal bar yang med par nges pa ma yin no //
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: des dben par ni dmigs pas na //
analyzed: des dben par ni dmigs pas na //
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anything

original: gal te bum sogs bdag med du //
analyzed: gal te bum sogs bdag med du //
translated: that is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.üîΩOne does not see anythingüîΩthat is not an object of knowledge.

original: des na de ltar gson pa'i lus la yang //
analyzed: des na de ltar gson pa'i lus la yang //
translated: Therefore, the body of the living person is also like that.

original: de ni med ces bya bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni med ces bya bar 'gyur //
translated: It is said that the self does not exist in the body of the living person.

original: ci ltar bum pa la sogs pa bdag gis dben par dmigs pas bdag med pa zhes bya bar rtogs pa de bzhin du gson po'i lus la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ltar bum pa la sogs pa bdag gis dben par dmigs pas bdag med pa zhes bya bar rtogs pa de bzhin du gson po'i lus la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as a pot, etc., is understood to be ‚Äúwithout self‚Äù because it is perceived to be devoid of self, so it is with the body of the living person.

original: de yang des dben par ma dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang des dben par ma dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that the body of the living person is not perceived to be devoid of self.

original: des na dmigs par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na dmigs par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is not an object of perception,

original: bum pa la sogs par bdag med par mi rtogs so //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs par bdag med par mi rtogs so //
translated: the body of the living person is not understood to be without self, as a pot, etc., is.

original: des na ldog pa shes pa med pa'i bdag gi ldog pa'i khyab pa /
analyzed: des na ldog pa shes pa med pa'i bdag gi ldog pa'i khyab pa /
translated: Thus, the pervasion of the absence of the self by the absence of the living body is not known.

original: srog la sogs pa med pa la ldog pa la bdag gis khyab pa ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa med pa la ldog pa la bdag gis khyab pa ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: How can the absence of the living body pervade the absence of the self?

original: gang zhig ldog pas gang khyab par ldog pa khyab pa de ldog pa ni des khyab par 'gyur pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gang zhig ldog pas gang khyab par ldog pa khyab pa de ldog pa ni des khyab par 'gyur pa yin na ni /
translated: If the absence of the living body pervades the absence of the self, then the absence of the living body would be pervaded by the absence of the self.

original: bdag ldog pa ni ma grub pa srog la sogs ldog pas khyab po zhes mi shes te de'i phyir ci ltar srog la sogs pa med pa ldog pa @248a * //
analyzed: bdag ldog pa ni ma grub pa srog la sogs ldog pas khyab po zhes mi shes te de'i phyir ci ltar srog la sogs pa med pa ldog pa @248a * //
translated: But it is not known that the reversal of the self is necessarily the reversal of life force and so on. Therefore, just as the nonexistence of life force and so on is not the reversal of the self,

original: bdag gis khyab pa mi 'grub pa de'i phyir 'di la ldog pa nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag gis khyab pa mi 'grub pa de'i phyir 'di la ldog pa nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the nonexistence of the self is not the reversal of life force and so on. Since it is not established that the reversal of the self is necessarily the reversal of life force and so on, there is no certainty that the self is reversed.

original: gal te ci ltar bum pa la sogs pa la srog la sogs pa med do zhes rtogs pa de bzhin du bdag med do zhes ci ste mi rtogs she na /
analyzed: gal te ci ltar bum pa la sogs pa la srog la sogs pa med do zhes rtogs pa de bzhin du bdag med do zhes ci ste mi rtogs she na /
translated: But if it is asked, ‚ÄúJust as it is understood that life force and so on do not exist in a vase and so on, why is it not understood that the self does not exist?‚Äù

original: mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa ste /
analyzed: mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa ste /
translated: The response is that this is a case of inappropriate analogy.üîΩFor,

original: 'di ltar ; srog sogs la lar mthong ba yis //
analyzed: 'di ltar ; srog sogs la lar mthong ba yis //
translated: In some places, life force and so on are seen,

original: yod med gnyis ni rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: yod med gnyis ni rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: and thus existence and nonexistence are understood.

original: mi dmigs pa tsam las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tsam las ni ma yin no //
translated: But this is not the case with the self.

original: gal te de ltar bdag mthong na //
analyzed: gal te de ltar bdag mthong na //
translated: If the self were seen in that way,

original: yod med gnyis ni rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: yod med gnyis ni rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: existence and nonexistence would be understood.

original: srog la sogs pa ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir gson po'i lus ma yin pa la med par rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa ni dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir gson po'i lus ma yin pa la med par rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: But since life force and so on are characterized by being observed, it is understood that they do not exist in a body that is not alive.

original: bdag ni de ma yin pa'i phyir bzlog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag ni de ma yin pa'i phyir bzlog pa ma yin no //
translated: But since the self is not like that, it is not refuted.

original: gzhan yang bum pa la sogs pa bdag med pa yin du chug pa de lta na yang srog la sogs pa med pa ldog pas bdag 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang bum pa la sogs pa bdag med pa yin du chug pa de lta na yang srog la sogs pa med pa ldog pas bdag 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, even if such things as a pot are selfless, still, since life force, etc. are not refuted, the self is not established.

original: gal te gson po'i lus la bdag med na srog la sogs pa yang yod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gson po'i lus la bdag med na srog la sogs pa yang yod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the body of a living being is selfless, then life force, etc. would not exist.

original: bum pa la sogs pa la srog la sogs pa ldog par byed pa ni bdag med pa yin par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la srog la sogs pa ldog par byed pa ni bdag med pa yin par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the absence of self is seen to refute life force, etc. in such things as a pot.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: gzhan med pa ldog par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan med pa ldog par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the absence of another does not refute.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / rgyu gang zhig ni med pa yis ;
analyzed: 'di ltar / rgyu gang zhig ni med pa yis ;
translated: Since the absence of a cause

original: / bum pa la srog mthong med pa //
analyzed: / bum pa la srog mthong med pa //
translated: Is not seen in a pot,

original: lus ya'ang gal te de med na //
analyzed: lus ya'ang gal te de med na //
translated: If life force, etc. do not exist in the body,

original: lus la med par rigs ma yin //
analyzed: lus la med par rigs ma yin //
translated: It is not reasonable that they do not exist in the body.

original: bum pa la sogs pa la ni blo dang rtsol ba la sogs pa yang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la ni blo dang rtsol ba la sogs pa yang med pa nyid do //
translated: In such things as a pot, intelligence, effort, etc. do not exist.

original: de'i phyir ci ste med pas srog la sogs pa log pa yin nam /
analyzed: de'i phyir ci ste med pas srog la sogs pa log pa yin nam /
translated: Therefore, why is it that life force, etc. are refuted by their absence?

original: 'on te bdag med pa yin zhes //
analyzed: 'on te bdag med pa yin zhes //
translated: Or is it that it is selfless?

original: 'dir khyod la the tshom med pa'i rgyu ci zhig yod /üîΩgang du blo la sogs pa'i rgyu gang zhig med pas /
analyzed: 'dir khyod la the tshom med pa'i rgyu ci zhig yod / gang du blo la sogs pa'i rgyu gang zhig med pas /
translated: What is the reason for your doubt here?

original: bum pa la srog mi snang ba de nyid gal te lus la med par 'gyur na srog la sogs pas stong par thal ba yin na /
analyzed: bum pa la srog mi snang ba de nyid gal te lus la med par 'gyur na srog la sogs pas stong par thal ba yin na /
translated: If the absence of a cause such as mind is the reason why life force does not appear in a pot, then it follows that the body is empty of life force, and so on, because it is devoid of a cause such as mind.

original: blo la sogs pas ni med pa ma yin pas de ci ltar srog la sogs pa ldog par thal ba yin /üîΩ'on te gson po'i lus dang bum pa la sogs pa bdag med par chos mtshungs pa yin na gal te blo la sogs pa yod pa dang med pas byas pa'i chos mi mthun pa yod pa de ltar na yang bdag med pa yin pa'i phyir gson po'i lus
analyzed: blo la sogs pas ni med pa ma yin pas de ci ltar srog la sogs pa ldog par thal ba yin / 'on te gson po'i lus dang bum pa la sogs pa bdag med par chos mtshungs pa yin na gal te blo la sogs pa yod pa dang med pas byas pa'i chos mi mthun pa yod pa de ltar na yang bdag med pa yin pa'i phyir gson po'i lus
translated: But since it is not devoid of mind and so on, how could it follow that life force and so on are absent?

original: kyang srog la sogs pas stong @248b par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kyang srog la sogs pas stong @248b par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the living body and the pot are similar in being selfless, then even if there is a difference in their properties, such as the presence or absence of mind and so on, the living body would be empty of life force and so on because it is selfless.

original: srog la sogs pa med pas chos mi mthun pa nyid yin na yang /
analyzed: srog la sogs pa med pas chos mi mthun pa nyid yin na yang /
translated: If there is a difference in their properties due to the absence of life force and so on,

original: bdag dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bdag dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then they would possess a self.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: To respond:

original: gal te cung zad chos mthun phyir //üîΩtha dad pa yang de rtogs na //
analyzed: gal te cung zad chos mthun phyir // tha dad pa yang de rtogs na //
translated: If, on the other hand, the pot is understood to be different from the cloth because of a slight similarity,

original: de'i tshe / gzhal bya nyid phyir bum sogs rnams //üîΩbdag dang bcas par cis mi dpog / cung zad tsam gyis kyang chos mthun pa med pa de lta bu ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe / gzhal bya nyid phyir bum sogs rnams // bdag dang bcas par cis mi dpog / cung zad tsam gyis kyang chos mthun pa med pa de lta bu ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then at that time,üîΩwhy is it not understood that the pot, etc. are endowed with a self because of being objects of knowledge?üîΩThere is no such thing as a slight similarity.

original: mi 'dod ce na tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: mi 'dod ce na tshad ma nyid //
translated: If you do not accept this, then

original: 'dod pa kun gyi rgyu yin te //
analyzed: 'dod pa kun gyi rgyu yin te //
translated: the cause of all desire is valid cognition.üîΩWithout it, how can you posit

original: de med par ni dngos po dang // dngos med rnam gzhag gang gis nus //
analyzed: de med par ni dngos po dang // dngos med rnam gzhag gang gis nus //
translated: an existent or a non-existent?

original: 'dod pas ni tshad mar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dod pas ni tshad mar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Desire does not become valid cognition.

original: 'on kyang gang la tshad ma yod pa de la rtog pa dang ldan pa 'dod par 'gyur ba yin no //
