translated: Therefore, the meaning of the term ‚Äúessencelessness‚Äù is just that.

original: 'o na ji ltar yod ces tha snyad du byed ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar yod ces tha snyad du byed ce na /
translated: If that is so, how can it be conventionally said to exist?

original: sgra 'jug pa'i phyir yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs so //üîΩsgra 'jug pa'i @254a * //
analyzed: sgra 'jug pa'i phyir yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs so // sgra 'jug pa'i @254a * //
translated: It exists is a conventional expression because the word is used.

original: mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad las yod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad las yod do zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The word exists is used in the sense of the definition of the word.

original: gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba ni spyi la sogs par 'dzin par bzlog pa'i don du mi rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba ni spyi la sogs par 'dzin par bzlog pa'i don du mi rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: The word exclusion of other is used to prevent the apprehension of universals, etc.

original: gal te cung zad kyang ma yin no zhes brjod na ni gzhan dag skrag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te cung zad kyang ma yin no zhes brjod na ni gzhan dag skrag par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one says it is nothing at all, others will be frightened.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de yang tha snyad rten par 'dod ces smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de yang tha snyad rten par 'dod ces smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, That is also accepted as the basis of convention.

original: de lta ma yin na ni tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro zhes te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro zhes te /
translated: Otherwise, convention would be cut off,

original: gzhan dag spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: that is, others would be excluded.

original: 'di ltar / sgra las gzhan ni rnam gcod 'dir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sgra las gzhan ni rnam gcod 'dir //
translated: Thus: In this exclusion of other,

original: rtogs pa rnams kyi phan tshun gyi //üîΩrgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: rtogs pa rnams kyi phan tshun gyi // rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyis ni //
translated: the understanding of othersüîΩis only the existence of a thing

original: dngos po 'ba' zhig yod pa yin //
analyzed: dngos po 'ba' zhig yod pa yin //
translated: by the relation of cause and effect.

original: me 'on cig ces brjod pa na me ma rtogs kyang me ma yin pa spangs nas 'jug go //
analyzed: me 'on cig ces brjod pa na me ma rtogs kyang me ma yin pa spangs nas 'jug go //
translated: When one says ‚ÄúBring the fire,‚Äù one engages in the action of bringing without understanding fire, but having excluded what is not fire.

original: sgra las ni dngos po la ma reg pa'i rnam par rtog pa rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa skye ba la brten pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra las ni dngos po la ma reg pa'i rnam par rtog pa rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa skye ba la brten pa yin la /
translated: From sound, there arises the conceptual cognition that apprehends the nature of the object without contacting the object.

original: de las ni 'jug pa'i rnam par rtog pa de las ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba de las ni thob pa'am de ltar ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de las ni 'jug pa'i rnam par rtog pa de las ni 'gro ba'i rang bzhin nyams su myong ba de las ni thob pa'am de ltar ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad du 'gyur gyi /
translated: From that, there arises the conceptual cognition that engages in the action. From that, there arises the experience of the nature of the action. From that, there arises the convention of ‚Äúattaining‚Äù or ‚Äúnot attaining.‚Äù

original: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no such thing as the so-called expressed and the expresser.

original: de lta min na don rnams kyi chos gcig bsgrubs sam bkag pa na /
analyzed: de lta min na don rnams kyi chos gcig bsgrubs sam bkag pa na /
translated: If that were not so, then when one establishes or refutes a property of objects,üîΩall of the nature of the object would be established or refuted,

original: bdag nyid thams cad bsgrubs pa dang // bkag 'gyur bdag tha dad med phyir //
analyzed: bdag nyid thams cad bsgrubs pa dang // bkag 'gyur bdag tha dad med phyir //
translated: because the nature of the object is not different.

original: tha dad yin na gzhan dang gzhan //
analyzed: tha dad yin na gzhan dang gzhan //
translated: If it were different,

original: bkag pa dang ni bsgrub pa yin //
analyzed: bkag pa dang ni bsgrub pa yin //
translated: it would be refuted or established.üîΩEstablishment and refutation

original: bsgrub pa dang ni dgag pa dag / chos can gcig la 'du mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang ni dgag pa dag / chos can gcig la 'du mi 'gyur //
translated: would not be combined in a single basis.

original: gal te chos rnams chos can las tha mi dad pa yin pa de'i tshe chos gcig bsgrub pa'am /
analyzed: gal te chos rnams chos can las tha mi dad pa yin pa de'i tshe chos gcig bsgrub pa'am /
translated: If phenomena are not different from their bases of designation, then when one phenomenon is established, all phenomena would be established.üîΩ

original: 'gog pa ni thams cad bsgrub pa'am bkag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni thams cad bsgrub pa'am bkag par 'gyur ro //
translated: If phenomena are not different from the basis of characteristic, then when one phenomenon is established or refuted, all are established or refuted.

original: de bsgrubs pa na de'i bdag nyid ma bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bsgrubs pa na de'i bdag nyid ma bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: When one is established, it is not the case that the nature of the other is not established,

original: de yang ma bsgrubs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang ma bsgrubs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that it is not established.

original: dgag pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dgag pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: Refutation is similar to that.

original: dum bur bsgrub pa dang 'gog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dum bur bsgrub pa dang 'gog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not established or refuted in part,

original: tha dad med pas dum bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad med pas dum bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no part without difference.

original: sgra nges de bsgrubs pas na de'i bdag nyid ma bsgrubs par ni mi 'thad do //
analyzed: sgra nges de bsgrubs pas na de'i bdag nyid ma bsgrubs par ni mi 'thad do //
translated: It is not tenable that when sound is established, the nature of the other is not established.

original: da bsgrubs pa nyid yin mod kyi 'khrul pas ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: da bsgrubs pa nyid yin mod kyi 'khrul pas ma nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that although it is established, it is not ascertained because of error,

original: 'o na thams cad ma nges par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na thams cad ma nges par 'gyur ba'i phyir rtogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then because everything would be nonascertained, there would be no ascertainment.

original: cung zad cig ni nges la cung zad cig ni ma nges pa yin no zhes gzhung gzugs par nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: cung zad cig ni nges la cung zad cig ni ma nges pa yin no zhes gzhung gzugs par nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not possible to maintain a treatise that says that some is ascertained and some is not ascertained.

original: rnam par dbye ba @254b med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba @254b med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no distinction.

original: rnam par dbye ba yod na de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba yod na de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: If there were a distinction, it would be so, but not otherwise.

original: dmigs pa nyid yod par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid yod par brjod pa yin te /
translated: It is said that the object itself exists,

original: de rnam par dbye bas ni yod par rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de rnam par dbye bas ni yod par rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: and by distinguishing it, existence is distinguished.

original: des na ci ltar gcig nyid la cung zhig ni nges par 'gyur la gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des na ci ltar gcig nyid la cung zhig ni nges par 'gyur la gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, how could it be that in one thing, something is ascertained and something else is not?

original: nges na 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: nges na 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: If it is ascertained, this is not so.

original: gal te skad cig ma nyid nges kyang sngon po nges ma yin nam mthong ba ni mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba ma yin no zhe na de la yang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te skad cig ma nyid nges kyang sngon po nges ma yin nam mthong ba ni mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba ma yin no zhe na de la yang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is said that even though momentariness is ascertained, blue is not ascertained, and seeing is not tenable, then in that case, because of contradiction,üîΩit is like this:

original: 'di ltar / nges pas gal te de ni ci skad cig nyid /
analyzed: 'di ltar / nges pas gal te de ni ci skad cig nyid /
translated: If it is ascertained, how is it momentary?

original: bsgrub pa dang bral sngon por rtogs na ni //üîΩgzhan gyi skad cig dngos por 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang bral sngon por rtogs na ni // gzhan gyi skad cig dngos por 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: If it is understood as blue, devoid of proof,üîΩthe other moment is not established as a thing.

original: tshad mar grub pa gzhan gyis gnod ma yin //
analyzed: tshad mar grub pa gzhan gyis gnod ma yin //
translated: What is established as valid cognition is not contradicted by another.

original: gal te tshad mas grub pa tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod na thug pa med de /
analyzed: gal te tshad mas grub pa tshad ma gzhan gyis gnod na thug pa med de /
translated: If what is established by one valid cognition is contradicted by another valid cognition, there is an infinite regress,

original: de yang gzhan gyis yin pas yid brten pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang gzhan gyis yin pas yid brten pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: and since that is so, there is no reliability.

original: 'on te gal te sngon por nges par skad cig ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ma yin mod ;üîΩde lta na yang des skad cig nyid bkag pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'on te gal te sngon por nges par skad cig ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ma yin mod ; de lta na yang des skad cig nyid bkag pa ma yin la /
translated: But if it is not the case that the ascertainment of blue engages in the momentariness of blue,üîΩthen still, the momentariness is not refuted by that ascertainment of blue.

original: de bsgrub pas kyang sngon pos nges pa la gnod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bsgrub pas kyang sngon pos nges pa la gnod pa ma yin te /
translated: And the ascertainment of blue is not contradicted by the proof of momentariness.

original: bsdu ba'i tshul gyis gnyi ga yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i tshul gyis gnyi ga yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both engage by way of inclusion.

original: ldan pa ni gsum ste /
analyzed: ldan pa ni gsum ste /
translated: Possession is of three types:

original: bsdu ba dang rnam par brtags pa dang gnod pa'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba dang rnam par brtags pa dang gnod pa'o //
translated: inclusion, imputation, and contradiction.

original: bsdu ba ni sngon po yang yin la autpala yang yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bsdu ba ni sngon po yang yin la autpala yang yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Inclusion is like ‚Äúblue and lotus‚Äù

original: chos gnyis bsdu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gnyis bsdu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because two properties are included.

original: rnam par brtags pa ni mi 'am tho yor zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par brtags pa ni mi 'am tho yor zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Imputation is like ‚Äúman or scarecrow‚Äù

original: gnyi ga la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both are possible.

original: gnod pa ni thag pa ni sprul ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gnod pa ni thag pa ni sprul ma yin no zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Contradiction is like ‚Äúrope is not snake‚ÄùüîΩbecause they are mutually exclusive.

original: sprul nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sprul nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the manifestation itself is impossible.

original: de'i phyir 'dir sngon po dang skad cig ma dag bsdu ba yin pa'i phyir skyon ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir sngon po dang skad cig ma dag bsdu ba yin pa'i phyir skyon ci yod ce na /
translated: Therefore, what is the fault in the inclusion of blue and momentariness here?

original: 'dir brjod pa //
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa //
translated: Here it is said:

original: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan phyir //
analyzed: gnod pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan phyir //
translated: Because it possesses the characteristic of harm,

original: 'dir ni ci ltar sdud par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dir ni ci ltar sdud par 'gyur //
translated: how can there be inclusion here?

original: gnod bya gnod par byed pa ni //
analyzed: gnod bya gnod par byed pa ni //
translated: The object of harm and the harm-doer

original: sdud par 'gar yang 'ongs ma yin //
analyzed: sdud par 'gar yang 'ongs ma yin //
translated: never come to inclusion.

original: gal te sngon po nyid skad cig ma spangs par nges pa yin na skad cig ma nyid bkag par 'gyur te ;
analyzed: gal te sngon po nyid skad cig ma spangs par nges pa yin na skad cig ma nyid bkag par 'gyur te ;
translated: If blue itself is definitely abandoned by momentariness, momentariness is refuted,

original: des dben pa ni rang bzhin bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des dben pa ni rang bzhin bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the absence of that is taken as the nature of blue.

original: bden pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa nyid gnad pa yin no //
analyzed: bden pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa nyid gnad pa yin no //
translated: The realization of the nature of truth is itself the harm.

original: gal te 'di la 'di med do zhes dngos po med pa'i tshad mas gnod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'di la 'di med do zhes dngos po med pa'i tshad mas gnod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúThis does not exist in that,‚Äù is there not harm by the valid knowledge of nonexistence?

original: mngon sum ni 'ga' la yang gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum ni 'ga' la yang gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Direct perception is not a harm for anything.

original: de ni mi 'thad de 'di ltar /üîΩmed @255a * //
analyzed: de ni mi 'thad de 'di ltar / med @255a * //
translated: That is not tenable, because in this way:

original: ces nges pa 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: ces nges pa 'di nyid ni //
translated: This very ascertainment of nonexistence

original: tshad min 'di ni tshad 'bras yin //
analyzed: tshad min 'di ni tshad 'bras yin //
translated: This is the result of the valid cognition.

original: de yis dben par dmigs pa ni //
analyzed: de yis dben par dmigs pa ni //
translated: The perception of the absence of that

original: tshad ma de la nges pa yin //üîΩnges pa 'di rang rgyud pa'i tshad ma ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma de la nges pa yin // nges pa 'di rang rgyud pa'i tshad ma ni ma yin no //
translated: is the ascertainment of the valid cognition.üîΩThis ascertainment is not an inference.

original: 'di ni mngon sum gyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon sum gyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Since it is a subsequent cognition of direct perception, it is not a different type of cognition.

original: gal te ci zhig ltar dben pa'i rtogs pa skyes kyang de skyes par ma gyur pa de lta na yang der rung ba nyid kyis de 'gog pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te ci zhig ltar dben pa'i rtogs pa skyes kyang de skyes par ma gyur pa de lta na yang der rung ba nyid kyis de 'gog pa yin no //
translated: Even if the cognition of the absence of something arises in some way, if it has not arisen, it is refuted by the fact that it is suitable to arise.

original: 'di yang 'og nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di yang 'og nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: This will be explained later.

original: de la gal te sngon po skad cig ma nyid yongs su spangs te des na de nyid kyis skad cig ma nyid bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la gal te sngon po skad cig ma nyid yongs su spangs te des na de nyid kyis skad cig ma nyid bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: If the momentariness of blue is rejected, then by that very fact, momentariness is refuted.

original: ci ltar gzhan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur //
analyzed: ci ltar gzhan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur //
translated: How could it be established by something else?

original: 'on te des kyang bsgrub pa nyid yin mod kyi 'on kyang gzhan gyis gsal bar byed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te des kyang bsgrub pa nyid yin mod kyi 'on kyang gzhan gyis gsal bar byed do zhe na /
translated: If it is established by that, but is made clear by something else,

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: then this is said:

original: gal te sngon gyi rtogs pa de //
analyzed: gal te sngon gyi rtogs pa de //
translated: If the previous cognition

original: tshad min ci ltar gsal ma yin //
analyzed: tshad min ci ltar gsal ma yin //
translated: How can it be clear if it is not valid?üîΩIf the object is not made clear,

original: don de gsal bar ma byas dang // de grub ces bya 'thad par dka' //
analyzed: don de gsal bar ma byas dang // de grub ces bya 'thad par dka' //
translated: it is difficult to accept that it is established.

original: des kyang gsal ba ma yin zhes //
analyzed: des kyang gsal ba ma yin zhes //
translated: If you say that it is not clear,

original: bya ba 'dir yang ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: bya ba 'dir yang ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: how can that be so?

original: 'dir ni de bsal gzhan du ni //
analyzed: 'dir ni de bsal gzhan du ni //
translated: Here it is refuted, but elsewhere

original: nges par 'thad dang 'brel ma yin //
analyzed: nges par 'thad dang 'brel ma yin //
translated: it is not necessarily connected with what is acceptable.üîΩTherefore, understand that the former and the latter

original: de yi phyir na sga ma dang // phyi ma'ang 'khrul par rtogs par gyis //
analyzed: de yi phyir na sga ma dang // phyi ma'ang 'khrul par rtogs par gyis //
translated: are also cases of error.

original: yul gcig gi shes pa dag ni phan tshun 'gal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gcig gi shes pa dag ni phan tshun 'gal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The consciousnesses of a single object do not mutually contradict each other.

original: des na gcig bsgrubs pas de tha mi dad par thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir sgra dang rtogs pa gzhan 'jug pa ni don med do //
analyzed: des na gcig bsgrubs pas de tha mi dad par thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir sgra dang rtogs pa gzhan 'jug pa ni don med do //
translated: Therefore, since one is established, all are established without distinction, so it is pointless for other words and thoughts to engage.

original: 'on te khyad par tha dad pa dag sgra dang rnam par rtogs pa tha dad pa'i yul yin pa des na thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par tha dad pa dag sgra dang rnam par rtogs pa tha dad pa'i yul yin pa des na thal ba 'dir mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the different distinctions are the objects of the different words and thoughts, then this consequence does not follow.

original: tha dad pa yin na bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag chos can gcig la 'du bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa yin na bsgrub pa dang dgag pa dag chos can gcig la 'du bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are different, then the positive and negative concomitances are not combined in a single subject.

original: gal te phan tshun dang rten las kyang tha dad pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te phan tshun dang rten las kyang tha dad pa yin na /
translated: If they are different from each other and from the basis,

original: de'i tshe de dag chos can yang tha dad pa kho nas rtogs par 'gyur bas de'i tshe de dag la rten gzhan med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe de dag chos can yang tha dad pa kho nas rtogs par 'gyur bas de'i tshe de dag la rten gzhan med pa'i phyir /
translated: then they would be realized as just different from each other. In that case, since they would not have another basis,

original: ci ltar gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ltar gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur /
translated: how could they be a common locus?

original: ci ltar autpala sngon po zhes yon tan dang rdzas rtogs pas na de dag la rten gzhan ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar autpala sngon po zhes yon tan dang rdzas rtogs pas na de dag la rten gzhan ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Since the realization of the quality and the substance is like ‚Äúblue lotus,‚Äù they do not have another basis.

original: des na gzhi ma thun pa nyid dang khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na gzhi ma thun pa nyid dang khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, they would not be realized as a common locus, as a qualifier and qualified,

original: don so sor rtogs pa'i phyir bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no //
analyzed: don so sor rtogs pa'i phyir bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no //
translated: because they are realized as distinct objects, like a pot and a cloth.

original: 'on te sngon po yan 'gar ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sngon po yan 'gar ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if blue is not a separate part,

original: de lta yin na sngon po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa nyid kyis rdzas rtogs par @255b 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta yin na sngon po'i rang bzhin rtogs pa nyid kyis rdzas rtogs par @255b 'gyur te /
translated: then by just realizing the nature of blue, the substance would be realized,

original: dum bur rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dum bur rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no realization of parts.

original: 'on te rigs dang yon tan yin na yang gzhi mthun pa mi rtogs te /
analyzed: 'on te rigs dang yon tan yin na yang gzhi mthun pa mi rtogs te /
translated: But if it is a type or a quality, then a common locus is not ascertained,

original: gzhi brjod pa'i sgra gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhi brjod pa'i sgra gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other term that expresses a basis.
